Title: Garden of Death
Synopsis:
Have you ever read those reincarnation stories?
Where main character is given a second life by a god?
Is given great cheat power, Then goes on an adventure to defeat the demon king or some other great evil!
Well this story is a little different...
 
When a young child passes the day of his predestined death, lives on the edge of death. He grows to resent life and curses the gods themselves, gaining the attention of a Devil.
What is the gift that the Devil himself gives such a human?
And what is it the Devil has asked for in return?

 
I'm not too exprienced in writing (as my specialty is illustration),
but I hope you can find some enjoyment in this story!
I very much welcome helpful critisizm! ^ o^)

Title: An Un-Ideal Eternity
Synopsis:
An Un-Ideal Eternity is about a man named Desmond, who is killed, revived, and then finds himself immortal in a post-apocalyptic society. Just because it’s a society doesn’t mean that either he or “they” have to be civilized. And just because a gentleman has become immortal does not mean that he has no dangers to be wary of.
The good news is that he’s been afforded some very kind and very generous ministrations from his future-self. The bad news is that all those efforts might still not be enough, to allow our hero, to live in as untroubled and as un-tumultuous a manner as he’d prefer.

Title: Transported Into Another World As A Slime (Under Rewrite)
Synopsis: "What is life and what is the meaning of it?""Life is but a terrible game. A glitchy game without retry, fun, or meaning to it."   Shin Harfort, a high schooler with the great nickname of "Teacher Bully" and the one who stands at the pinnacle of loneliness, is transported into another world along with his classmates. Where he encounters things which remind him of what he missed in the past. His values and ideals are challenged.  Now he must evolve both physically and mentally like the monsters from a certain game and bring forth what he truly wants.

Title: Twisting Fate (Complete)
Synopsis:
Through the planes another world lies, fighting for survival from the taint their ancestors unleashed on their world. For generations, they have called beings from other planes to bolster their forces, but now few answer their calls. So, they turn to what their ancestors did in desperation, the very thing that doomed them originally. Forcing a planar junction, so they may retreat there to fight against their enemies.
They turn to the plane their ancestors were thrown out of, a plane where magic is no longer. Earth, now a land of technological marvels unprepaired for both the demonic taint and the shattered kingoms of theirs. 
Adrian Ravnos a young man who wants little more than to have some fun playing games and reading books must survive in this world rapidly returning to the state his ancestors lived in, reality and fate in flux. Can he even survive let alone thrive in this twisted world?
As the plane of Althrá has been dragging beings of power to their plane for centuries there are multiple systems of both magical and physical arts known by characters within this story. Likewise, many ideas have been adopted and implemented by the dying deities of Althrá.
This story is being rewritten, it will stay up until the rewrite is done.

Title: Just A Simple Heist
Synopsis:
Once, Ren was the model citizen. Coming of age in the city of Leyden, built up around its famed academies, Ren reaped the benefits of an education afforded to few others. Despite the early death of his father, or perhaps because of it, he strove to make the best of said education. He particularly found success in the theatrical arts, coming to develop an uncanny talent for acting.
However, after being uprooted from his home by a twist of fate, Ren began to apply these talents in less… savory… pursuits. From basic thievery to elaborate con-acts, Ren cajoled his way from town to town, constantly pushing the boundaries of his abilities. So, after one too many notable close calls, Ren jumped at the chance for an easy job offered by an old contact from Leyden. After all, what could go wrong with just a simple heist?
 
A fair warning to all readers: This is my first real attempt at writing, well, anything. As such, I have no prior experience to inform a schedule on release timings. While, as an avid reader of novels on this site myself, I will do my best to keep up a steady pace of content, I can’t guarantee anything now. Additionally, if you enjoy the story (or don’t!) please let me know what works well and what doesn’t. I hope to do my best to learn as I go, and this will be made infinitely easier with feedback from you all!
Finally, while it’s possible there will be references to sexual content, owing to my lack of knowledge on how to write them, I will likely leave out anything explicit (hence the lack of the warning on the story).

Title: In this Dangerous World
Synopsis:
Walking home one evening after school, Devin was attacked by a monster straight out of a horror movie. Just as she thought she was going to be eaten alive, she was saved--if you can call it that--by something that could only be considered the bringer of the apocalypse, which swallows the first monster as a evening snack.
Unfortunately for Devin, this new apocalyptic horror considers her the main dish. In a desperate bid, Devin manages to escape, but finds herself in a strange, dangerous new world far from Earth. Now she must figure out how to survive when everything seems to want to eat her, all while feeling the threat of that ancient eldritch looming ever closer.

Title: The Thalisean legacy
Synopsis:
Many years ago, a small but noble race called the Thalise existed with the sole purpose of defeating the demons and their king with to the power given to them by their creator; the mark of the Herald, a symbol that manifested itself as the main source of a Thaliseans strength to defeat the demons.
Many more years of strife passed but the Thalisean race mysteriously vanished. Humanity is pushed to the brink of ruin due to the demon's running rampant across the land. This is when the last of the Thalise is created and brought forth by their creator. Zachary Erinn, a young man raised as a normal child, embarks on his perilous journey to fulfill his purpose as it is revealed to him. Can he take over such a task that stakes the fate of humanity on his shoulders, or will he succumb at the hands of those that seek to deter him?

Or does his vengeance still fuel his will to live? Join this tale of fantasy and magic to learn of Kross and his path. This is Insignia's Story.

Do you believe in the Father sun, the Mother moon and children of the stars. All things that shine and illuminate the abyss of the vast space. Are you brave enough to unveil the mundane, die for the truth and return to light? We are knights that carry the lantern, and magicians that weaves reality. If you stumbled upon this message, you have but two choices. pass it off as folly, or join the holy.
After deciding to show up to the meetup, what does the future hold for Jackel?

Title: The Power In One
Synopsis:
This story takes place in a universe where people can cultivate to become stronger using energy in the atmosphere. However, this world is in the beginner stages of cultivation and thus most people require a weapon to use their abilities and powers.
John Alakai was unfortuantely born with all his Energy Gates closed, prohibiting him from cultivating the Ikehu Energy in the atmosphere and mastering the way of Swordsmanship. 
One day at the age of 15, John's mother hastily hands him a sword and instructs him to never let anyone take it, before she was brutally struck and murdered by her husband. John immediately starts running, but is suddenly struck by strange bolt of purple lightning. 
He is sent to another continent and meets an individual who gives him the ability to finally cultivate the Ikehu Energy. 
This is John's journey to becoming a formidable swordsman through the aid of this mysteriouis individual in order to avenge his mother by killing his father.

Title: Reigner Z
Synopsis:
In 1985, a portal opened, connecting two distinct worlds, Earth and Deymous. A small incident made way for the End War, a massacre that took the lives of 75% of both worlds' populations, forcing them to come to an agreement for coexistence.
That was 50 years ago.
Now in 2025, rumors that another End War happening are on the rise, and it's up to a group of eight individuals made up of both of the worlds' inhabitants to put a stop to it.
They call themselves The Reigners, and they are the only hope both worlds have to keep the peace alive...or die trying...

Title: Dreamscape (Working Title)
Synopsis:
Ever want to change your life? Ever want to become someone new? Ever want to let your desires be unleashed? For any real change a trial must be done. For any real change struggle and pain must be endured. And what you find at the end of the trial, may not be what you expect.
This is the case for Alex Cooper. An engineering student struggling to make a name for himself in the world. One day he gains access to a trial that will completely change both him and the world he would find himself entering. 
 
This story was inspired by several new fictions i have read lately, one of which is Aquiring Talent in a Dungeon which i have used as a template for the first 3 chapters since i am not very good at starting my stories. However it is only for the first three chapters and will change into a completely different story afterwards.
Please note that I am an amature writer who is going to college so i won't really have a lot of time to write. However i will try to keep this story going for as long as i can and any ideas or help that can be provided would be greatly appreciated.

Title: The Four Masters
Synopsis:
Black void above, white sands below. Las Vegas, Nevada has become a battlefield. There, arcane and supernatural beings of godlike power fight their eternal proxy war. They use unwitting pawns and powerful warlocks both. They are junkies for power, drugs and the thrill of the win. The pawns and knights dance through the mad machinations of their patrons. These warlocks are all sure of their independence. And are all wrong. 
One of these great powers, the Emerald King bears the honor of being the most insane of them all. The twisted being from beyond the sphere of stars has set its devouring gaze upon the city. Even now it is moving its pieces on an invisible board.
Adam Whateley is one soul with bad judgement and arrogance enough to accept the silent whispers of the mad god inside his dreams. As the last pawn of the Emerald King dies in battle, Adam gets dragged into the mad underground of Las Vegas that never was. 
This is where the story starts. The legions of hell, the courts of fae and the Devil on the Crossroads shall not stay out of this tale. Be a part of it, lest it spins out of control.

Title: The Daily Lives of Ordinary High Schoolers
Synopsis:
Human lives are transitory, and most of us will never make a mark on the world.I, Eric, am just a high school student. But I already know that I will never be the next Einstein or Turing. And yet, even though I know I won't make a difference to the world, I still try. Why? Because it makes a difference to me. And for me, that's all that matters.
 
I am dropped on fictionpress (check my fictionpress page).

Title: AlterGame, Book 1: The First Player by Andrew Novak
Synopsis:
THIS IS ALTERRA, where you can be the master of your own castle... or a field hand on a farm.And this is Jack, who wants to make his way to a different continent, hidden in the virtual mist.And this is an ancient quest line, buried under new versions of the game.Jack's goal: create his own guild. Buy a ship. And set off on the Great Journey. The journey of his life. The dangerous Gravediggers are not the only ones opposing him. Necromancers from sinister Nightmare, elite alpha-citizens, and relic hunters are only a small fraction of the enemies that the First Player will have to face.In the perilous Wasteland, the drifter Jack finds an abandoned truck, where an old-world game console is hidden. This moment marks the beginning of Jack's path to the lost continent, hidden in the virtual depths of the colossal Alterra. He still isn't aware of the enemies standing in his way. Not only are the guild of Gravediggers and the sinister necromancers of Nightmare against him, but also the secret masters of the game world themselves. The discoveries of ancient quest lines, long buried under new versions of the game, give Jack access to the Dark Service. This is a special branch of character development, which is no longer available in the modern version of the game. Now Jack, the messenger of a great Goddess, possesses a Night Weapon, and is venerated by an entire race of NPCs...Just how will this road end? And it does indeed have an end...
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Title: EleMenTaLenT : A Dungeon Keeper's Tale
Synopsis:
Do you think that Dungeons are like a field to harvest?
Well, that may be right in many cases.
But if so, who had sown the seeds?
Are adventurers harvesting resources more than enough for themselves? 
Is there a much darker motive behind, driving them into reckless attempts for conquering dungeons?
Who are the people behind this conspiracy?
Are Dungeons made for adventurers to strip of their resources and enjoy the experience and prizes for conquering them?
Or is it an ecosystem with living things that have blood, tears and family just like our homes?
Perhaps the story of Dungeon Keepers will change your perpective of how Dungeons work and how the world truly operates.
Which side are you on? That's up to you!
Welcome to EleMenTaLenT, or should I say, Heaven On Earth?

Title: A Dulled Blade
Synopsis:
After a lucky break and an unfortunate mess, our main character, Phillip Tethers, find himself without a job, but a lot of money.
A new VRMMO was being released with the title of, ‘Forged Path’. No one really knew what it was going to be about, but everyone was promised one hundred percent realism. It would be the same as if you were actually there.
Follow Phillip as he journeys through Forged Path with friends and loved ones. It will be a slow journey to start, as he figures out his life, but will spend more and more time facing the new path that is ahead of him as time goes on.
Extra tags: Alternative magic system, Unusual love interest, First-person, Unfair world

Title: Martial Rebirth
Synopsis:
*Not reincarnation!* *Not Xianxia!*

Chased into a forest by denlinquents, young Shin faced a crisis like never before. He was pushed all the way to the edge of a cliff, and then in an attempt on his life, he was pushed off, into the dark abyss below.
However, he did not die, but woke up in the hut of a legendary master in the world of martial arts, with missing memories.
What will happen with young Shin? Will he return home, back to being the weak target he always was, or will he rise above, and become strong like no other? Will he become the disciple of the legendary Master of martial arts, Shou Atsutaka?

This is my second work, which I'll be writing as I take a break from my other story. This is not a xianxia story, or anything like that, but a story about martial arts. It's heavily inspired by the anime/manga "History's Strongest Disciple, Kenichi!"
Shin's master is based upon Isshinsai Ogata. However, that's not to say it'll be like Kenichi. Shin won't really be the good guy, which is to be expected, since his master is based on Ogata. Also, please don't cringe on the japanese names. It's not actually set in Japan, and Shin is only half Japanese anyways.
Hope you like it.

Title: Yes, I died. But that was millennium ago, okay!?
Synopsis:
Synopsis: A synopsis to a fairy tale.
A thin book, previously lying on a table, suddenly danced in the air. No strings, no hands or any visible force affected it in any way, but as if disregarding gravity itself, it flew to a point, then levitated in place.
The front of the book depicted a hill-top scene, with moody weather out-shadowed by a figure in ragged clothes. A title outstretched above boldly said 'The Sixth Sage' in a blood-red font.
Upon whatever force affecting the book opening it, a small story was inscribed. Skipping the contents and the obligatory 'based on a true story', the invisible reader opened the first page of the story, reading as such:
'Prologue:
The was once a world, plunged into an abyss of abuse and corruption. Demons and devils conquered sentient mortals with the ruthless annihilation of any significant cultures, humans, elves... Even the Orcs weren't spared from such a merciless fate, but, for those left living, things became far worse.
Generations upon generations of these demonic scum enslaved such beings, each building closer to absolute dominance over their subjects, by any vile methods available. Unfed physical labour, beatings and a constant robbery of lives and possessions were daily occurrences, especially for the poor minors of the society.
'No members of a race are completely the same.'
This ironic lie was said to such lords who, after fulfilling their share of violence, dared to force their 'possessions' to have compassion.
However, in an unforeseen twist, such an exception lead to their downfall. Not a demon, a beast-kin whose mastery of the magical arts, perseverence and flames of revenge extinguished this oppressive empire, wiping them off the face of the planet. And in replacing it, brought freedom where none could fathom it.'
After reading this in a blink of an eye, the page flipped in an almost perfect transition to the next page.

Title: The Martial Battle Soul
Synopsis:
The mind may crumble,the spirit may break, the body may rot and turn to ash. BUT THE SOUL IS IMMORTAL UNBREAKABLE AND POWERFUL.  DESTROY THE CHAINS THAT BOUND YOUR SOUL UNSEAL THE HIDDEN POWER SLEEPING WITH IN! WRECK HAVOC UNDER HELL DESTROY THE EARTH BETWEEN AND PIERCE THE HEAVENS ABOVE!
 
          A man betrayed by the people who he once protect and is one of the few people in his world capable of harnessing the power resting inside his own soul, dies after helping freeing the enslave race's. He though that that was the end, not knowing that it was just the beginning! 
 
 
 
 
Hi! Guys. This is my first story that I've ever written.              So I hope that you could help me improve by giving me advice and by criticizing my work.  Also could you kindly or brutally point out my wrongs like wrong spellings or grammar if you have the time or energy to do so!
Thanks!

Title: A World Reborn
Synopsis:
Tell me do you live so that you can enjoy life or do you live so that you can escape into another world of books, movies and games? There is something fundamentally wrong with a world if its inhabitants have to escape it by means of fantasy. However, what if reality became fantasy and your actions have consequences, would you still like it?
follow John as he adventures through perilous dangers, deceit and death in this reborn world. 
 
This is my first novel, so please be gentle with me. There might or might not be sexual content, depending if people want it, but I still put up the warning for now.

Title: Where evil resides
Synopsis: Transported to a medieval world, our protagonist discovers that every time he dies, his soul goes back to the beginning. What is his mission? What is this world? The truth awaits his discovery.

Title: Tea-Thricea : Anathema
Synopsis:
Ren is a troubled girl that cursed her 'bad luck', one of major reason why she is stranded in the 'dark side' part of the world. Now just if she could keep looking out for her  little brother's free reign of terror (and trying to make him a vigilante hero instead), secure her family from all threat and find true friendship, or maybe bit of romance along the way, life would be better...
Warning : Bad languange, Fast paced story, lots of psycho-ish tendencies, Lots rambling involved.

Title: Witch of Andania
Synopsis:
Laura Alexandra Muriel is the willful 16-year-old crown princess of the island kingdom of Andania. Endowed with breathtaking beauty and well-versed in both the twin arts of magic and the zither, she’s the gem of the imperial family.
However, the golden age of Andania is long past and the weakened nation is besieged by the northern protectorate of Vaishya and threatened by the southern slave empire of Saadian. As the flames of war ignite throughout the world and Andania teeters on the brink of destruction, the nation’s survival demands the ultimate sacrifice from one to save the many.

A civilization with two opposing systems of magic.
Ancient Magic: Wielded only by Andanian witches, emphasizes innate Talent and self-sacrifice for higher magic (Talismans, Song).
New Creation Magic: Preferred by the high gods & the rest of the world, requires sacrificing the life energy and blood of others for higher magic (Spells, Incantations & countless other forms).
 
A world with two antagonistic superpowers and an island nation forced to the brink of extinction.
Protectorate of Vaishya: The world’s largest trading union. Calcutta, the capital is the wealthiest city on earth, and ruled by the benevolent Zimran royal family, who seeks to establish a trading monopoly on unique Andanian magic.
Empire of Saadian: The world’s mightiest slave empire. Riyadh, the capital is the grandest city on earth, built on the backs of countless slaves, and ruled by the Immortal Emperor Xerxes, who seeks exclusive rights to the immense military potential of unique Andanian magic.
Andania: In its golden age, its unrivalled magical wares were famous throughout the known world. Magical artifacts with unimaginable power, flying fleets of steel, and enchantments that rivaled the divine blessings of gods.
But today. An aged powerless king clings on to power with his two young daughters, the last of the ancient witches of Andania. And as the fleets of both Vaishya & Saadian crest the horizon, the survival of the nation is threatened as never before.
 
And two princesses that simply wanted to spend a happy childhood together in peace.
Laura Alexandra Muriel: The willful & stubborn elder sister and The Witch of Andania, the title granted to the most accomplished witch of her generation. Her sworn duty, to sacrifice even her very life, to ensure the safety of her people. Her greatest love and lifelong competitor, her dearest younger twin sister.
Lily Alexandra Muriel: The kind & supportive younger sister and the undisputed genius in the zither and song. Her only wish, to live in peace and quiet with her elder twin. Her curse, a power that could doom an empire to desolation.
 
What’s the worst that could happen?
A forbidden Tower, that can grant any wish. A forgotten Species, resides within the darkest depths of the seas. An ancient Serpent, plots to usurp the remnants of the high gods.
Powerful witches, desperate wishes, lost memories. Immortal emperor, devious archmages, blood sacrifice. High gods, undead diviners, hidden costs.
Will the mortal witches finally triumph? Will the Immortal rule the world? Will the gods survive the serpent’s schemes?
And what about that cute fluffy kitten? Will she ever have her heart’s desire?
 
Tags: Fantasy, Action, Tragedy, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Strategy, Magic

Title: Vampire Hunter(Canceled)
Synopsis:

 This story is not for the faint of heart nore is it for those that think I am still redeemable, I have already lost my self to my own horror's I pray that you do not lose yourself either, for this tale will make you question your own sanity, I warn you to not pick up this story for you may lose yourself, please forgive me if I can not righfully explain my story but I warn you once you pick up this story they, will come for you and there is no stoping the coming darkness that will ingulf your soul.

Title: A Tale of Men
Synopsis:
Small acts, achievements and failures are the seeds of tomorrow. They grow forth and intertwine the lives of many. Let us hear the tale of men.
----
Author's comments: 
The story is unplanned, I do not have a fixed schedule but will try to update every thursday and saturday evening (CST). I mainly want to work on my writing, corrections and suggestions are welcome. My guidelines for this story are to focus on good character development, and keep powers sensible. The aim is to keep the action driven by the decisions, consequences and wit of characters.
Each update will likely be around 500 words.

Title: Sicarius Veneficus

Synopsis:
2017
Edward Hillore.
He was a orphan that was a adopted by a sexy woman on her mid 20's while he was 16. Title: The Child of Obsidian
Synopsis: Dourgan, a rare Black Dragonborn, is a mercenary who is surprisingly polite in a country were they are feared. As a mercenary, not many contracts put him off, but soon he will he called to defend this country against something that could threaten the entire continent.

Title: Last Howl
Synopsis: Humans are greedy by nature and whem they found that Hank had an amazing mana pool he became a guinea-pig againt he's will. He hate humanity for what they've done to him and he will have his revenge.

Title: Dirk, and the Black & Orange Catwomen of Betelgeuse VI
Synopsis:
After 400 years, the feline matriarchs of Betelgeuse VI have had enough of being second class citizens. They're fed up with rampant misogyny and racism. So, when the Intergalactic Federation of Straight, Butch Guys holds its Election for Chairman, they decide to run their own Candidate! What follows is political mayhem. Come see what happens when intelligent, civilized people have been pushed too far.
     The first arc of this story is the Election of Dirk Bordeaux. Hopefully, more will follow. If you like it, you can purchase The Election of Dirk Bordeaux on Amazon, Kobo, and a few others. I hope to have a print version available for book stores soon.
     D. Throop

Title: Kyro
Synopsis: Although Kyro's mysterious powers and strange appearance may ostracize him from his nomad tribe, they also make him an invaluable asset to whoever can manage to control them - namely, a greedy king with a vision of world domination.

Title: Untitled zombie guide
Synopsis: I stepped onto the window sill and looked out. A city that was once so mighty that it dared to touch upon gods domain, the heavens. now lay in ruin, it's massive skyscrapers had become treacherous paths of jagged metal. The inhabitants which gloated and walked proudly on it's wide and fancy streets. Now cannibals and psychos that knew no laws as the fed on each other in order to grow and evolve into monstrosities. A mighty city that had once signified stability and strength in the past now represented the current face of the human realm.

Title: Behind The Story
Synopsis:
Have you ever wondered how an ancient empire could suddenly collapse? How could a civilisation with seemingly boundless amounts of information and magical talent be destroyed leaving behind ruins to be found by a band of plucky adventurers? What about the dreaded Demon King that rose up, where did it come from? How come it wasn't stopped?
This story aims to answer those questions, at least for this world. This is the story told by the man who caused the collapse of an empire, who raised demons to torment and torture the world around him.

Title: Another world? Some weird magic? Sure.
Synopsis:
Writing my last novel, I realized that before you start, an ending should be there in your mind. So I wrote this as an atonement to my first novel.
This is a typical story about someone who gets stranded in another world with OP powers. But this is not about just the MC, but also some people around him who directly/indirectly had their lives changed.
I've written this as a collection of short stories where some may be bigger and more intense than the others.
Note: I've finished writing all the chapters, but will upload on my own discretion.

Title: A Firebee And A Broken Sword
Synopsis:
A world where beings and creatures can create phenomenons wich, in our universe, would be viewed as miracles and magic.
We will follow some sentient beings for a long, others for a short time, and their thoughts and actions in this world.------------
I write this for fun, with an irregular release schedule and the goals to put some ideas on ''electronic paper'' and improve my english.All Rights reserved.

Title: Road to Truck.
Synopsis:
Have you ever read the story where the main character has been hit by a truck, and then was reincarnated to another world?
Of course you did.
Well...In this story the main character IS A TRUCK!

Title: World End My Life Start WEMLS
Synopsis: world end my life start or WEMLS It's the story of two friends that where studying when the world changed. What well happend to them? Will they survive? Stay as friends?

Title: Champions of the Boundary
Synopsis:
In reality, there exists a realm between reality and fantasy, where all maner of magical creatures exist, and the warriors summoned as they died in reality fight against the forces of a powerful being known only as the Shadow of Life. Here, they live in a world with experience and Levels, Classes and Skills, and they fight against monsters, training for years just to achieve a Level that can allow them to make a small difference.
Yet even with this training, it is not enough. The Crystal Adventurers are forced to retreat further and further every year as the Shadow of Life's monsters grow stronger and more numerous, destroying cities at an increasing rate. If the city of Maelnor falls, then it will be less than a year before nearly all of the Crystal Adventurers are wiped out, both those brought to the realm upon death, and those born and raised there.
Legends tell of a prophecy that describes a team led by the legendary child of the prophecy, a child whose destiny is not to end the Shadow of Life, but to act as a harbinger, one whose very existence will turn the tides of war, one who must meet three seemingly impossible or currently unheard of criteria before the tides truly change.
This is the tale of Team Noruva, which consists of a quiet, yet wise healer, a silent, but thoughtful rogue, a knight with an iron will, a wolf beastborn who gained access to the System, and their leader, who ignores the impossible and does whatever he wants, because why the hell not? This is the tale of their adventures and daily lives, their ups and downs, their struggles, successes, and losses.

**REGARDING PoV'S***
There will be 5 total PoV's in this story. However, four of them will take several dozen chapters (beginning Chapter 73) to start happening, with the first two "Books" focusing just on Zack, which is why there's the Multiple PoV's tag on here, even though only one's around at first.

Title: Mystic Nan
Synopsis:
Note: Currently undergoing rewrite, we'll be back soon!(If you enjoy this story, it would help immensely if you considered voting for it at topwebfiction, thank you.)
Nan Beauchamp, like many youths of the year 2000-something; will live, work, and die as less than a footnote of  a footnote within the abridged history of unremarkable years.
This suits her fine.
Too bad about the truck that turned her into paste, then. Luckily, or unluckily, fate deigned to give the poor girl another chance to make something of herself in a bizarre universe brimming with magic, spaceships, and... giant talking spiders?
This "second chance" seems less than ideal.
(A web serial import from Wordpress)

Title: The Journey of a Serpent
Synopsis:
In a world of full of danger,
Only those with power will survive and those who don't will die away,
but among those who struggle in the harsh world is a serpent,
who will rise from a small weak creature into one of those who will lead their owns.
Join my journey with the serpent to rise her own kingdom.

Title: Primal Gaming: The Murder of Timothy Smithton: Part One
Synopsis:
This title is now available on Amazon and KU. I'll put a link up as soon as it's available. :)
A LitRPG erotica satirical crime thriller novella. A lot of genres for one story, huh? Shaun Winter, a detective in the real world who is just trying his best to stay off people's radars, and a lady of the night in game, and no, that wasn't his choice. Shaun hates the game, but when Timothy Smithton, a dear... acquaintance of Shaun is murdered and the only lead available is in Primal's 50s America game mode 'Golden Age' he has to suck up his deep disdain for the game and pull on a corset and heels.

Title: Mourning Star
Synopsis:
>>The cover art is not mine and I hold no rights to it<< 
Living amongst the beasts and animals of the wild for as long as he knows, Lucifer has no idea how he is supposed to think of the man who kidnaps and educates him in the ways of the world rather forcefully. Instinct driven and prone to violence, Lucifer is a beast in human skin after half a decade surviving in the borderlands between man and beast. Even after years of brutal education at the hands of a mysterious Knight, Lucifer is left torn between his primal urges and the morals hammered into him. How will he take the news that he was tossed into a deadly inheritance just to prove his life's value? Will the desire for answers about his family and past overcome the set status quo he has unknowingly set? 

This story is a rework of my other story Abomination. It follows a completely different path than Abomination, it is entirely different and original. Constructive criticism is always welcome just don't be an ass. And if you are going to rate my story then please leave a review explaining what is wrong.

Title: The Nightmare
Synopsis: This is a story based on a nightmare I had on 3/23/17I had to write it down after experiencing it, and hopefully, continue to make stories based off of dreams I've had. Keeping a sort of Dream Journal if you will. Give me feedback on what you think, and please excuse grammar and spelling mistakes, I suck at that stuff.The Paranormal Investigation Department investigates all things related or maybe related to paranormal activity. They have powers above the law, and in order to keep the peace, have been thoroughly trained to face these threats. In this dream, I'm part of this agency and I must face a demon possession.

Title: Mr. X
Synopsis:
Mr. X a Wind elemental Archmage and the most famous detective in the entire world. He took 32 cases and never failed to solve any of it. No one knows where he lives or how he looks; not even do they what his real name is. Join him as he takes up new cases, all in search of a certain organization, that is currently being termed as the most dangerous organization of the underworld. Who is he? What history does he have? Why is he looking for them? What is his relation with this organization?
Magister, Lord Balien, whose name resounded the world 10,000 years ago, made a prophecy regarding a calamity that would be occurring in the future. Now, after all these years, the calamity is approaching. What does this have to do with Mr. X?
Disclaimer: Although I have used names of places/characters from real life, in this novel everything is fictitious. If it resembles someone or some place, then it is purely coincidental. In that case, I can only humbly apologize. Thank you for understanding.

Title: Almagear
Synopsis:
At Year 2123 quarter of the world had been destroyed caused by Mass Weapon. A Scientist named Schrodinger Schwarz really mad at humanity choice and make seven intelegent automaton to destroy humanity. Five scientist run and hide to counter the automaton. They take one hundred human with them to become experimental rat to make a humanoid soldier. Can humanity survive and prevail?
 
Or the Scientist rage hammer fall upon humanity completely? making the extinct?
 
Lets join this struggle...

Title: Fiddler in Another World
Synopsis: While testing a game, I may have found a way... to a different world.

Title: Flowers on a Broken Path
Synopsis:
The paths to the heavens have been broken and only weeds grow in the garden of life.
A time of change has swept the lands of Eltraya as a portal into the newly discovered continent of Samar had brought their two peoples into contact 10 years ago. Different lifestyles and magics are showing men and women in both continents a new way of living. While the nations on both continents scramble to understand the natives on the other side of this recently created "Gate to Prosperity", their greatest minds are realizing that this portal that exists may not be the only one.
In the Kingdom of Eich a group of children are slowly coming into their power. If events had been different they may have lived their lives in obscurity, but the smallest of events led to their rise to fame.
Call them as you wish, Heroes, Devils or Gods, it's only a matter of perspective.
To them, it's the story of their life.
But above all it's the story of the boy who was named after a flower.

Title: Magic Knight Legends: The Phoenix Empire Pilgrimage
Synopsis:
Welcome to the fantastic world of Bios. Another world, not much unlike our own, with some exceptions, such as, say, the presence of gods, demons, and magic. While things like these will be forgotten after the Great Witch Hunt of the 1500's, let us turn the clock back to an earlier time. Back to an age of adventure and magic...
In the year of 1010 A.S. (Anno Salvator) a group of powerful magicians called the Stargazers, who had come together to create powerful new magic for the good of all mankind, had created an amazing, unique spell that no one had ever seen before: the Knighting. Using the power of one of the 366 Birth Stars, they could grant any human amazing magical power, turning them into what is known as a Magic Knight.
The young man known only as Grey was one of these Magic Knights. An orphan who was taken in by Emperor ?tori after the mysterious disaster at Dragon's Cradle in 1011 A.S., he now fights alongside other warriors for the continued peace of the Phoenix Empire.
Now, in 1018 A.S., Let us tell the story of one of the many tasks that Grey and his friends have been trusted with by the Emperor: taking a young priest on a pilgrimage to the Lunar Forest to offer thanks to the goddess of the moon.
Though, of course, if things were that simple, this wouldn't be a story worth telling, now, would it...?
Note: While this is set in the same world as Young Magic Knight, my previous work, it is not required reading in order to enjoy this, although it may help. That said, I might be able to say the same thing the other way around... if you ask me, you should be able to read them in any order you want (if you even plan on reading both) and enjoy them just fine. Of course, however, I, as their author, am just hoping you will read and enjoy both no matter what.
And just in case you can't find Young Magic Knight for whatever reason, I will provide a link to it: http://royalroadl.com/fiction/7753

Title: I was summoned in another world
Synopsis:
Despite what people thinks, being summoned hurts like hell.
What's that ? I'm in another world ? And I can use magic ? Cool !
Follow Aoi Erin adventures in her new world where she tries to live peacefully.

Title: Kings: The Fall
Synopsis:
The choices we make will define our destinies. Choose wisely!
 
Returned back to the time before The Change, how will his choices influence the world? A changed world filled with magic and carnage, make your mark!

Title: Tang Pao The Thug Returns
Synopsis:
Tang pao a tokyo thug born with a weak physique has never been able to harm the others he was always the oprime but when god gives him the power to recommend is to become powerful he accepts (normal (° _ °))
 
(I will have a do on project chapter fairly regular)



Cheating ability (spoil;) )

Title: The Planemeld
Synopsis:
The Planemeld
An event that shook whole planes to their knees, seen by some as a blessing, others a curse. Whether it was a curse or a blessings shall still be debated for eons to come, but all agree that it all originated from a game, a game simply known as The Planes of Eriphus.
Jay is a young man born with a rare condition that causes him to the inability to experience any emotions other than love and care for his siblings. Due to his condition and his transgender brother he and sibling having lead a life of being called freaks by their local community and even abused by their family.
Now twenty year olds Jay is renting an apartment and doing his all to continue the miserable reality he and his twin siblings call life. When Jay wins a top of the line new VR helmet for the first full immersion VRMMORPG The Planes of Eriphus he thought it may be a way to change he and his sibling fate. But little did anyone know it would change the fate of the planet and human kind for the rest of time.

Additional Tags Include: Town/Kingdom building and Gender Bender (Though its not the main character). This aspect will only occupy a small part of the story itself. I apologise if it isn't something your into.
Finally though the story has been listed as a non-human lead this aspect will not take place until much later in the story. Additionally while the protagonist is a non-human they are still humanoid unlike creatures such as dragons.
Also not the best description ever. But if the story gets more popular I will change. I may also try getting a cover as well.

Title: A world born from ashes (undefined hiatus)
Synopsis:
Humanity had gone extint, an accident had wiped everything that they managed to do.
Our protagonist, the last "human", now something else, with the objetive of learn what happened, he will embark on this new adventure.

Title: Curse from God, Live a Thousand Lives: Second Life
Synopsis:
DISCLAIMER: The cover photo was taken from google... 

This is a story of a man who died from accident, he was hit by stray bullet. Unexpectedly, the necklace he wears is a divine fragment formed at the time of God's birth, this fragment contains the power of a god. He met the devil which tricked him, but failed. An archangel, which negotiates with him. In exchange for the fragment, he will be reincarnated, for as many times he wishes. Why would he want to become a god, why would he want to watch over billions of soul. All he wanted was, to live life to the fullest. And he was reincarnated, to a world filled with magic. Watch him as he dominates the world of magic.

Hey guys this is my very first work...
Its what happens when a man reads too much of JLN and starts writing his own.
This is another reincarnated stories (yeah every cliche), but no gourmet stuff, just pure tale.

I hope it picked your interest even the slightest...
Have fun reading...
 WARNING: Veiwers discretion is advice.

Title: The one above all
Synopsis:
A king.
An Emperor.
Called many names, Emperor Vale controls his empire of Marsa. After his death, life goes on.
Centuries later, Vale awakens to find himself alive in a world different then what he left it as. Join ex-Emperor Vale in his journey across Marsa searching for answers to his sudden reappearance and his desire to fix the Empire he was proud to call his. Or is it still his?
 
Hello. I'm a new author starting out so I wanted to try something I've always been a fan of.Since I'm new, any criticism is welcome. Uploads will vary and will have no set time margins. I do not own the cover image BTW. 
Hope you guys enjoy!

Title: Code Antony
Synopsis: Julius Kaiser is at the peak of his power after his triumphant return from the American Wars in 1950. However, Kaiser's political ambition became apparent to his many rivals. In a desperate effort to hinder his continuous rise, at least sixty senators conspired against him. This conspiracy led to Kaiser's assassination six years later. What was expected to be a smooth transition of power led the Russian Republic to the brink of civil war. With the capital in a state of panic, and many of the governors all around the country wavering, one of Kaiser's lieutenants steps up in an attempt to restore order. His name? Mark Antony. After being hopelessly lost in the mists of time during the past seven years, the original documents of "Code Antony" was finally found intact. Thus, in order to preserve the long-lost story for more to read, it is digitized and published online. Planning: January 12, 2010Writing: January 17 to March 28, 2010Published online: March 23, 2017

Title: The God of Swords is Summoned as a Hero?
Synopsis: The God of Swords, an overbearing existence who had dedicated his entire life to his craft. He stood tall through all the challenges along the way, and emerged a sovereign of the sword. He made the perfect unbeatable sword style, and defeated all of those who dared to pretend themselves as 'above' him. In the end, he reached the pinnacle of his chosen weapon and gained unimaginable power. However, unimaginable power comes with unimaginable boredom. Unable to be defeated, he decides to take a vacation saving another world.

Title: I don't want this kind of rebirth?!
Synopsis:
Sitting at his desk Flynn struggles to stay awake during a college lecture. As he jerks his head to stay awake his mind becomes more distant until his body finally collapses. 
When Flynn wakes up he opens his eyes and feels his head is on the floor. Confused he tries to pick himself up but can't feel his arms and legs, quickly scanning the room in a state of confusion he can see what looks like a ritual of sorts and a dying old man staring down at him.
An ordinary college student is transported into a world of fantasy, filled with Kinghts and Mages only to reincarnate as lowly dungeon fodder.
The slime.

Title: Soul & Blade
Synopsis:
Seeing your sword dancing at your will.
That sensual curve of your blade piercing the heart of those who you hate.
Feeling the blood of your enemies drying at your face.
That life force that coursed throught their veins disipating.
Still standing, and your enemies all dead.
You are at the peak.
Yet you still think of changing the past.

Title: V̶i̶r̶t̶u̶a̶l̶ Reality
Synopsis: The game the entire world was waiting to see: Age of Aincrad. A virtual reality MMORPG like no other before it. You could become a knight in a medieval era, and battle for honour and glory. But there was one catch that the players were unaware of. You're stuck in this game until all 100 floors are cleared, also, if you die in the game you die in real life.   Our story follows Kathrall, a player who begins to find himself in the company of other players. Watch these relationships grow or fall, and watch Kathrall's journey through the world of Aincrad.

Title: Weeds and Immortals
Synopsis:
Two different characters.
Two goals
Both striding on one path in order to archieve their desire. 
How will the story of an Immortal and an reincarnated human in the form of weed play out in a wolrd where hate and despair, fear and desire rules over the hearths of humans?
 
There will be at least three chapters a week for this. Any more chapters will depend on motivation and/or free time.
This is an original novel by my person and it will contain a lot of philosophical ideas and thoughts I have and will get while writing this. Also be prepared for a lot of bad puns and humour as well completely messed up language.
Also if anyone would want to proofread and fix my bad english please pn, I'm no native speaker so please have mercy at my tiny ego.

Title: Quest Eternal
Synopsis:
Everyone has a secret, something to hide, a part of themselves they burry so deep they forget its even there. They seal it, with bonds of love and affection, of dedication, resolution and determination. But after I made my mistake, my sin, that which would send my world plummiting into the abyss, I had none of those, so I forgot my pain through obsession and dedicated my life to righting those wrongs. 
But in the end it all came to naught...
Then something happened, within the very pits of my despair everything changed. I was given a new chance, a new life, in a world of heros, of villains, of monsters and magic. So my journey began, I would make my way from my despair, I would rise to new heights after falling to such lows, But never forget my sin, never run from my past, I vowed to myself I would change the world. 
I would become an adventurer and that was a promise.

Title: Daemonia Graveyard
Synopsis:
For being born through an affair between a drow and a demon, our MC was despised all his life long. The member of his father’s drow clan may have raised him properly, but he was not treated like the others at all. The other children often beat him up or spit on him without ever being punished by the clan elders. He couldn´t even keep count how many times this children cursed at him. As parents were no more so he had only the former servant of his mother, which took care of him. The other clan members could deny him the better food, a proper bedding, but there was one thing they couldn´t deny him and that was his own realm. During the coming of age ceremony ever member of the clan got his own realm to manage, as they were a clan of Realm Keepers. He may have gotten the smallest of all the available realms of his clan but it was nonetheless a realm. As his clan already saw him as a demon he made up his mind to create a Demon Realm, his goal was to create the strongest Demon Realm there is.
Follow our MC on his way through the troubles of the school life at an Academy for Realm Keepers, finding his way to create his personal Demon Realm. Watch him evade all the obstacles which are thrown in his way and how he and his Realm grow through them. Watch his Realm grow and prosper until he stands on the top.
_________________________________________________________________________________
By the way, my first language is not English, so please don´t be offended if you find mistakes. I would appreciate it if you could point my mistakes out so that my English gets better.

Title: Lost World: Grom's tale
Synopsis: Some people mean the best but come across as assholes instead, others are just assholes. When Grom set out to make his mark on the Lost World he had every intention of being the good guy, the lawful good as it were but it was not meant to be apparently. Leaving a trail of destruction in his wake Grom quickly finds himself as one of the most hated players in game and it's all just one big compounding misunderstanding.

Title: Forsaken Soul
Synopsis:
Morgan is just an average teen or at least he was. He is now in a foreign world where magic is real, mythical beasts roam, and monsters hunt. Labeled as a heretic he was hunted down by the Holy Church and left to die. On his last breath he is reborn as a lich. An undead mage who can summon powerful minions of darkness. Fueled by revenge, bloodlust and the internal darkness of his soul, watch as morgan struggles in a world where he is now the monster and grows in power by consuming the souls of his victims. 
Will he become a evil creature of massacre? Is there any shred of his humanity left? Will he ever make it back home?
 
ONLY TIME CAN TELL...
 
Note from author: This story will develop slowly. He isn't some chosen person or special in any ways. Not even very lucky, powerful or smart. Just a regular guy in a world he doesn't understand. The novel will cover his journey, even some of the boring and adventureless parts. I want him to seem real. I will however used time skips for long-winded and stagnant periods followed by summaries of what occurred.

A shameless boy, a sister who keeps him on edge and a city of students full of hormones. What could go wrong?
Oh, and the world is at war.

Title: Maerk Wings

This is the amalgamation of every unique minds out there. But, it is not enough with just that.

Title: Child of White
Synopsis: There are two absolute truths in this life: your blessings, and how you died in the last one. Sometimes the Gods are kind- and grant us the ability to do things like fly, grow food, create storms. But when they granted us this gift, I don't think they foresaw the greatest threat to our survival: ourselves.

Title: The dungeon masters
Synopsis:
welcome to the world of arrerat, a world covered with dungeons, swords and magic
come follow Dylan on his adventures through this magical world as he makes a contract with a dungeon core and becomes a dungeon master, seeks to create the most powerful dungeon, and seeks vengeance on the rogue dungeons that killed his friends and family and threaten the world
this story will be updated about once a week but the lengths will vary depending on how I feel and I plan on holding many polls and having you guys help me write this story.
also, I'll be basing my story of quite a different dungeon maker stories so you might see similarities with them but I'll be putting my own spin on them and won't be using anything else besides their concepts
I'll also be using a few of my beliefs and views and these are my personal views so don't take them to heart, their personal and also for this story, not reflective at all of this world at all
finally, I hope you enjoy this story and I'll talk to you later

Title: The New Dawn
Synopsis:
What if you found the girl you loved the most was just a girl that was send to take the documents that your parents have left you?.
What You would have done?.
And what if the god of revenge Likes you?
 This is the story of Tom and his new life, but this time in a world with magic and monsters.

Title: A Not So Dark Soveriegn's Rise
Synopsis:
Summoned to another world as a sacrifice, 'Dan' lives on as a Dungeon Core and plots to overthrough this world's order who treats summoned 'heroes' as war assets.
Leveraging his new existance to its fullest, he is both a 'hero' and 'demonking' simultaneously.  But what would you do with that much power in a world where heroes are weapons of the countries and kings are more threatening than demonkings?  
Should he even help anyone other than himself in the first place?
Not even his own OP prowess might be enough to see him, or the ones he cares about, through another day.  Will he be able to build his dungeon into a great kingdom for prosperity and protection?
 
 
Author's Note:  My first attempt to write a story, and largely based on the 'Dungeon Core' concept.  This story will feature Empire building aspects in addition to some personal growth of characters interms of power and character.

Title: Sanct Diez
Synopsis:
This one is a strange one if you ask me.
It is not a story of fantasy, nor a sci-fi space opera, but the tale of a single planet.
Not a story about the advancement of science, rather it is of the reign that follows.
Not a story of ethics, rather a tale of consequences.
 It is not a story of a single character, rather a tale of many.(but you can feel free to see one as the main character, should you choose so.)
 
It is a story about Sanct Diez.
 
 
...No promises on posting Schedule, We shall see.

Title: Artificial Seed
Synopsis: Lyndon, an eight years old with autism. Until one day, due to series of unfortunate events. He found himself that his body was remodeled by an artificial intelligence, AS. With the help of the AS system, he will bring upon change onto the world as he stepped over those who attempt to shackle him.

Title: The Overlord of the Void
Synopsis:
The year is 2047, the world has changed after several technological breakthroughs. In this day and age, the technology for a full virtual reality world has been refined to near perfection. And In the middle of this development was [Ether Gate]---the world's most famous virtual reality massive multiplayer online roleplaying game (VRMMORPG).
With over 5 billion registered players world wide, the game has such depth and impeccable programing from some of humanity's greatest minds, that it could be recognized as one of humanity's greatest digital accomplishments.
As the game got famous, so did its players, and on the top of the global leaderboard is the username [Xero].
Quickly, this person who had no background or information about his real identity became a legend with his in-game achievements.
...
On a certain day as Xero was in the middle of revelling in his victory againts the [Overlord of the Void]---the single most powerful enemy in Ether Gate, a strange item appeared in his invetory simply named [Chance].
While inspecting the item a clear voice resounded in his mind...
Would you like to be freed from this world?

Title: Dominion
Synopsis:
Power is a tool.
The only tool that people will fight, love and betray for. A tool that controls even the strongest-willed of people and make people commit the darkest of sins for.
But our protaganist was not powerful.
In a world destined for the powerful to rule over the powerless, our protaganist resorts to a life of mastering video games and reading books in order to escape from this harsh reality.
One day, when he has given up all hope in his life, he re-awakens to find himself in the body of a young noble in a world all too familiar. Imprisoned within the deepest confines of a castle ruled by a demon lord, he is surrounded by enemies on all sides. It had already seemed as if his new life had stacked all the odds against him.
But in that very moment, he chose not to be powerless anymore. He vowed he would struggle with all of his might to attain as much power as he could. He promised he would save this world from all of the injustices it held and enact vengeance on those who would oppose him.
Because yes, I had decided.
I will crush this world with my own hands.
---
I've put in a warning for traumatising content; our protagonist's past and some of my descriptions of those (and future) scenes may come across as traumatising to some readers.
Covert art isn’t mine, though it is a pretty good representation of my main character.
Current upload schedule: Saturday, Sunday

Follow the dark god through his trials and adventures to become a higher beeing.

Title: The Search For A Mad Conqueror!-THE RED MIRROR
Synopsis:
A war was fought against a tyrant who started as a slave,turned to a bandit,became a warlord,conquered a kingdom,became an emperor,conquered the land and then the continent and still did not stop....each obstacle he faced was conquered but it seemed as if his hunger for more just couldn't be stopped....in a war against him once he started to became what could only be described as a monster the whole world divided into two and the battle went on for decades finally a group of individuals as extraordinary as the Mad conqueror and some even worse then him came together giving people hope that for the first time that he could be stoped.
They fought there way through hordes of monsters,helped and saved what they could but undoing what the Mad Conquere has done seemes imposible.People who followed him feared him,some worshiped and some thought he was perfect ruler for the world.
The only way to stop him is killing him...that was the answer of the great celeastial Witch Saira who can see everything be it past present or future.And so the group of the 12 indivisuals went for a final battle to his castel and......he was gone.No where to be found.His generals who didn't showed up for a fight where no where to be found either....He was no longer in this world...boared of this world he seemed to have set his eyes on something new...

Title: THE WORLD CHRONICLES: God Among Gods
Synopsis: When God created man he also made other gods to rule and guide them. Chouichi is one of these gods, and his job is to maintain peace and order throughout the realms. But when his laziness and neglect drives the entire world into chaos over and over again, he is exiled to the human realm and stripped of his power; unable to return until he completes a very important task that will put his knowledge, strength, and morals to the test. Join the adventure in the first volume of The World Chronicles series.

Title: Worlds' Gatekeeper

Lucas Lauwers, a newly graduated college student, finally got the first ever Virtual Dive Device, [Portal], after asking his parents for money. He enters the new world of [World Gate Online] in hopes of earning money, finding a girlfriend, and living an adventurer's life in a fantasy world!...Well, his wish has taken a turn in a weird direction when he was then suddenly transported to a completely different world! Using the [World Key], he is able to travel between worlds!
Is this his good luck? Or his bad luck? Anyway, if anything wrong hapens, let's blame RNG-sama!

Title: Powerman VS Spaghetti Cooking Japanese Bird

Title: The Earth: Rebirth
Synopsis: In 2037, the world almost ended. Monsters, including petite goblins and fire-breathing dragons, appeared everywhere — in police stations, schools, city halls, and houses. However, it did not stop there. People’s lifestyles changed: they had a status screen like any gamer would. This supernatural phenomenon gave each person a chance to spin a “wheel of fortune,” which would grant him or her an item, a weapon, a skill, or something else. Each person also received a treasure chest, which granted him or her a class. A group of three students at General Monta High school were alone in a classroom when it occurred. They spun their wheels and opened their chests… their adventure began.

Title: Demise of the Gods
Synopsis:
There was a being which was regarded with scorn by all worlds of existence due to its unique ability and magical affinity which was considered even by the standard of the Gods to be a taboo.
The story follows a young boy who was sold into slavery, however, a chance encounter with a soldier who was given the name of Rex and inheritor of the boy's unique ability given to him from the boy's former incarnation. As the boy learns more about his former life he must eventually come to make a choice, will he follow the same path as his former incarnation which leads to his inevitable demise or will he become a puppet of the Gods due to being unable to cope with the magnitude of his sins from his former incarnation's life?
 
This is designed for a more serious and mature audience as there aren't many boundaries in this novel.
 
Any kind of feedback would be much appreciated to better the novel as time goes by.

Title: Immortal Martial God
Synopsis:
An ancient world, where people from countless cosmos emerge...

A world, whose limits can't be perceived...


A world, where countless gods and immortals roam freely in the sky...


A world, where to be born is a fortune in itself...


A world where countless mysteries are waiting to be unveiled...


In this vast world, a boy wants to become a God but he has the lineage of Immortals. In this world where both Gods and immortals exist, only one can survive the coming tribulations, as it is known in the Vedas.


Will he be able to defy the odds, and cultivate both the blood of an Immortal and the power of the Gods to become an Immortal Martial God?

 
...................................................................................................................................................................
Author's Note:- Guys, the story will become good starting from 9th chapter. It's the turning point chapter

Title: Xenosaber: Fury of the Stars
Synopsis:
One will wake it. One will destroy it.
When exiled prince Genesis and a zealous order gallop into the mystical lands of Star World, they bring a fate with them that shakes nations to their roots. But for Jaival, a young drifter with a head full of wanderlust and a past shrouded in darkness, this rebel adventurer may be Star World's last hope.
The events that follow propel Jaival on a journey that only the courageous or desperate would risk, leading him to seek guidance of the ancient hero, Mikael, in Eira Citadel – a whole kingdom of secrets in itself, while under the watch of the outlawed sorceress – Sorata. Within the bustling fortress, Jaival runs into Danzul – the last guardian, Cyrus – paladin of the north, and discovers a magnetic connection to Princess Alya – a young, wise oracle with a mysterious spirit who has foreseen a coming takeover.
But this is only the beginning of their discoveries. Something else is stirring in the land, something more ominous than the rising threat of war. In the heart of these stirrings, whispers from a lingering presence calls to the heroes, compelling them to find the split pieces of the Xenosaber – a weapon once used to destroy entire worlds, and open a portal to another dimension where an imprisoned god awaits his revenge.
Xenosaber is a timeless elven fantasy where sword, magic, ancient technology and adventure awaits. Will our heroes band together and triumph over the coming darkness or will they be consumed by it? Find out now…
Xenosaber is available for pre-order. Your support will be deeply appreciated.

Title: Legacy Online
Synopsis:
Welcome, to legacy online, a game where players can do anything they want in this game. You want to conquer a city, sure, if you have the power. You want to destroy the game? Sure, as long as you can take on millions of veteran gamers. You want to build a giant statue of a penis in the name of satan and make all of the clouds in the game in the shape of a penis with wings? Sure. Everything is possible.
 
Watch as a normal 18 year old teenager with wild ambition become the emperor of Legacy online in his own “unique” way.

Title: World of Tala
Synopsis:
A man named Jasper Perez was riding a public utility vehicle on his way home when he saw a strange humaniod creature following the vehicle's tracks. He immediately called his friends attention and pointed to that strange humaniod creature but his friend said that there's nothing there. Few seconds later, someone screamed at the front gathering the attention of all the passengers inside. There he saw the strange humaniod once more, it slowly raise it's hand and a giant worm appeared behind it then the worm devoured the vehicle whole. At that time, he thought that he was going to die but a sudden light envelops his body followed by a strong wave of drowsiness making him fell asleep. The next time he opened his eyes, he's in the middle of an unfamiliar forest.
 
This is the story of Jasper Perez, a man got transported to another world trying to go back home.

Title: Once upon a tomorrow
Synopsis:
The story takes place in an alternative present in middle Europe that becomes devastated because another great war starts. Their lives are destroyed without a notice, without doing anything.
People are small and stood no chance to begin with but still suffer from the devistating modern warfare where no morals remained. Watch the people try to live with all they left! From rich or poor, they are all humans with a story to tell.
*important*The base of the story stands upon alternative history and is not real. The novel's aim to create a whole new world with a different set of morals and mindset so you will find the characters' way of thinking really strange and twisted. Please mind this while reading.
inspired by other 'civilian life during war' stories
Cover - I do not own the cover. The image belongs to MyDivineSecret (as far as I know).

Title: TIN MAN
Synopsis:
(One shot-1)
Year 201BO-It has been 2 years since humans left the planet as protecting against the invading beasts kept getting harder and harder. In year 198 day 112th all those except-

All humans who had beyond 23% mechanical parts.
All humans who were mutated above 12% or had some sort of dangerous disease or infection.
All those who had certain condition which meant they needed some sort of care, maintenance or some other thing which meant spending more resources on them then fixed amount for everyone.

Anyone who didn't fall under these conditions was allowed to board the ships called SC "Priestess" whose destination were planet with chances of more than 89% of human survival.
But this story is not about them but about those who were left behind. To be more specific, the one who stayed behind on his own freewill. Past hero of the wars against abomination and now a agent of the Nutrition department whose job is to make capture and distribute food to residents of humans left which was at least recognized as a "Town" by the Remenants.
 His name is Razael, Also known as the "Tin Man".
Author’s  note-I am going to write 10 one shots and the one which gets more than at least 4 or 5 positive response I will turn into a full story..Hoping you enjoy the story!

Title: Asura Ascending
Synopsis:
Thousands of my enemies stand before me, 
But I will still face the with an unwavering look.
Trampling down all the genius under my feet.
Bringing destruction to my enemies.
And if I am to fall today, I will still rise again tomorrow.
Because I am Asura.
And you better pray that I am not your enemy.

Title: The Shattered Swordsman
Synopsis:
The Rose Clan. A family that is renowned across the known world for the strength of their member's Weapon type Manifestations, an item which supposedly represents the summoner's soul. Some Manifestations are weapons, some heal, some just play music, however, they all have laws by which they abide. Each has two powers, a Call and a Bane. The Call is a power developed by the aspects of the owner, while a Bane is what the summoner hates. Very few have learned to unlock their Bane, let alone master it. In the Rose Clan, however, such thing is commonplace. So commonplace it is considered the norm.Nathan Rose is a boy born into the Rose Clan as the Clan leaders third child. Despite being the son of one of the strongest and most influential in the world, his manifestation's power clocks in with the lowest in recorded history. A zero out of one hundred. After countless years of being beaten up, he finally stands up to his father only to be beaten into the ground, his Manifestation broken. But just when he thinks that all is lost, an old man asks him a simple question. "Do you wish to be strong?"Join Nathan on his quest to prove the world wrong with a Manifestation that has more to it than it seems.
 
 
Authors Note/Important Message:
HELLO EVERYONE! I am I Can Spell! and I am now the author of this story. A LONG time before I made this account I was reading stories on Royal Road. During this time the very first story I ever got into was "The Shattered Sword" by Blovix. I loved this story but, like nearly every story on Royal Road (and inevitably probably this one), the author's release schedule was erratic and eventually stopped altogether.
My plan is to edit the previous chapters minorly and then take the story in the direction Blovix told me he wanted to since I think its pretty damn good. To be honest, I didn't expect him to have thought the story out all the way to the end since he stopped the story.
Anyway, I hope you all enjoy The Shattered Sword as much as I did.
Here is where Blovix proves I'm not lying.
https://royalroadl.com/fiction/chapter/126674
PS: It's called The Shattered Swordsman because it was what Blovix originally wanted to call it but mistyped and ended up never changing it but I like swordsman because the story is about Nathan, not his sword.

Title: Kiturasha God
Synopsis:
Jake Silvester wants the quiet life of being a "normal" modern day high school teacher. But it is really hard when you have a night job of being the captain of the demon hunting squad: Night Blades. Not to mention dishing out punishment to other supernatural beings who break the law.
On top of that, a crazy wolf girl keeps popping up and saying he is some sort of reincarnated god and that her tribe needs his divine help.
 

Author note:
this is pretty much the rough draft of my story. after 75 chapters I will be going through everything and I will edit some things and will probably add quite a few details on things that I have not in the first place
I also love reading other stories a lot so I will be submitting chapters infrequently.

Title: Smokecutter
Synopsis:
The year was 2125. 
After planet earth was made uninhabitable by the great nuclear war, humanity sought a home anywhere else on the horizon of its reach. Pharavanna, in the Andromeda galaxy, was the only home accessible by human space travel. The surviving factions claimed the planet, the most powerful being the Mega Corporation known as Nexactus.
Meanwhile, on the planet's surface, a bold defector sought to bring change to the conflicted world around him. Nexactus left the people outside the faction in shambles, and anyone that opposed the corporation would face certain doom. This defector defied the corporation, choosing to help those who had been hurt by its power and corruption.

Title: Paradox
Synopsis:
If given the choice to be able to travel through time upon your death, many people would immediately jump at such an opportunity. However, there is one person, a hero, who detests this power. If only he could die, if only he could end the cycle, if only he could travel back to the time he got his power and never get it in the first place, if only he didn't have things that were worth enduring this torment for. 
If only I wasn't the one chosen to burden such an unfair destiny.

AN: So, this is gonna be my first try using a different writing style. I usually write in the third person (I think?) like with The Lone Wanderer, but I'm gonna try the first person with this one.

Title: Terror Infinity - Eternal Realm
Synopsis:
Want to know the meaning of life? Want to live... A real life? The world changes when you click YES. In God's Dimension, you have to keep getting stronger, keep evolving to survive one horror movie after another. Do you kill everyone in your way to reach the end as a lone king? Or fight along with your comrades and survive through the support of friends? Everything was just for staying alive. Until you find the secret of God's Dimension. Who is the real enemy?
Well... This used to be the case, but shit just went sideways. "God" got axed by his higher ups for the utter shit show he/she/it caused. The Eternal Being that ruled over the being called "God"s domain has decided to start a new project to further mankind's evolution. Mack Squire is one of the humans who has been tasked with furthering this evolution process.
 
*****Warning - This is Fanfiction to some extent, but Im planning to take it in a whole new direction. I will not be doing the "classic" type of Terror Infinity (Manga type dialogue, harem concentrated, flat characters, horrible grammer (though mine is not the best either), and etc.) If thats what you are looking for, might as well stop reading. This will losely be based on Terror Infinity, but in a novel format and with a wider plot. This is my first attempt at writing a story so this will be a work in progress. Hope ya'll enjoy the story, its still being fleshed out but I have the general idea where I want to take it.*****

Title: Dragonfall: Enchantment
Synopsis: Sebastian only wanted one thing in life. A nice safe profession that let him stay behind the town's walls. His mother had other ideas, however. She insisted that he follow in his father's footsteps and become the town's greatest hunter, and as such she refused any and all apprenticeships he tried to secure. Sebastian's one solitary hope was that he possessed magic, and would be accepted into the Mage's Guild as a novice. Sometimes life gives you what you wish for, but in a way you never saw coming.

Title: Star Warrior
Synopsis:
Warning: Updates will be sporadic, currently on Hiatus
To be recognised by a star means to become a warrior. When Philip's life is torn apart by a group of star warriors rampaging in their village, he vows to take back what he lost and find his mother, who was abducted, by becoming one of the fabled star warriors himself!

Title: Outcast Assassin
Synopsis:
Tobias Burke is the man you want of you want someone dead. It never mattered who they are or where. They would die, and no one ever knows who did it. He was quick, quiet and always got the job done.
Now he gets his biggest contract yet and it all seems to good to be true. Tobias is in the the job of a lifetime. That is, if he lives long enough to collect the bounty.

Title: The Gravekeeper
Synopsis:
For as long as humans and magic have co-existed, the search for immortality has been something that has plagued human history every since the very beginning, to finally defeat death itself.
But as they dwelled deeper, forbidden knowledge was found, for humanity found the way to upset the balance between life and death, to mock God's very own will, to bring those that had died back to the land of living.
A taboo was made, a dark stench left on mankind's history, one that even years after is still being broken, but such an open act of heresy could not be left unpunished.
And it was for that sole reason that he existed. To keep the balance and to bring judgment upon those that dared to break it, for that was the duty that had been given to him. God's will given form for some, a force of nature itself for others, but he only answered to one name.
The Gravekeeper.

Title: The Hero Within
Synopsis:
As the school bell rang, a college student somewhere in Asia eagerly left the classroom. As he held on the door knob, his visions dimmed and his heart stopped beating.
He looked around, searching for help; but no one was there. In just a split second, his classmates and professor was gone.
While clinging to the thought that this was just a bad dream, an intense white light shaped like a human emerged from the ceiling.
---
The darkness of the cave welcomed him with open arms. Ironically, he thought that an angel carried him towards heaven but instead he was brought to hell.
Too bad it was neither of the two.
He ventured the cave wearing what he wore before he came here. So many questions popped into his mind;
Am I dead?
Why am I here?
How the hell did I get here?!
Little did he know, he was the hope that this world was waiting for.
 
Made by: Hitori-de, March 2017
All Rights Reserved

Title: Ink Stained Eyes
Synopsis:
He was supposed to be an elite. Genetically modified to be superior in every way. But that was hardly how he felt.
 
How can he do nothing right?
A failure, a disappointment.
Why couldn’t he be more like his brother? Perfect, popular, wanted.
 
He runs away. Runs away from reality runs away from who he was, runs away from the people who he cares for. He didn’t want to disappoint them, not again.
 
If only… If only he could be someone else.
The Spire could do that. Even if it was just a dream, in there he could be someone else, someone who didn’t disappoint.
 
There were already stories of it, after all, people learning skills in the game (though slight) could sometimes improve on them in real life too.
 
Maybe… Maybe he could learn to become a better person?
 
-
 
Author’s Note:
This is a Dark Fantasy, Action Adventure set inside a VR world. Though the VR world takes a large part of the story the scenes outside of it give it meaning. There’s more to both worlds than what can be first seen.
 
The real world is set in a futuristic scene, full of conflict under a layer of peace. VR technology is in widespread use, present in every business, every household, more than in just the gaming sector. Specifically, the ability to accelerate mental processes in a pseudo dream world allows for more efficient businesses with Virtual offices and other platforms.
 
This is all about relationships.
Heavy contents of drama and tragedy (cuz I wanna make ‘em suffer lololol)
 
Related Novels: The Forest Dreams

Synopsis:
