Three years later he was hunted down and killed. He then found himself in heaven, where he was reincarnated before he could get any real answers.
But after being reborn, he was immediately abandoned by his mother and left alone in the cold forest, where he was found by a woman, who took him with her. From that moment on, he started his second life as an assassin again in a clan full of them.

The Dragoon have a low birthrate for females in their race. Fearing extinction, they go around the universe kidnapping other species turning them into female dragoon hybrids. None of their test subject have survived. That is until they met Jay. Now that they found a patient zero. They want to find Earth and use it as a breeding farm. Jay mange’s to escape because a pirate ship happens to pass buy. The Pirate board the ship and capture everyone including Jay. The captain want to speak to her and It turns out The Captain is also a mysterious Dragoon named Drayden Leviathan. Captain of the Ship the Salamander one of the most natorious of pirates in the universe. With very few options left Jay Joins theses pirates and travels the universe. With the entire Dragoon army on their tails. She meets friends and enemies. Join Jay on her Adventure through the Universe

Title: Divine Imperium - Warlord of Takamagahara
Synopsis:
On earth, a boy named Yamato Shigeru was minding his own business, playing truant and spending time at a sports club.
 
One day, on his way back from the club, he stops by a park before he mysteriously vanishes.
 
Next thing he knows, he is taken to the land of the Shinto gods and requested to fight to help protect earth.
 
With the facts presented before him, he responds to the request, becoming the commander of his own faction to fight in another, chaotic world. His motivation, to prevent earth from being dragged into this world and being made a mess of, and… leaving his grey world behind.
 
Read though his adventures and decisions he makes in this unforgiving and unforgettable new world, where he will fight every mystery and every common logic and build a faction that trembles the earth and heaven.
 
Witness, the rise of the DIVINE IMPERIUM and the great warlord.

Title: Amber
Synopsis:
I woke up in the field confused. My memories seemed blurry. This doesn't seem to be like the world I know. Where exactly am I.
 
Our main character finds herself in another world confused as to how she got there. Her last memory on earth was her talking to a friend in the classroom.

Title: Trifling Tales
Synopsis:
ON INDEFINITE HIATUS-> It's DEAD Jim. Dropped. I'm not trying anymore.
Once upon a time, there was an intelligent six-year-old girl who dreamed of great things. With her special circumstances, these tales follow what happens when fantasy contrasts reality.
These are true stories distorted beyond their original selves.
 
She was a descendant of royalty and lived with her five brothers, older sister, and parents. As the youngest, she was pampered and doted on obviously by her parents, but only by most of her siblings.
Jim, two years older than her, caused her much grief in his jealousy as the Royal Family ignored his talentless and crude self. Jack, six years older than her, often interfered, but sometimes made the problems worse. John, nine years older than her, catered to her with good meals but was quite clingy. Jeff, ten years older than her, was an uncaring shut-in who did little and was quite bothersome.
Nadine, eleven years older than her, loved her the most affectionately. She even let her sleep in the same room as her after her medical training was done for the day. Tom, fifteen years older than her, left adventuring a few years ago. He still showed he loved her like the past by visiting whenever he got the chance.
Both her parents were there for her whenever she needed them. It was strange, but there were neither servants nor guards for the family. This was the reason why her mother spent most her day maintaining the estate while her father left on foreign affairs... and Jeannette is left mostly to herself.

Old Man struggles to traverse a fallen tree, his tall shield rebelling against its owner- attempting to throw him over, while his rifle slung over on the contrary, appearing light and docile in his other hand.

Title: Try Reincarnation, They Said. It Would Be Fun, They Said.
Synopsis:
A young man dies saving his friend from a truck. His soul floats away, where he is then left to drift in endless darkness. He wishes for strength and power, the rights held by the strong. Unexpectedly, he finds his wish granted, and he reincarnates as the force of the universe known as qi. However, God realizes that he screwed the hell up and tries to fix his mistake, only to realize it too late. Out of options, he imprisons the MC on the lowest-ranking planet in the entire multiverse. What happens now?
“Don’t I just get super OP?”
That comes later MC.
 

 
This is my first fiction and I'd greatly appreciate criticism. Feel free to let me know any problems you have with my story and any suggestions you may have. He knew his actions weren't always for the best. He haad always been a bit vengeful.

What would this mean for him, though?

Title: The Legend of Randidly Ghosthound
Synopsis:
Book 1 Available now on Amazon: https://mybook.to/randidly1

As the system initializes, the world shifts. Geography is rearranged and mixed, and levels and stats are instituted across the globe. On that night, one young man was walking through an underground tunnel, his mind on the small problems of his easy life. Because of his location during the shift, he starts in a dungeon far above his level, with no knowledge or teacher, or Newbie Village to guide him. Without a class, he struggles simply to survive in this world changed by its new connection to the Nexus.
But struggle he will, for he is Randidly Ghosthound, and this is only how his legend begins...
 
Cover credit to cthulupillar
 
**Author's Note**
This started as a way to destress and play with overly complicated stats systems and level systems, and I just kept writing. I don't really take it very seriously, but feel free to read and enjoy.

Title: Beneath the Depths (The Dungeon Master's Plight)
Synopsis:
"All right thats a wrap!  Please stand clear of the door!  Our gates won't open for another twnty four hours!"
"Damn! Are you telling me that only ten came down today?" 
"Aah, I was so hungry too..."
"I hope some adventurers escort a fat, ripe noble's son down here.  That would be the best..."
***
Locals called it the Dungeon of the Azure Depths.  I call it home.  A grisly one, filled with human gore, deathtraps, and my closest friends.  But I didn't choose the dungeon master life.  It chose me.  Or us, to be more specific.
I am one of the oldest of my people, the Scallian, and I remember how we came to live like hunted animals in the dark, wet recesses of this dungeon.  We were hunted, our entire race was almost wiped out by the weaker, sneakier humans.  And so this is my...Our revenge.  A deathtrap masquerading as a lost ruin.  Foolish, headstrong humans from the local guilds pour into my house in droves each and every day in search of treasure and the hearts of my brothers and sisters.  
Once they venture too far however, they never leave.  
I am the master...The Boss of this dungeon and I have been for hundreds of years.

Title: Ashes of Aria
Synopsis: Warmaidens. A warrior of immense power feared throughout the forest world of aria. With a war between the two largest empires and their swordmaidens unfolding what can one soldier do?

Title: In Pursuit of Glory
Synopsis:
I felt a huge physical force slam into my back. I didn't have any time to think as I rocketed into the wall and felt the drywall dent beneath my body. Eyes wide, I groaned and began to push off the wall when, unceasingly relentless, my assailant backstabbed me with a knife to my gut. I gasped; being stabbed there is no laughing matter. Even today, with all the advances of science, a wound like that can easily be mortal. Most likely would be. I gasped for air with a snarl, funneling the wind into my lungs to help them expand after being pancaked into the wall. Nobody f***ing backstabs me and gets away with it.
If there’s one thing you should know about me, it’s that I love being alive. I love it more than anything else. It’s something only a dead person can understand, and I feel myself forgetting all the time. But there’s a secret to death, and I keep it with me. Always. It’s never permanent, it’s never peaceful, and it’s always filled with regrets. But death, despite all of its shortfalls, can give a short respite from life, like a comfy afternoon nap. Death is Respite. It’s a rest for the weary. And to all those people who wander in death lonesome and regretting their broken lives - always, without fail, cut too short - I beg them to take advantage of it. I tell everyone to take advantage of death, even when I can’t bring myself to do so.
---
Ciaran travels the world in pursuit of Glories, unfathomable, power-bestowing balls of golden light sequestered in difficult-to-reach places. A fun fantasy romp with a character with an unorthodox narrative voice trying to find his purpose in the world.

Title: RE: Cultivator

While out meditating the hero of this long forgotten story finds a secret tome, from within which a great ancestor appears. Will this ancestor be able to aid our hero in finding his place within the world and advancing through the ranks until he can stand beside his friends as they also continue their journey onwards?
A journey fraught with many perils, dangerous tides, and vast amounts of treasure!

Title: Real Game
Synopsis:
(One Shot-3)
As the world was coming to an end...some stayed with their loved ones trying to enjoy their last moments, some went ahead partying or vandalizing and much worse since this was literally their last day on earth…alive!
A 28 years divorced man called Dan(Short for Daniel) was raiding a Dungun with some online friends in most popular virtual reality mmorpg called Real Game. Since most of his relatives live in different country and well going outside was not that safe since half the world has gone mental so he decided to go online and ....well it was a good idea when he logged in since almost all of his friends were online too at the time but once clearing the Dungun he said goodbye to them and went to a lake in middle of “Dark Forest of Evil” and just laid there closing his eyes waiting for the world to end...
As the timer he set for the worlds end...the estimated time he heard on news buzzed he opened his eyes and was shocked as he lay in a black room with tons of people besides him all looking like their gummer id's and on noticing how everything felt way too real and felling…well his own breath he tried to think what it could be and after years of reading such novels and such, A thought came to his mind and he almost shouted,
“For real?".

Title: Spectres & Skin: Exodus
Synopsis:
Imagine the look on everyone's faces when I tell them that I'm not the intended chosen one -- that the gods would never have picked a loser or an outsider like me -- I just happened to apply the right cheat code at the right time. And now I have to save the world.
 
When the biggest game developers on a dying Earth create their latest VRMMORPG, it takes on a life of its own. Impossible to control, and even harder to predict, the game world in Spectres & Skin is officially classed as a parallel universe, and people clamor to escape the horrors of overpopulation and pollution by moving over. 
 
Recent graduate Matthew Blake is down on his luck. A climbing accident has robbed him of the use of his legs, his best friend is better than him in every way, and he just cannot find a job. VR is his only escape from a life he can't stand. When he is invited to peek into the exclusive new game world, he can't resist. Is his luck about to change?
 
No. No it isn't. 
 
S&S: Exodus is a LitRPG novel, meaning it is extensively inspired by gaming mechanics and includes a lot of ‘behind the scenes’ calculations. It contains scenes of a graphic nature, permadeath, a really judgmental user interface, and a prophecy about two brothers that warns of the destruction of both universes -- and that's just week one.

Title: The Deal was beginning(Hiatus)
Synopsis: With kingdom at deaths door. And her loved ones falling one after another. She suffers and awaits her death. But does death has to be the End ? Bored Entity, powerful beyond reason, offers chance to make a Deal.

Title: Possibilities
Synopsis:
Have you ever wanted to forget something?
Have ever tried to forget something really hard?
What if you tried so hard that you actualy got your wish?

"Hello, my name is... Well, not like I can tell you. I only remember the meaning behind it. Vitality. Strength.I believe that I have none. But that is for you to decide."

Title: The Wizard's Tower
Synopsis: The world of Cyclalgia is in grave danger, after years of peace a Demon King was born in the western wastelands of the world and has unified the Demon Race. The Demon King having amassed his forces declared war against the Humanity and took over several Human Kingdoms. But as the Human Kingdom of Lor was facing this disaster a Hero suddenly emerged wielding a great holy sword. The hero fought back the Demon King’s army, and over time gathered powerful companions that would follow him into battle. But it wasn’t enough, no it was far from enough. The Human Kingdom of Lor was still in the midst of war after three whole years and they could hold on no longer. With no other choice, the Hero ventured out towards the neutral country of Ostea home to the fabled Wizard's Tower to seek the aid of the powerful Wizard within. It's just that things don't go exactly as you'd expect...

Title: Space slip
Synopsis: It's a story about young man with no memories finding himself in an empty room with a strange tattoo on his arm.

Title: Vermillion heart
Synopsis:
When they disappeared the dragons cried, their mortal enemies the Vermillion were gone, the Tytan's children had fled from this world. Did their return bring the dragons joy ? Nobody knows. But that doesn't change the fact that the children of the earth came back to their homeland. A new generation came and we will follow the hero of this generation, Apocalypse Vermillion, watch him become a legend even among the immortal dragons.
 
 
 
 
[As English isn't my first language could you kindly point the error if you see one, I will try to fix it if I can, thank you very much.]

Title: My Life As A RPG Game Monster!
Synopsis:
It had been 3 days since I died. I was Lucky they had me turned digital before my brain went dead but...
I lost my job since no one will hire a computer screen as a personal legal advisor as telling your dirty secrets to a computer sounds foolish and since release of "Artifical Attorney 2.4" trying to get hired as a prosecutor or such is hard even for the living!....Getting digitalized is costly and has taken every bit of saveing I had...
While I was still trying to get used to this life.I got contacted by my cousin who works in gameing industry and offered me a trail for a job at their game as a P.C.M(Player controled monster).Since I did like games and the offer looks good enough I accepted.
He said I will need to clear some test and and if I got in I will get at least a B grade programe for a house in game,that thing is more expensive than buying a real beach house!
I have heard the company he works for is quite famous at the moment but the one he offered me job for is a new one they recently released ....well I hope it works out fine!
 Author's note-This is fourth one shot....Just leave a positive rewive or comment if you think this one the right one!

Title: The Cybermanteum Exploits
Synopsis: A creator of a popular VR-MMO committing suicide and locking his players inside his own game would be frightening enough. But when a player is found dead from trauma that could only be acquired while he was in-game, authorities are forced to get involved. When Investigators are dispatched to the studio, what they find only narrrows their leads down to one perilous option. Sending an agent into the game to finish what they cannot in real life.

Title: Body and Soul
Synopsis:
The whole room is fully ablaze when the fire turns blue and even hotter. And I still keep my hands on the rune, ignoring the sizzling of my flesh. After a while I notice the blue, roaring flames on the other side of the window. At the edge of unconsciousness, I listen to the screams of people as they are taken by the Inferno.

Title: Empire of Souls
Synopsis:
Gods? Magic? Fantasy? Nonsense.
Ishmael never cared for any of those things. All that mattered was his work. The Tower of Babel.
This would prove it to everyone... that gods do not exist.
Until one day, it all came crashing down. His world destroyed, his life ended.
Thrust into a world of magic, where gods exist.
He will get his revenge. Rise, the 'Soul Eater', devourer of souls.
 
Now will only be uploaded on Webnovel, Empire of Souls

 

 
Cover art by Oracle of INKed Check here for a more clear picture: Soul Eater     or      Soul Eater

Title: Lost Genesis: Lied
Synopsis:
Lied cannot remember his past. As the sole bearer of the Adam's Apple, an ancient item capable of granting people's wishes, he's targeted by a mysterious organization while desperately trying to reclaim his memories. Through his perilous quest in search of the lost truth, Lied realizes there's more to everything than meets the eye... including himself. How will Lied survive, and what will he find at his destination?
Work originally written in Portuguese. Cover art by Yaya Chan.
I recommend reading the webtoon adaptation first.

Title: The Definition of Defiant
Synopsis:
In the popular virtul mmo, MINE, Tamuel Le, was just an ordinary gamer that was obessed with discovering a legend in the game. Playing with his in-game name as Litz, He finally discover the class of legend. But instead of finding what he aim for, he discovered something unexpected. He became a class of legend, but it was not what he wants as he started back to level one. Futhermore, he was now trapped alone in the world of MINE, where he have to survive back to his way the top. But this was much more than a game. With his every actions could change the balance of the world.
 
 
Disclaimer: I don't own the artwork

Title: The God Cheese Chase
Synopsis:
“It was the race of the century. Millions upon millions of participants lined up at the thousand miles long starting line. The tension and excitement permeated the air like a thick miasma. Even I was affected. Who am I you say? Why I am the world’s greatest adventurer. I have slain demons and gods, conquered the hardest dungeons, scaled the tallest mountains, and braved even the hottest deserts. They call me the devourer of the hidden, discoverer of secrets, and the destroyer of the unknown. For my name is Charles Brie, the only man who shall win this race!” After my grand monolog, my crew looked at me with awe. “Captain,” My first mate sighed. “We truly pity you and your delusions of grandeur.” And with that, the race that would decide the fate of all began.
 
(Cover art by DanP)

Title: Searching for Salvation
Synopsis:
Reincarnation is a tough thing to deal with, isn't it?
Especially when the new body is at the bottom of the food chain.
So, yes. This is Eff*ed up. So, very, thoroughly.
But wait.
There is a notification window? Is this- is this really a Eff*ing game?

Title: Cargo
Synopsis:
In the scorching desert heat, a spirited delivery man ventures into the vast emptiness, unaware of the horrifying fate that awaits him. With his present cargo tightly secured, he had no inkling that within its confines lay a mystery too grisly to comprehend. And then, as the cargo is unveiled, a ghastly truth is revealed – a man-eating beast, more sinister than any nightmare, lurks behind those timber slates. The desert becomes an arena of terror, where life and death hang in the balance.
Left trapped in a bone-chilling dilemma, his every move determines his own survival. The stakes had never been higher, and the desert bears witness to a harrowing battle for survival, as the hunter becomes the hunted, and fear carves its path amidst the arid wasteland.
This horror sci-fi story is part one of the series The Sell Outs.

Title: Alius
Synopsis: In a world where your genetics are practically random at birth, where races that are nearly indestinguishable fight to the death, a boy caught in the mix of chaos struggles to find an identitiy.

Title: Legends of The Worlds Gate
Synopsis:
The game 'Legends of The Worlds Gate' is a VRMMO, a full-dive immersion game. A player gains a rare skill, which launches his server of 'LOWG' into great change. When the skill was activated, all the 80,000 players who were playing the game were stuck into the world of 'LOWG.' Normally, players would care about leaving, looking for a chance to leave, no matter what they have to do. But one player thinks:
"Why leave? This place is much more fun than the real world."
Volume 1 (Ch. 0-17) - The World Through The Gate.
Volume 2 (Ch. 18-?) - The World Opposite The Gate.

You may also find this fiction on my website: Lonely Writing.

Title: The Girl Who Prays for Death
Synopsis:
Upon the summoning of heroes in an age old ceremony, a warm welcome was presented to the world travelers. Among the mages and bureaucratic officials stood Rosé, the makeshift leader assigned with the heroes and their training until they were reassigned.
 
The valedictorian of her class in the Military Academy of Linus, Rosé was expected to be represent the country of Linus in front of the heros.
However, Rosé, the adopted daughter of an infamous serial killer, had different ideas.

Title: Deal With The Devil [Dropped]
Synopsis: [I can give you anything you want. Wealth, Power, Talent or even Women and Riches ! The problem is what can you give me in return.] - The Devil  [...Power. I want power, enough to kill those who stand in my way with a single touch, enough to help me take my revenge !] - ???  [What about my payment ?] - The Devil  [What do you want ?] - ???  ..........  After making their contract, the young man quickly left while 'The Devil' still sat there on a stool, leisurely drinking the cheap scotch. She glanced at me with unfocused eyes and asked.  [What about you, kid ? Are you going to make a deal or not ? But before we continue, i must warn you, every action has consequences... Just like how everything has its price ! So be careful with what you wish for, kiddo.] - Finished, she stuffed the horrible drink down her throat in one gulp. Her body swayed left and right as if she was really drunk but i knew it was just an act. Looking at the woman before me, i wanted to resist but the temptation was too big ! My opened and closed my mouth for what seemed like eternity until finally i made up my mind... [Let's make a deal...] - That was how i met her/him... That was how i met my master, Abigail/Alistair also known as 'The Devil'.

Title: I Really Am An Internet Celebrity!
Synopsis: Vermillion was a normal 19 year old guy. There was nothing special about him, The only noticeable trait that he has is that he never thinks seriously and always thinks of jokes or sarcastic things that make people laugh! When his parents died they gave him enough money for him to live in comfort all his life. One day, Vermillion hears about a thing called Twitter. He got confused so he made an account on it. Inspired because of a dream he had, he vows to become an Internet Celebrity using all ways he can become one.

Title: Soulmates
Synopsis:
For as long as anyone can remember, every single person has a countdown on their wrist. It is a countdown until your meeting with your soulmate, a lot of people find their soulmate, but some dont. Follow a man who helps people find their soulmates.
 
Hi guys, so this is my first story and its going to be a short one. I'm not great at writing but i hope you enjoy, if you have something constructive to mention please leave a comment and i will do my best to read it and hopefully improve my writing.

Title: Realms: The amnesia potion
Synopsis:
[This story is a spin off of the Realms series that I might eventually write someday].
In a world where vampires remain unpersecuted by humanity and demons walk the lands with impunity, the masses of people live under injustice and suffering.
Having stumbled upon the secret formula for producing an amnesia potion by complete accident, our hero Brian stands to make enormous profits from selling those potions which have the potential of massively increasing vitae production.
Will he succeed in his business ventures or will he be caught and have the secret formula tortured out of him by vampires and demons? Find out in this exciting adventure of epic proportions!

Title: Drop of Blood
Synopsis:
*Photo is from Google. I'm still in the process of drawing one myself.
*First time writing, please be honest and give an insightful review.
 
       It is said that blood is the most powerful thing in the world.
       
       From past, present, and future.
 
        All of use our connected by our blood.
 
        Some would say blood is not special, it is an abundant source of commodity.
 
        Others, however, would have a different opinion.
 
         Be it rare or common it matters not.
 
         For they are not wrong, blood is simply blood.
 
         If one will not look deeper into blood and consider it different from the normality of the term "blood".

Title: The Vampire King
Synopsis:
What happens when the first vampire becomes toppled by his mortal servants and when he wakes up he is simply a legend of long ago, his empire turned to dust and his clan is ash.
Marcus the first of his kind cursed by the god kain the god of murder to walk the mortal realm until the world ends well he takes a liking to it and flourishes see him walk from a mere legend
To the truth behind the legend…
18+

Title: Unending Harvest
Synopsis:
A world where Darkness roams the land.
A world where the line of Light and Dark is blurred
A world where Gods are not truly gods
A world where 8 Demonic beasts manifested and wrecked havoc on the land
The Beasts were tamed and sealed inside promising children of each of the leading races.
And so the Harvesters were made, carrying the souls of the beasts inside them
All except 1 , the last one that could not be tamed, was sealed inside the infinite void
Yet no seal lasts forever
The time of reckoning shall soon arrive
So what kind of world would this be?
A broken world , which needs to be remade
But to make something, you must first destroy it
And so, the Unending Harvest shall begin.

Title: Destiny: Infernal [DISCONTINUED]
Synopsis:
Have you ever felt like you are the greatest outcast ever to exist?
As if someone, something out there, made you from the ground up in order to create the Ultimate Social Exile?
I have.
Too talented to be part of normal society.
Too dumb to be part of abnormal society.
This, is me. I am Alice Pendragon, a semi-insane, incredibly anti-social, nine year old noble girl in a world which seems to despise her.
School finally ended, summer's first day arrived... I should be happy, right?
And yet here I am, going back home just in time for my Fathers very own funeral.
...
And the dream which I'm about to have isn't going to help my sanity.
At all.
IMPORTANT: This story, like my EUPHORIA, will have highly erotic content. (No, there won't be any little girls having sex. The world in general will be sexually free.) Lemons will be made, but only later on in the story when the MC is older.
IMPORTANT X2: This story will need a cover picture! Any takers, please send me a PM if you're willing and able.
IMPORTANT X3: My stories are not rated 18. They are RATED MATURE ADULT. If you can't handle adult things, don't read the story. That said, if you've ever watched Family Guy and weren't offended by it, then you're probably mature enough for my stories.

Title: The Sword that Make
Synopsis: While riding a bus on her way to a certain stronghold, Mirel Maxwell, a respective soldier and a sword-nut, encounter a group of bandits that is stopping the trip. While intending to fight them, the man she was conversing earlier jump out and demonstrating the unique sword style he create - The Making Blade. Enchanted by it, she decided to followed him as her master, while they're travelling all over the place for an adventure.

Title: Infinite Thera
Synopsis:
Story Synopsis:
Wanting to escape a life full of monotony, Lucas caved in and joined his friends in playing a newly released virtual reality MMORPG. The game didn't fail his expectations, offering a level of realism that was above par compared to others. They didn't expect that they'd be trapped in an unknown world that is familiar and yet so unlike their own. The only way to return is to unravel the mysteries of this new world and unite with the Gods to push back the darkness engulfing it. The situation was met by protests from the players as they were placed in a situation they couldn't control. Before any of them could reject the request, another bomb was dropped on them. "If you don't save our world, your world will also perish."
 
Genre: Fantasy, LitRPG, Action, Comedy, Romance, Adventure, Drama, Strategy, Tragedy
Caution: Contains mild profanity.
