Title: Tales of a Modern Day Primordial
Synopsis:
{Synopsis to be changed}
In a broken universe lives a primordial soul. Throughout countless reincarnations, the soul has found its life to be boring. In its current life, it finds resolve. "I shall conquer the unknown and make the impossible reality," is the resolve it found. The soul discovers the mistakes the gods made in the universe, and in an attempt to fix the mistakes ends up dying. As a reward for fixing their mistakes, the gods allow the soul to move to a functioning universe as compensation. With a few gifts, the soul is sent off to be reborn again.
 
-Chapters will be rewritten at a later date. After I fully plan and make notes on this story and learn to write better.
To all, if any who still check on this story. I will be back eventually.

Title: Journey of a Skeleton (undergoing rewrite on different account)
Synopsis:
Alderon is a self-proclaimed genius skeleton, summoned from the first layer of the underworld by a mighty lich who seeks to destroy the world because of a broken engagement.
Happy to finally serve a worthy master, Alderon is expectant to brilliantly perform his duties.
However, due to various circumstances, he finds himself sent away to a castle in the eternal wastelands to serve one of the mighty lich's disciple's disciple. 
And to add on that, the skeleton also discovers himself having received a strange ability that causes blue boxes to appear from repetitive actions!

Title: Tiamatu
Synopsis:
A young man dies in a public riot, killed by the Lady of Spikes. In death, however, he retains his mind & continues to think & see as his next life begins.
Maybe he will conquer the world & find out it's darkest secrets.
Or maybe he shall just get stabbed in the ass by a goblin.
Only time will tell Dear Reader.
Only Time Will Tell.
 
Open your Eyes
See what cannot be seen,
Feel what can not be felt.
Watch through my eyes if you must.
But you must see.
 
 
This is my first LITRPG so bear with please ^^.

Title: Second Life
Synopsis: When William and his father are framed for treason and sentenced to death a bored cosmic being shows up and saves William.Granting him three gifts before reincarnating him into a new life William is left to seek revenge for the death of his family and to make the most of his new life.

Title: Riders - Silver streaks
Synopsis:
In a small country, in a small state, in a small village lived a boy who had a ridiculously long and weird name so everyone from his village would call him Selly. He was a hardworking kid. Born unlucky, he worked hard to stay alive in this world. Even without a familiar, he managed to get by doing odd-jobs and work no one else wanted to do, but now he has a familiar, and a very special one at that. Follow Selly and his familiar as they go about doing whatever they want, not really having a goal. Well, sometimes they stop to help out a damsel in distress or defeat some pirates. But that''s only for the money! Otherwise, they're doing whatever they want...
Wait. That also counts as doing something they want.

Title: Our Cosplay Became Real in Another World
Synopsis:
Ken and Armon went to their first anime convention with Lily, their writer friend who was going to particpate in a cosplay contest. There, Ken was forced into crossdressing as the heroine from Lily's novel "The Thunder Dragon's Flower", Lux Whitefall. His friend Armon was similarly cosplaying as Rai DragonHeart, the protagonist of the same novel. Together they won the contest while Lily also promoted her novels. However, none of them would've ever expected that as they were coming back to their hotel, the elevator would instead take them to another world where their cosplay was no longer a costume.
How did this happen? What was the purpose they came to this new world?
Come, follow Ken and his friends as they try to find out the answers to these questions.
***
I will only be writing this in my spare time. So releases may take a while.

Title: Gaming the Tower
Synopsis:
Danny, our intrepid hero was putting the finishing touches on the game he was creating when he finds himself in another dimension face to face with a monster from nightmares. Armed with new abilities, and little choice he sets out on the only path of salvation before him, Climbing and conquering the greatest interdeminsional challenge.
 
Welcome to the Tower.

Title: Shadow's Reach
Synopsis:
A youth plays a virtual reality game to escape the stresses of his final year of studies.  A young man that explores a new world, and finds surprising secrets lurking around every other corner.  Cosmos Gate, the game he plays, is not what it seems.  Can he save the world of Cosmos Gate from the impending disasters?
A strange beast fights to survive and to protect his clan.  Pushed into a position he was not prepared for, and forced to do things he has no confidence he can.  Can he save his people?  Can he lead them to a brighter tomorrow, free of the evils that are hunting them down?  
A young assistant helps an old Emperor with his daily tasks, but often finds himself spending all his time simply listening to the fantastical tales the old man loves to tell.  But there are undercurrents in the world of which neither are aware.  What will happen with the old man's tales, and what does it mean for the young assistant?
How far do the shadows reach?

Title: Paramnesia
Synopsis: A beautiful maiden who lost her way on a street in Tokyo as she found herself lying inside a telephone box without anything left - no belongings nor memories. A man came up to her and help her away from that state as she and the man solves mysteries connected to the memories of the lost maiden.

Title: Unitos
Synopsis: A sanctuary was built by the United Nations—funded by the remaining survivors and government of the World after the Third World Nuclear War. After all what humanity learned about the last war that took almost one third of the world population, is war still inevitable?

Title: Awakening of an Anomaly
Synopsis:
A looming threat approaches earth. It begins to assimile select groups of humans to be part of cruel subjects of experiements in order to produce the perfect soldier, and to be used against earth itself. 
Will it succeed or be stopped?

Title: Legend of the Undead Sovereign
Synopsis:
The heavens trembled for fear of his might, 
                                                             The earth shook in fear of provoking his anger, 
                                                             The immortals stood and fought...... till death, 
                                                             The gods fell, and lost their divinities to the abyss, 
                                                             The universe crumbled beyond repair, 
                                                             Regrets followed as did a river of blood...., 
                                                             All were judged under the supreme lord-THE UNDEAD SOVEREIGN!!!!!

Title: The Story Of Ash
Synopsis:
Ash is just your everyday 17 year old boy, Living in a small town in the middle of nowhere. Untill he walks up a mountain just outside his town, If you asked him why he always did the things he did, He would always reply with "Eh I was bored and thought it would make things lively". Well infact this time he was right when he found a small cave which when he entered a ancient voice was heard " If you free me I will grant you one wish". 
Will Ash free the ancient voice?
Does this voice have a body to go with it?
Will Ash ever find something to entertain him?
What would you wish for?
 
This is my first time ever writing and I have no confidence what so ever, But I still hope you come to like it.

Title: Imperial Mage of Earth and Fire
Synopsis:
Darren is one of an elite few who are selected to be envoys of his planet.
Except he isn't elite or selected. In fact, it is pure chance that Darren ends up taking part in what might be the most important even he has ever participated in. 
Now Darren needs to learn how to live with the consequences of his actions, his carelessness and his good luck.
But before he can learn how to live, he must learn how to survive in the new world which he finds himself in.

Title: The Beast's Way of Ascent
Synopsis:
Light. 
A blinding light filled the night sky.
A star had descended.The power had surged.
The cultivation world shook. Cultivators flew into the sky, mortals gazed and pondered why.
Booming sound echoed throughout the nations and land.The shut-in ancestors ended their isolation, making their stand. Knowing why, they led their sects and elite followers into the sky.
The order had been made.The offer had been placed.
The temptation was too great to pass by.Even the most patience could not deny.
At the same time, a boy on a beach clasped his hands, praying upon the Owner of the Way.At the moment, a pair of eyes in the ocean gazed the falling star, soon making its way.
What was their wish? Will fate bound them?
Where will it lead them, Ascension, or Destruction?
Tags: Moderate Xianxia.
=================
On hiatus for now. Too many projects. Sorry.

Title: Dawnbreak
Synopsis:
'The world is said to be cruel.I sometimes wonder.Maybe, maybe the world isn't as cruel as everyone says, including myself.'Hall stares across the meadow, feeling apprehensive, then shakes his head, smiles and moves forward.
"Gotta keep going anyway, everyone will be waiting"

Title: The Noob Squad
Synopsis:
Rising high school sophomore Daryl worked hard all year and half the summer to buy his very first immersion VR gaming system.
The World of Galgalax isn't the premier total immersion VR world on the market, but it's what he can afford, so he's excited to be there. That is until he discovers that the world full of magic and fancy is also not so nice. 
Groups of players called noob stalkers take advantage of loose griefer enforcement and go around killing noobs just for fun and a little extra XP.
When, at level three, Daryl is attacked by two higher-level characters, he considers quitting the game.
But Daryl suddenly finds a group of players who don't take kindly to bullies. They call themselves the Noob Squad, and they fight the good fight.

Title: The Will of the Dead
Synopsis:
Have you ever felt true despair? The need to just not exist anymore?
Then you too know the Cruelty of the World and the Edge of Madness.
Thorin — a pickpocket in Athros city — was taken to that edge, teetering on the borders of sanity. He took the odds and embraced the disdain for the society that pushed him over, letting the deep-seated hatred burn up inside him. He chose to take revenge but, to do so, he needed power. His quest for strength found him gripping the same thing he shied away from — death itself. Using the unholy powers of Necromancy, he became an enemy to all that lives, a force against the nature itself. And nothing shall stand in his way.
Welcome to the story a young man who died while alive.
Welcome to a story about becoming the master of all.
Welcome to The Will of the Dead.
 
Hi this is a semi rewrite of my previous novel The Will of the Strong. Beginning is a little slow but it will pick up pace by chap 4-5
Also skip chapter 6 if you do not enjoy graphic material.
Thanks for reading,
Danjor

Title: I Became A MOBA Character
Synopsis:
Massive Online Battle Arena - a genre of video game wherein you team up with other players and battle it out with another team, in a race on who can complete the objective first. Using tactics and pure skills alone, the genre managed to capture the hearts of many fans across the globe.
 
I, Vincent dela Cruz, am one of those that became a helpless slave to this genre. Who would have thought that I'd die unexpectedly and get resurrected in a MOBA-like world?
 
This is the tale of how I, a normal teenager without any dreams whatsoever, became the SPOILER ALERT! greatest hero of all time! Hell yeah!

Title: The Evolution of a Snake
Synopsis: Snakes, they bring forth a primordial dread in many, and awe in others. Sometimes they are depicted as evil tricksters with honeyed tongues, others as monsters devouring all they can, and sometimes as protectors guarding treasures or even gods. What way will a freshly hatched snake go? Will it become a glibb-toungued deciever, tricking prey into its mouth or maybe it will become feared even amongst monsters. Perhaps it will become a protector guarding hordes of treasure from intruders. Watch as its story unfolds.... Unless of course it gets eaten before that.

Title: Fahliil Dovah-Rah
Synopsis:
The world of Lah-Ahrk-Zahkrii is a world of sword and magic.
A world full of adventure for those with courage and bravure.
A world full of riches for those that want to live a blissfull life.
But, beware because this world is not kind, neither merciful.
If you want to go on adventures, adquire riches and conquer beauties, you need to be strong, for only the strong have what it takes to get all of this and not lose it.
This world also on the verge of a war between races and beliefs.
Who is right? And who is wrong? Only the strong can tell, after all...
''The winner is the king, and the loser is the thief.''
---------------------------------------------------------------
Be warned for the Mc shall be bisexual and there will also be incestuous relationships and maybe,  just maybe rape.

Title: 21st Century Lads
Synopsis: Getting summoned to a new world of magic and demons and monsters sounds pretty fucking awesome and just like many of the fictions Drake had read they're summoned as heroes. But a) why the fuck would they want to be heroes and b) they aren't exactly the most heroic people either so that kind of job spec isn't for them...at all. But there is one thing that tickles their fancies in this new world and like any good lad, they listen to their dicks, hards...hearts, hearts of course.

Title: Once they were gamers (One Shot)
Synopsis: This is a story of the last day a group of gamers played their favorite game... and how they end it with a bang!

Title: Primal Gaming: The Murder of Timothy Smithton: Part Two
Synopsis:
Detective Shaun Winter knew the stakes when going in. He knew that he'd have to adapt to his new surroundings. He knew that he'd have to play the game. What he didn't know was that he'd have to do something he hasn't been forced to do in a long time.
Feel.
A day has passed and Shaun has a lead, an in with the Aceto Crime Family, and something new has been added to the list of reasons why he has to solve the case.
With the restriction of who and who cannot be on the case with Laura and Shaun, they're finally able to have Detective Louis Anders help them out, or at the very least act as the emotional buffer that Shaun needs to function around Laura.
The game's changing, and Shaun's in the thick of a fast growing criminal empire with nothing but a few ones and zeroes to keep him safe.
More sex, more awkward introvert, do you really need a third thing?

Title: The Demon
Synopsis: Kirato go home after fighting and lost but he has always turned to become a great fighter to respect in his city that guys scream his name that makes the eyes lower the respect * so when a demon makes him an offer He says ...

Title: The Magical Textbooks of Eliya
Synopsis:
The world of Eliya is one filled with magic, mythical creatures, demons, and a lot of different races. This is the books that documents and teaches young people of Eliya. Through the experiences of adventures from all kinds, these books are written from views of grand mages to the best assassins and the best treasure hunters. Lets learn about the kingdoms, the history of its wars, the magic, the how, the why and the whom. 
 
Author: I always wanted to write a textbook style story, where you learn the world as if you were a traveler from another world, or if you were just a child from this world learning about well.. the world. 
I enjoy reading how a person gets transfered or teleported into a new place, how they learn and discover magic, expand their view on the world they just arrived in. I want you to experience what that person, that character in the story experience. 
Please read this as if you were a person who was just transported into the world of Eliya. Each "Book" explains this world, how it works, their systems, and the many major wars and events that transpire.The early chapters will be introductions while later on will be stories from adventurers and tales told from a bar etc. Thanks for reading, any feedback, reviews, seeing any loopholes, wrong grammer, wrong spelling. I am all ears :) thanks! 
Feel free to use any references for your own stories.

Title: Aether
Synopsis:
Summer, the legendary flame swordsman
Winter, a scholar with the power of ice
Autumn, a sentient land shark
All reincarnate in a single body

Title: Into the Black
Synopsis:
The first truly immersive Virtual Reality system has just been announced. Made by NERV, the EVA-series immersion pods promise a Better Than Life experience, unlike anything that's been seen before. Gone are clunky goggles and wired controls. Now you simply lie down, and the machine does all the work.
 
Following up on their previous hit games, NERV has created the first true VRMMORPG, a sci-fi offering called Dreams Amongst the Stars. Because of the impressive display he made during the closed Beta of the game, one player has been offered a contract as a paid streamer, and the chance to play the game on the highest difficulty possible. Watch as he forges his own path, into the black.

Title: Magical Lands of Liadria
Synopsis:
Beyond the boundary of reality lies imagination. Beyond the possible lies the impossible. And yet, there is a place where dreams can become true. A world of magic, where dragons fly without restraints and magical beasts roam all known lands.
Kingdoms rise and fall as magical races fight for supremacy. Inspired by the ongoing conflicts, young sorcerers embark on adventures for fame and glory. The strong are praised and feared. The weak are preyed upon and forgotten.
Disinterested from all this, is a young magus living in the remote town of Brady. Unlike his fellow magi, he only seeks to live a luxurious life, awaiting the opportunity for treasure hunting to finally present itself.
 
Tags:
Fantasy, Magic, Comedy, Action, Adventure, Drama
[This novel was an experiment, which as you can see, it didn't work out that well. Hence, this novel is being put on hold indefinitely. Another similar novel with a different style is planned for the future and will be replacing this.]

Title: In a world one piece different
The Elementals
Synopsis: Tarah and several other Elementals are fleeing the Government. Having Elementals that are each others weakness it can be hard for some of them to get a long, but in order to defeat the Gorvernment they need to over come their weakness and work together. Will they ever overcome their weakness? Will there ever be peace for the Elementals? Or will their cause end in vain? Read this book to find out.

Title: virtus historiae
Synopsis: A boy, not even the age of seven, was found under a dim lit bridge. The man who discovered him was the leader of an infamous gang on west coast of the United Sates of America. This boy never had a family in his entire life and he has found in this gang, a family that only death can separate. He will do anything for his family, even if that means starting a gang war that can rattle the entire world.

Title: Defy Fate, Reach the Heavens, Discover the Truth
Synopsis:
A world of gods and legends.
Where the strong eat the weak and are eaten by the stronger.
A world where the weak can blame only themselves.
Where geniuses are as many as stars in the sky and get swatted down like flies.
A world where glory awaits the valiant.
Where heroes stand above the people and scream their defiance to the heavens.
That is the world I saw when I opened my eyes.
That is the world I will I will one day rule.
That is the world I live in now.
 
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------
A story about two best friends who are avid readers of online fiction. When one day while on the way to school the sky rips asunder, destroying the small town they came from, except for a small epicenter of 10 meters, wherein Jason and Chris found themselves.
After an amazing and terrible series of events, our heroes find themselves in a new world with no one, but themselves, to rely on, with ambitions to defy fate itself.

Title: Timeless Cheater
Synopsis:
There are times when Mahala, a average Asian male 17 years of age, wishes that he is above all existence. It's not that he loath humans or hate his normal life of, sleep, eat, toilet break, school, games, and then sleep again, no he's just very very curious of what is feels like to hold that kind of power.
He is not power hungry, just curious. He prayed day and night to an almighty being for he is an atheist, to let him wield that kind of power but confine him in a space to let him learn all of it first before releasing him back.
What Mahala, didn't know is that the almighty  being did hear his prayer and his wishes. However, it will comes back to bite at him because he will be confine in a grass field where he can do what ever he wants for 300 billions years...
 
Note: I did not drew the cover, my niece did it for fun and uh it came out pretty well right? Anyway enjoy reading.

Title: The Vorpal Prophecy
Synopsis:
Alice Liddell returns from yet another journey from the Otherlands. Although still recovering from the pain of her past, a revelation has served as a catalyst to further either her growth or her destruction. Enrolled at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, Alice is prophesied as a hero that will save the world from the impending doom in the near future, prophesied to save reality through saving someone's Wonderland. 
Alice Liddell is the key of the prophecy, and her madness will save everyone's sanity. 
 
an Alice: Madness Returns X Harry Potter crossover fanfiction

Title: Rapture Resurrection: The Manifestation of Sin
Synopsis:
Alex spends his free time imaging doomsday scenarios with his friends and what it'll be like to be in one. However, he soon finds himself in a possible doomsday-like scenario: There's a sudden outbreak of an unknown virus the government is trying to cover up. As Alex and his friends feel the ripple effects of the outbreak, they prepare as best as they can to confront the end of the world. Will they die or adapt? Find out by reading!
Author's Note: I'd like to make this story reader interactive so if you ever have suggestions for characters or world building, please leave a comment! I'll try to be as flexible as I can while keeping keeping the laws of the world as consistent as possible. If you notice any inconsistencies (characters, world logic, etc), please send me a message! The earlier it is fixed, the easier it will be to keep the story consistent and fun for everyone.

Title: The Strongest Soul
Synopsis:
This universe is overrun with corruption and children are forced to become warriors for a malicious group. This group runs deep and controls multiple universes. They are extremely powerful and are a force to be reckoned with. Follow as Kain grows to single handedly destroys this organization thoroughly with his own power.
 
This is a second novel I'm writing so that I can diverge from my original novel. Thus, this won't be released often.

Title: Golden Age of Exploration
Synopsis:
A genius at the age of 8 and a high school dropout at 12. Peter A. Boffrick is a man who stands above the many. A successful company owner at the age of 13 and a billionaire at 15. Peter sets plans in motion for the future, for his dream. A dream to explore the very stars themselves! What he doesn't know is he may have bit off a bit more than he can handle. He's discovered a secret of the Universe itself that sets in motion events he could of never foretold.
 
 
______________________________________________________________________________________________
This is my first story ever. Writing just for fun. Chapters will be out when I feel like it. Sorry. Am a native born English Speaker. I would like to think i'm somewhat decent at the English language so hopefully it's readable.

Title: Ashborne Mercenary
Synopsis: Hammett Brinon born in the Town of Ashborne works as a mercenary since his family was slaughtered along with the rest of the town he was born in. Ashborne was a peaceful town only getting into small skirmishes with the local bandits. none of the neighboring Empires bothered to siege considering the land the town was built on held no valuable resources. One day the peaceful town was slaughtered and sieged by a vampire lord and his undead legions.

Title: Rebirth
Synopsis: The waging war between Goddess Loraine and the foreign powers known as Corruption has long plagued the world over their 1000 years of strife. With the Old Hero lost by the hands of Corruption, there needs to be another to pick up where the last left off and save the world from destruction. This person is none other than Cyril--a young man thrown into a world of the unknown and named as the next Hero, but this world isn't as it seems.

Title: Core .001
Synopsis:
This is a story of Shiro, a 12 year old girl who wished to adventure around the world. Only to end up in an untimely death. When she wakes up, she finds herself in what seems to be a new world, and her body has changed to that of a catkin. Using her knowledge from knowing literature of people in similar situations and adventuring, she tries to make a place for herself in this new world. Only to find out that reality is far crueler than one would imagine. Even with what one would call an OP unique skill and other OP advantages, she finds things quickly fall apart regardless how hard she tries. Thus she seeks more and more power to not only survive, but to protect what is important to her.
Unbeknownst to her though, lies within her an ancient power time primordial. A power so vast it can bring anything to its knees. This ancient power can easily be unlocked with just one sentence, but this sentence shall never be spoken. Instead, Shiro will embark on a new path to gaining a new different kind of power as she moves forward in this new world.
WARNING: The first few volumes will have tragedy, which will disappear at around Volume 5 or 6. From then on it will be just pure OP-ness and having fun.
While I personally like OP characters and don’t like tragedies myself, I think it is unrealistic that a person goes to an unknown and everything just magically go their way via plot armor. So I wanted to build up a more realistic OP reincarnation novel where MC struggles through a new world regardless of their advantages due to gaps in knowledge (despite how prepared she was) and simply not having enough strength at the time.
 
-------------------------------------------
This is my first poor attempt at a story.  I read a lot of novels overall and was in the mood to see how well I can write one. Expect a lot of mistakes here and there as I am pretty new to writing.
Releases should be about 2 times a week(changed due to chapter size pretty much doubling) unless stated otherwise or inbetween volumes.
I will at least commit to finishing the volume I am on (Nothing worse than a story being cut off mid story).
So give me your comments what you think. I don't mind if the comments are bad and etc. Just lay off the grammar nazi (My only weakness)

Title: How to Kill a God
Synopsis:
Francis didn't want any part of this. All he wanted was to live out his mundane life in peace, free from any trials or tribulations.  Yet, without any warning or indication, he is whisked across the cosmos and forced to fight in a war that is not his own. Impossibly far from his family, his friends, and the life he once loved, Francis marches on. The Auldre is an incredibly ancient and powerful entity that, for seemingly petty reasons, is left to rot in an extradimensional prison. By accidentaly freeing the Auldre from his cosmic prison, Francis sets in motion events that threaten not only the peace he so longlingly desires, but the Cosmic Order that allows for the notion of peace to exist.
I thought I'd try my hand at LitRPG, with a slight twist. Don't be shy, criticize. Don't be afraid to give me suggestions and point out typos/plot holes. Trust me, it hurts me more to be ignorant than to read a few snarky comments about me forgetting a character's name. Enjoy.
 
-Ctan

Title: World of Realms
Synopsis:
Nikolas Lightion was someone with no talent. Everyone laughed at him all the time but also despised his existence. All because he was the successor of a legendary clan, very powerful and known in his city. His entire family died fighting against a massive invasion of Demon Beasts, but they defeated the deadliest one.
After seeing with his own eyes how everyone died, a strong feeling started to grow inside of him. It was a very hard childhood, but in the end, he managed to make some friends.
A few years later, another invasion took place. It was huge, and the city went into chaos. Once again, he saw how his loved ones died in front of him without being able to do anything to help them or save them. The city collapsed, an entire life of running, hiding and leaving hope behind.
Then, he started to travel across the Realms trying to get stronger. Even after making new friendships he became a cold person doing everything by himself.
There was an evil sect known as the Dark Brotherhood, and it was because of them that he lost everything. He wanted revenge and went all out. Then, he realized the truth behind the old legends. The Supreme Sage was the one who created the Brotherhood, a human self-proclaimed as God.
It was a calamity and the enemy of life itself. In the past, the Supreme Sage was sealed by some experts more than once, but now, it's stronger than ever before. Nikolas Lightion tried to face him, but he wasn't good enough to deal with him.
In the verge of death, his soul went crazy. A strong feeling of regret started to overwhelm his mind, failure after failure, it was hard to accept defeat.
All he needs is one more chance, just one more!

Title: Kaminoa
Synopsis:
A number decides what you can do. A number decides where you live. A number decides when you die.
Kaminoa is a cyberpunk novel set in a bleak, corporate-controlled society where citizens are entitled to a universal basic income and the opportunity to lower their number through corporate work. Each week, the corporations cull the population of citizens with a score above 100.
Michael Hull is a struggling citizen working hard to improve his family's situation. With his wife, Vivian, expecting a child soon, and rapidly rising scores as the result of a city-wide depression, Michael is desperate for options. When Michael's friend finds a powerful zero-day vulnerability in the Corporate Mainframe, Michael will face difficult decisions to save his family from an increasingly dangerous situation.

Title: Elbard's Uproar(Dropped)
Synopsis:
Virvid body is ruined by infinite scars. Since childhood, she gave her all mastering the spear, all for this one hunt: The hunt of Three Years. The Hunt means opportunity; Do well, and weapons, enchanted stones, anything can be yours. Do best and you’ll get to join the future elite, or so they say...
Never before has Virvid been so 'close' to earn the recognition of the elders, never before has she been so 'close' to glimpse at the ancient manuals. But is ‘close’ close enough? Where do all the scars come from anyways, and was Virvid ever meant to reach the promised glory or is she just a pawn of a game, a game of those with true power?
Virvid and her friends, Elbard and Renald, travels together, seeking fights, meaning and truth.
________________________________________________________
Wohoo! The new story has begun. I feel a bit nervous about it, the MCs will lack control and some fundamental knowledge early on. It might put some off, but I had this idea for a beginning that would be useless later on. I personally hate-love blue boxes. I want to make progress tangible, but not with a "system" making up for the plot. Hopefully you'll be satisfied.
 
note: 18+ Disturbing scenes might occur.

Title: Playing with Opness!
Synopsis: A young man gets granted Op-ness and is sent to one of his favorite movie’s world. What would he do now that he acquired such power? Would he go down to the dark side of the force? Or will he be as heavenly as Mt.Tai? Or none of the others and would just be a hypocrite of a character? Who knows, but we shall see.

Title: THE HISTORY OF MY NAME
Synopsis:
What would you do if you ever found out that you're different? That you're an existence that shoulnd't exist? Would you change? Or would you simply embrace it? 
Follow Sauce as the nature itself denies his existence and even the world deems him as an anomaly.
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
I am not a writer. This short story is purely written for my own amusement, entertainement, and a solution to waste time while waiting for my favorite fic to update.

Title: My life is ruled by my character stats
Synopsis:
Have you ever dreamed of being in a video game? Well this is the story and adventure of a person who actually got that chance. That very same person ended up being so obsessed over his stats that he will do whatever he can to increase them and become the strongest man alive.
In his obsession to reach the top he will fight monsters, gain levels, fight more monsters, gain even more levels, and you know what he will do next? He will fight monsters again! 
Not every step along the way is him grinding for levels. Along the way he will be dragged into an unwanted scenario to save a poor girl that has been kidnapped by goblins. Once he got to the girl though, he finds out that the girl has already killed all of the goblins! Who on earth is she?!

Title: Sorcery in Boston
Synopsis:
The timid daughter of some of the greatest spellcasters ever to have lived has found herself in another world, courtesy of magic gone awry. In Boston, Massachusetts, in the year 1935, she finds some kind souls in a hard era. In the heart of the Great Depression, as war looms around the corner, she seeks to find her place, and must come to terms with both who she is and what she truly desires.
 
Author's Notes:
This story is "complete," but I learned a great deal in the writing of it and feel it needs a massive overhaul. One day, I'd like to do so, but considering it's been years, probably not anytime soon. I'd originally wanted to do a second book, but my list of stories that I want to write is pretty extensive, so I'm not sure when, or even if, I'll do so.
Audience: This story is not for children - it contains some profanity, explicit sexual content, violence, gore, and significant adult themes. Most of these are handled delicately enough not to upset teens or adults (hopefully), as well as the graphic sexual content being skippable, hence the lack of relevant tags, but it is nonetheless unsuitable for youth. It's fairly slow paced, and focused on the development of very human, very flawed individuals.
Draft 1: Please be aware that this is first draft material. I do intend to eventually rework the whole thing, as mentioned above. If anyone notices any issues whatsoever with the story, please let me know (comments, dm, etc) so that I can improve the next version.
Writer's Pledge: I've taken the Writer's Pledge, meaning I had committed to completing this story. Which I have done! :D
Behind the Scenes notes:
This picture was commissioned from an inked artist by the name of DanP.
Up until the time of the protagonist's arrival, history has proceeded as before. Some places and characters have been borrowed from wikipedia entries of interesting figures from the time. I will make note in the chapter comments when such things come up. Naturally, I've taken a great deal of liberty with them.
In interest of respecting individuals, I've either attempted to portray them as accurately as possible, or modified them sufficiently enough that they're simply an inspiration, instead of a real portrayal. I've attempted to be as accurate to the era as possible, but I'm not a historian. If you're aware of inaccuracies, please, bring them to my attention so that I can correct them.

Title: world of Drake
Synopsis:
The world has suddenly change
The god has, New races and mana
the new god chose not to help humanity and even took away any technology up to the middivel period.
how will our normal college student survive.
hi guys this is my 4th story on rotalroad and I have droped my other 2 storys and am thinking of bring back the 3rd on.

Title: The Man of No Words.
Synopsis:
They call him the Man of No Words. Said to haunt the halls of night and breath the wisps of spirits from the sleeping. No one knows his true name nor do they care for it. Spoken in the same sentences as some of the foulest names in all the world. 
The Man of No Words sought out the only hope he could in a friend of long before to tell his tale and leave nothing for the imagination.
 
P.S I will update this story once a week every Friday. Depending on circumstances in real life I may be able to push out two chapter a week. Thank you.

Title: The wolf will [Dropped]
Synopsis:
Keiz found himself in a classic reincarnation topic and he has to choose his destiny.
[Fairy tail fanfiction, times will be related with the history and other times not.
I will write it if i feel it and you want it, first novel i accept any critic and recommendation]
*WARNING: this history can contain spoilers about fairy tail*
[Dropped]

Title: Enter the System
Synopsis:
A system set up by failing gods to help the lower dimensions survive the onslaught that will one day befall them. A boy that will grind to become as strong as he can. The message was clear, get stronger or your world will fall, the clock is ticking and monsters are spawning!
 
Sorry first try at writing so it may not be that great, would appreciate constructing critics! Not sure what genres it will fully take but il click a few anyways ;) it will most likely have a semi OP MC so if you dont like that kind of story I apolagize in advance! I doubt there will be much romance, will be Litrpg, fantasy, magic, adventure mostly i think.
If you have any interesting ideas feel free to through them out there and i will try to take some under advisement if i like them of course :D
I would use blue boxes but they seem complicated and annoying to set up without someone showing you how, so i may add them at a later date, for now you will have to settle for bold letters for those kinda things <.< let me know what you think about the direction the book is going in a review, i dont have a schedule at the moment so letting me know what you think may help me solidify something!

Title: I'm the 73rd demon
Synopsis: This is a story of a man chosen as the 73rd demon. Will he stay human or live his life as a demon.

Title: The Priest Who Went Against God
Synopsis:
In the world of Arkon, Lived a young boy named lucas who has a very normal dream like many kids his age, To become a Priest of the church who are said to be one with god, and help defeat the evil that lurks in the night, Like the ever so present vampires and the other evils.
Can lucas follow his childhood dream and become a priest, And will it be everything he wanted?  Or will the church's motto "To go against the church is to go against god" be the first clue into the dark side of the church and change the way Lucas looks at the world.
Follow Lucas' adventure through the world of Arkon, where he will learn how to fight and live, When to be strong and when to run away. He will met some friends and enemies. But it will be his life to live on whichever path he wants.

Title: A Tingle Later: A Different Kind of Hero Tale
Synopsis:
A classic tale of a summoned hero.A classic tale of defeating the evil demon lord.
...but what if the demon lord loved peace? What if the demon lord didn't  know he was supposedly gathering an army to invade other lands, until one of his loyal subjects told him about a rumour like that circulating around in their capital and causing panick about a summoned hero within the public?What is a demon lord to do?
Meet the Hero: the alpha bitch clarinetistMeet the Demon Lord: the nerdy mathematician
A start of a very unlikely tale.

Title: Orange you glad to see this berry app(l)e-aling novel, it might even be pear-fect.
Synopsis:
Once there was Watermelon.
He was handsome, cool and smart.
His (probably) taste was delectable and juicy.
And got loads of girls.

Title: Memoirs Of A Withered Flower
Synopsis: The hotshot business tycoon Alex D'Cruz loses everything when he gets diagnosed with stage 4 Mesothelioma. He goes into depression and drinking. See how his life turns around during one stormy night.

Title: Rebellion Hero
Synopsis:
Getting run over by a truck is Max Loress, a man with no talent whatsoever except unlocking the hidden potential of others.
Surprisingly instead of seeing hell or heaven he finds himself looking at his new parents. God has given him a new chance for a life in a world filled with superpower users. 
That world is ruled with an iron fist, by an organization called ''The Kingdom''. It is up to him to free this world from the tyrannical rule of The Kingdom.

Title: a superhuman family in another the world?
Synopsis:
Well, the title say everything. There's only one tiny detail though. It's League of Legend system (a famous MOBA game). At least read the prologue if you find the synopsis not enough
------------------------------------------------
Since I'm focusing on another project (http://royalroadl.com/fiction/10968) so no release schedule promise here (not that I have one for the other story either)

Title: Nine Stars
Synopsis: Abandoned at birth, Dante grew up in an orphanage in a small village. Everyone was family to him and he was taught to be fair and just. One night it was believed that he had been chosen by the Gods as part of a prophecy, yet Dante was denied the right by the Holy Star Kingdom. Charged as a liar, he was imprisoned. However, during a prison riot Dante was able to escape only to find out that everything he cherished was gone. Having lost everything, he seeks out vengence against those that wronged him. And the Gods were no exception.

Title: The Night Walk
Synopsis:
A leash in a hand, a cigarette in the other, I walk my dog at night through empty streets and a park.
Sometimes, during those walks, I meet people.
Crazy people, sad people, drunk people, happy people, high people, people with a story to tell.
Just a few minutes, a few words and a passerby can become a memory.
 
Those are the stories of those encounters.
 
WARNING: for the privacy of the people present in these stories names, dates and locations won't be disclosed. The stories aren't in chronological order, they could have happened years ago or the night before I posted them.

Title: I, a Water Snail, accompanying the Immortal Hero
Synopsis:
[Story on hiatus, slated to be rewritten]
 
A love story between a boy and his pet(?) snail.  Pipin, a 100,000 year old immortal god, is certain that Su Yulin is destined for greatness. But, where are his otherworldly treasures? His heavenly chakra? His immortal mentor who will teach him the secrets of godly cultivation? Hey, Fates, what are you doing! If you won't step in, then it's up to this snail to accompany him to immortality!
-------
I, a Water Snail, accompanying the Immortal Hero is a xuanhuan-inspired story following the adventures of Su Yulin, your typical silent and hardworking MC, and his unexpected #1 fan and stalker, the sheltered snail god Pipin. Features worldbuilding, adventure, character development, and slow-burn romance.

Title: A Vorrgistadt Shard - The Shattered Oracle
Synopsis:
Before the deciever — Zerranistra — released the dark ones.Before the Great Cataclysm tore the world asunder. Before the fall of the Hoelatha Empire sent the world into barbarity.
There was a time where hope still flourished, and the end times were only distant storms on the horizon.When great oracles pierced through time and space to uncover the hidden secrets of the world.When artificers of renown created enchanted weapons and tools that gave every person in the world the power of magic.
This is when that time ended. This is the story of Maenthrai, the last oracle and daughter of a monster. This is the story of Merithault, a powerful oracle who would become the greatest threat that the world of Aelth Myrris has ever seen.This is the origins of the blood curse that would lead to countless deaths at the hand of a lich-queen.This is where everything with the world went wrong.
This is where the story of the Vorrgistadt Saga starts.

Title: Hero
Synopsis:
I am not a hero. I do not stand for justice nor do I protect the weak.
I am a [Hero]. Fighting evil and guarding the world is my duty.
I am a [Hero] and so I stand against darkness.
I am a [Hero] and so I march towards impending doom.
I am a [Hero] and so I triumph.
Against all foes. Against all odds. Against fate itself if need be. I shall emerge victorious.
Because while I may not be a hero, I am a [Hero]. And victory is my duty.
Read full chapters at kobatochan.com/original-works/hero
Oh and if you like the story, leaving a rating on RRL would help.

Title: Naruto Fans In Another World
Synopsis: A god came to Earth on vacation and got hooked on anime. He asked himself "Why doesn’t my world have ninja's" So, he decide to make a game based of Naruto were the player can create their own Ninja come up with their own Ninjutsu even be given a Kekegenkai Like the Sharringuan Byuakugaun or something completely new. This is where our story begins a boy named Jordan a Naruto fan and gamer hears about this game and decide to play it. He was making his character when his little brother pulled a prank on him making his character a girl. Not only that you can't change it once it is created. Jordan hesitantly decide to play as girl and clear the game with his friends. Once they clear it they are teleported to another world. Magic and Myth, Monsters, and Demons. Lucky for them they transform into their character and have become Shinobi with all their powers from the game. Unluckily for Jordan he transformed into a girl. Will these new generation Shinobi survive in another world? Jordan or now Shigure Mizuki does not know, but she knows one thing she will follow her own ninja way

Title: Shattered Reality
Synopsis: What would you do if you were the last human inexistence and that too stuck in a simulated reality. So join this boy on his adventures as he finds others and they make their way to the place they will call home.

Title: Summoned: Looking for Fragments
Synopsis:
Summoned to another world.
Summoned to be Saviours or Heroes.
Trained to wield Blades and Magic.
To prepare for the ascesion of the Demon Lord.
 
One youth knew, the Summoner was lying.
His goal; to find a path to Earth. 
To return all of the summoned people back.
So they wont be used as weapons.
 
 
 
 
 
 
Note:
Im an amateur and a noob. I like stories and fantasy.
please be gentle.

Title: The Summoned - Complete
Synopsis:
In a world of magic, ruled by many warring races, the human kingdoms are being pushed to the brink of collapse. In a desperate bid to gain the strength to stand on an equal footing with the other nations, they perform a forbidden ritual to summon combat slaves from another dimension.
Unluckily for them, Mors Letus, recently named by their world's God of Death, was one of them. 
**** Warning ****
This is a re-release (The Summoned) of the first book I wrote in partnership with my brother (who later forced the story to be pulled (It was released on his account here)).
I have started writing my own version of the story (BOM: The Summoned) and will continue to primarily invest in that, though, now I have permission to re-release this one, I plan finish this as I have the drafts and it was close to the end of the first book.
Many characters/scenes and events match/Will match BOM: The Summoned, especially in future arc's (Past Flatner forest). If you don't like spoilers, don't want to get confused between the two stories or hate first attempts at writing (god awful grammar/sentence structure and storytelling), I would advise against reading.

Title: Forward is The Day
Synopsis:
Sometimes the world is cruel, but people are crueler, and the gods they can be the cruelest of all. 
Everything comes with a price. So how much is a second chance worth to you?
He was trapped to begin with, a game the gods would play, to stretch over milenia, a single piece on an evershifting board. Just like everyone else. Until a God made a decision, the decision to fling him forth into the unknown to provide him a question and the means to understand it. 
What is power?

Title: Order, Equilibrium and Chaos
Synopsis:
The abyss is enroaching upon all beings, they have no consciousness, no soul, no intellect, just a calamity that must be stopped. 
The gods, divining that the origin point of it will occur on the dimension of Secouria, the realm with the strongest of existences and in relative peace, tell the races of the humans and demons to be prepared to receive the heroes 2 years before the first outbreak occurs. Little did the Goddesses of Order and Chaos knew, that doing the summoning together would have caused something that never happened before.
Okay, first story here, this is one of 2 I plan on doing, chapters will be long, but I got no schedule

Title: To Deify a Deity
Synopsis:
Don't rate without an actual review.  How am I supposed to improve the story if nothing is said?
She was a god in her past life, killed.  Reincarnated into a different planet filled with different races and young gods, her old life is catching up with her. Join Lynefra as she journeys through her new life on Pandora and comes to terms with who she is and what she's meant to do.
 
Please rate and review it.  Feel free to drop a comment or a message offering critiques and advice, thanks!
Cover art is by master jjedi on deviantart.
Cover art is titled Mystical Sunset
P.S. If you simply downvote the story without leaving any constructive comments behind that's totally not cool! I absolutely don't mind if you don't rate the story well but at least give me a reason why so I can improve upon it.

Title: Magi
Synopsis:
We follow a young boy through his life as a magi
 
please point out any mistakes and i'll try and correct them thank you

Title: Heroic Necromancer
Synopsis:
Dark is Dark and Light is Light so where why are there no heroic necromancers?! only scary people who die under paladin blades?!! simple because the nice ones hide away from civilisation because the damage done to the necromancers reputation is too far gone. Oh there have been cases of necromancers working with hero's but none about a solo necromancer trying to save the world without being a anti-hero or just plain Villian v Villan. Well here is one story hope you enjoy it.
 
First Novel don't put me down too hard please

Title: A Journey to Another Land
Synopsis: Liz is brought to the land of Narnia through wondering through the woods, where she meets Edmund's son, Richard, High King Peter's son, Nicholas, and more. Liz had never been to Narnia or ever heard of Aslan or Kings and Queens of Old. But little does she know that her friend, Edmund, was one of the King of Old. While Liz is there she will learn how to fight and more, but in the end she will have to choose her home or Narnia.

Title: Valhalla
Synopsis:
The Valhalla will be updated every two or three days.Feel free to leave your reviews or make comments.Thanks for your appreciation!
----------------------------------------
300 years ago,the Elven Dynasty collapsed.Human as the slaves of elves were not be able to start the revolution,yet they found a way to fight against Elven Magics.The Incantation Tattoos.War launched,but it was tough.
 When nobody hoped to win and survive there came the miracle. The Nine Valhallas arrived as the warriors of God.Finally,being recognized as "Creatures that stole God's power",elves were extinct.And the age of human civilization began.After the Great Victory the Human Empire separated into three smaller empires,Midgard in peace again.
But legends never end. The new darkness of the world was breeding,and the world would be overturned.
All sources of disasters might be traced back to a youngster,Halley Golmap......

Title: SMT : Broken Link
Synopsis:
This Story was made with Shin Megami Tensei franchise world and terms. I do not take any profit from this story and was created for only recreation purposes.
 
What differs demons and humans?
Except the very striking appearance and physical figure, we could learn that there are no real differences between the two. Especially when you can turn into one
Right in this mad infested apocalyptic world.

Title: After the Fall. (Book 1 of the Shardfall Saga)
Synopsis:
Not too far off in the future, a meteor strikes the earth leaving the world in devastation. The impact of such a massive object changed the enviroment entirely, from tsunamis to tornadoes and the complete rewriting of the world's ecosytems. The worst part of it though was the fact the meteor was not composed of rocks and minerals. Mana, otherwise known as magic, composed the meteor in its entirety. With this foregin element introduced, the very biology of everything changed. 
Meet Ridge who even after living in this new world for several months doesn't have a clue as to what he is, because not everyone was lucky enough to change into things from fairy tales. Instead he has to work to find out what he is and what his dreams mean, all while trying to find a way to survive the monsters and dangers that lurk in the new enviroments.

Title: SongToStory
Synopsis:
These are stories (or well, a general idea of a story) that were inspired by songs that i like enough to make a story over

this is also my first ever fiction on the site so please be gentle ( ; __;)

Title: A Book to Remember
Synopsis:
What happens when a kid, beaten down by society and the world at large, figures out a way to pay all of them back for everything the world has done?
It's simple really...
 
READERS! IT IS RECOMMENDED TO READ THIS NOVEL TO THIS MUSIC ON A LOOP:
Jeremy Soule – Peace of Akatosh (The Elder Scrolls: Oblivion Soundtrack)
!!!ESPECIALLY THE LOGS!!!

Title: Dragon Fragment
Synopsis:
An ordinary Earthly man falls unconscious and encounters a God-like Entity. He learns the origins of his existence and inconceivable revelations, and was given a unique choice that he could not pass. He paid the ultimate price to ensure his destiny and chose to be Reborn as a Creature to evolve Spiritually in a World with Unique Magic System and Elemental Affinities where his modern knowledge would prove most useful. But unimaginable hardships and tribulations awaited in his new World and other Realities where he would be fated to meet other creatures.
Re-writing as of  June 2022.
Picture Credits: Nightshade by Ruth Thompson.

Title: Techno Cultivator
Synopsis: Follow James the morally twisted maintenance electrician as he's sucked into a new world narrowly escaping the nuclear holocaust of Earth. Here in this new world he chooses to grow stronger and develop his own mystical strength as he starts on the martial path leading to heights unknown. Contains dark humor and ethically compromised characters bordering on diabolically evil. There is no 'Hero'.

Title: Fortress Seven
Synopsis:
Two thousand years ago, a nameless hero sacrificed himself to save the world. With his sacrifice came a world filled with Orbs – powerful naturally occurring sources of magic. His seven companions, the seven fortresses, returned to this changed world, splitting it into seven kingdoms and changing it forever.
Exactly two millennia after the incident, the world remains heavily unchanged – and a mysterious boy is found in the deepest depths of the Wildlands. Quickly learning the rules of the world and more about himself – will the real truth be revealed, or will the peace of the land continue for another two thousand years in stagnation?
Inspired by Japanese light novels such as Overlord, Tsuki ga Michibiku Isekai Douchuu, and Tate no Yuusha no Nariagari, Fortress Seven is both a mixture of a Fantasy Adventure and Underdog novel that not only brings about the development of its characters but the development of an entire nation.

Title: Creation
Synopsis: Through my original life I was a mathematician, astronomer, biologist, and philosopher. What interested me the most about my previous world was life. By the end of my life I had unlocked all the secrets of the universe, whether anyone believed me or not was a different matter. While I slept the final breath I would exhale on Earth escaped me.

Title: Bloodshed
Synopsis: Every ship has its secrets. The Bloodshed was no different. As its name suggests, this ship had seen its fair share of bloodshed. Originally, the ship was christened The Star of Orion. Over time with all the battles it endured, it quickly became known as Blood of Orion. Eventually, that morphed into the name we know today. The Star of Orion was built as a trade ship but when she was captured by pirates, she was modified and outfitted with anywhere between 15 and 30 guns. She was captained by one of the most fearsome pirates to roam the northeastern coast of North America and the southern coast of Africa, Anwen Wolfe. Anwen was known as the Wolf of the Atlantic. She captured The Star of Orion on its way to London. Little is known about what happened in their final days on the high seas, until now.

Title: Shoulders Of Giants
Synopsis: Sean Cook was an underachieving attention-deficient teen, content to coast through junior year of high school, until a freak accident grants him the power to instantly assimilate the content of any book at a touch. Suddenly Sean finds the sum total of human knowledge literally at his fingertips, and impossible dreams aren’t quite so impossible after all…

Title: A.G. (Artificial Gamer)
Synopsis:
When the end times come about, things take a different turn than religions prophiside.
The games begin. Monsters apear. Magic florishes. Gods decend. And traditional machines are left to rot in its wake.
Except... For one.
------
Is only a place holder for a time.

Title: Medevial battles
Synopsis:
Everyday, the village was safe. Everyone had fun, including the kids. Ryan knows that he does a great job protecting the village. The monsters came by every day trying to breach the walls to loot the city. 
    But one day, something happened. Something big, and even Ryan didn't know what to do. So he did something. He was scared. He loved his home, and the people. What is he going to do?

Title: Seeker
Synopsis:
Let's begin this story with a Once upon a time...
 
...there was a boy named Arthur. He, a hotblooded adolescent male, love adventures and duels and heroes like boys of his age. However, unlike others, he had uncanny interest in anything of the sorts that it borders on obssession. He was reckless and relentless in his pursuit of anything interesting that anyone would consider that his vice. He was brave and oddly cunning. He was considered a misfit when he was a kid. He really loved adventures. But then...
But then, a new adventure awaits him, and this time... he might not be ready for it.

Yoho! Lemme say this in advance... Thanks.
Anywho, thiz iz me first story so, please umm be gentle? Oh, i'm from the Phils. so english is not really in my turf but it is considered a second language here if you exclude our local dialects. So please pardon my grammar a bit, eh? But only a bit, okay. I'm trying to widen my vocabulary here so, yeah? Thanks comrade.
 
 
P.S. The tags for this story are not set in stone so it may change. ;)

Title: Love Making Card
Synopsis: George after suffering his heart broken, because of a bitch was dpressed. Then he get a chance to release his depression amd got a mysterious card. Will he be able to get his revenge..............

Title: Headshot! - A Zombie litRPG novel
Synopsis:
Headshot! has just gone live, and the whole world's playing. Unfortnately, unless you can buy your way on to the Survivor's side, you can only participate as a Zombie. Every week the Apocalypse starts over, and every week the forces gather once more to tear each other down to the bone.
Ryan's played the Beta for months, but now that his favorite game has launched, he finds it consuming his time and his life, even as he struggles to decipher whether or not there's actually a way to succeed if you're not willing to Pay to Win...
(Author Note: I'll be putting up chapters as I write them, and once the whole thing's complete I'll leave it up for a little while prior to its publication on Amazon.)

Title: Rain's Revenge.
Synopsis: After milleniums of waiting, preparing and anguish, the monster that took his precious away is reborn. The Demon King that terrorize the world has finally materialize. Cursed with Immortality and Chained by a promise to his most beloved, he will finally have his revenge.

Title: I just want to play alone!
Synopsis:
Things are on the rocks with his girlfriend. His friends aren't there anymore. (Probably because he's a Jackass). Of course, he hates his job working from home in his father’s engineering business. 2133 in the Indo-Asian Cooperative is a high-tech terror. Defeated in his life Jin Kumar gets into the hottest new game on the market.
Fantasy Online- A boring name for a VRMMORPG that is surrounded in secrecy.
Just what are the developers hiding? (Probably Nothing?)
Who are the mysterious beings moving behind the scenes? (Aliens?)
Why are the AIs rebellious? (Puberty?)
Why can't Jin manage to live in peace? (Overcrowded Servers?)
Join the acerbic and irreverent Jin as he struggles to make sure that he can stay as far from people as he likes in the largest gaming community in the history of gaming.

Title: Who Says A Lich Can't Be An Adventurer?
Synopsis:
A Lich?  I guess I am, since I'm a self-made undead that uses magic.  I'm not a necromancer though, I'm just an old enchanter that didn't want to die yet.  I'm not planning to learn necromancy either, a trail of undead minions would be like carrying a giant banner saying "come subjugate me!"  Also, spare me from centuries in a cpeepy black tower if you don't mind.  I spent almost all my life indoors, for my unlife I'd like to travel a bit.  I want to see the sights, the sounds, the... well... lets just focus on sights and sounds for now.
 
For those who don't like a skeletal MC, he will get a human-like body... eventually.  I want him to have to work for it though.
This story is set in the same world as my short-story The Arrogant Young Master tramples the Heroes.  Reading the prologue from that will explain a few things, but it's not really necessary.

Title: The Binding of the Dragoon
Synopsis: The elf Astrid finally became of age, allowing her to join the local adventure school. Little did she know that her life will soon change as she is thrown into chaos. Will she be able to maintain control, or will she fall and lose everything.

Title: Ignis Fatuus
Synopsis: Myriads ancient mountains, rivers that roar in the sky, grasslands encompassing entire nations, canyons full endless biomes and peculiar realms where legends exist, all contain aether. The profound and mysterious force of energy that enables a world of fantastical proportions that defy logic at its core. One young practitioner, Pierre, follows the laws of fire and it's ceaseless majesty. The journey has only begun.

Title: Draconic Blood [Dropped]
Synopsis:
When Master Blacksmith, Max Heveild is put in an impossible situation, he is able to take down a fearsome foe. The only problem is, he's the only once to survive the debacle created by an entity that released creatures from fantasy into out world, letting them run amok.
He gets exceptional gifts due to his success, however will he be able to protect his world from the incoming debacle? Only time can tell...

Title: Ivan and the Black Riders
Synopsis:
Petrov the Dragonlord rules an ambitious new kingdom from atop a mountain. It's said he and his sister were once fully human, and that he can grant youth and the body of a wolf to those who prove their loyalty. Ivan is willing to kill in the Dragonlord's name, but is there a limit to how much "glory" and "progress" he can stand?
(Contains violence and other disturbing moments, but not explicit sex or gore.)

Title: Story: Forever After - Short stories compilation
Synopsis:
This is the list of all short stories released in Story: Forever After. This way, it'll be easier to find them instead of searching for them in every chapter.
The short stories give glimpses of the worlds that Ryner's fragments inhabit and how they are doing. There are currently four different fragments.
Note: The memories aren't necessarily in chronological order.
Current count:
Knight - 7 memories
School - 9 memories
Demon - 8 memories
Zombie - 11 memories

Title: Mana king
Synopsis: A youth form a family of little power and influence, he must use his luck and skill to become the greastest adventurer. After getting chased from the academy, he must survive by himself with not much help. Can he do it? watch as he aceives the impossible!

Title: Heroes Return
Synopsis:
A hero is summoned in into a different world filled with war and demons. The hero through many hardship and battles ends the war and learns a way to return home to fulfill his dying wish. Requesting the aid of the empire he asissted during times of need, instead of accepting the request they intend to rid of him due to his immense strength. 
The heroes comrades he made during the war set out to defeat the demon queen and assist in the heroes return, only to fall in the process leaving the hero with a missing arm to remember what happened on the day. 
Going back to his home world, the former hero goes through hardships and new experiences as he and his family go through many troubles with getting to know each other once again as he works in his own magic shop.
This is a story about the daily life of a former hero in his home world as he sells magical items.

Title: I am Not A Hero
Synopsis: Louie is a young kid who dreams of becoming a Magic Knight-General, the highest ranking within the Kingdom of Katillia, one day. He is strong albeit passionate, bright-eyed and too innocent. Little does he know what war truly is.

Title: Cultivating like a Moron.
Synopsis:
A world filled with Immortals, Saints, and Demon Beasts. A world where the strong reign supreme. A society filled with face-smacking and arrogant young masters.
 
To cultivate is to rebell against the heavens!
 
An average high school student got hit by a truck and he then reincarnated to a new life. That new life of his was not of a crippled person or a arrogant young master, but his new life was a poor middle-age homeless man.
 
There are many reasons for cultivation such as money, women, power, family, friendship and much more.
Join our hero named... well forget his previous life's name, because his current name is now Yang Chen!
On his relatively trashy and basic journey to achieve a basic life.

Title: Condition : Hack And Crack=>
Synopsis:
Our story start as our mc got hit on his head and die. 
Not so cool ending right even new beginning is boring that is as a Villager A.
But things started changing when he unlock the skill <<Hack and Crack>> . 
This is a story how our mc cheats and gain power equaling The G.M. a.k.a. The GOD

Title: Penicillin
Synopsis:
--- Penicillin.
Perhaps, the drug that ends all pain.
Special thanks to KAOXIII for the cover.

Title: The Girl and Her Whale(Completed)
Synopsis: Jenessa has always loved Killer Whales and only days before she goes to college she gets special access to see all the Killer Whales at an aquarium. Just before the end of her backstage tour, she gets to met a whale named Agent.  Agent was know for being mischievous and not listening. But when Jenessa meets him both of their world's will be changed forever.

Title: The dungeon mind
Synopsis:
A new dungeon core was born, it started of like all others, but then grew smarter and smarter, as the days passed.
 
Note: I'm trying to make a realistic dungeon

Title: The Dao of Magic
Synopsis:
Here I am, sitting on a mountain so far away from civilisation it might as well be the godforsaken arse of the world, about to ascend. Can't wait to leave this crapfest of a planet... Turns out that the higher ups decided that an unaffiliated rogue like me is too big of a risk to let run around free.
Seems like this entire cultivation world is a late stage capitalist money making machine for the powers that be in the higher realms, and me stealing the good loot in front of their descendants and sect disciples noses finally pissed them off enough to take action.
First, they sent all the sect masters and hidden dao protectors to off me - which failed, obviously. Heh, afterwards they simply bitch slapped me out of their universe though.
That is interesting and all, but I just woke up in a valley watching some critters murder each other while trying not to freak out about how bad it smells here.Soo… where the fuck am I? Why is that deer fighting a feathery squirrel? Why am I teaching this baby rabbit saved from a cannibalistic mother how to kick beings in the face with the power of qi?Releases a couple of times a week!
Come stalk me through social media and stuff:Twitter | Facebook | Instagram | Website | Discord
Please check out my released books!The Dao of Magic: Book I - Amazon | AudiobookThe Dao of Magic: Book II - Amazon The Dao of Magic: Book III - AmazonSkeleton in Space: Histaff - Amazon | AudiobookSkeleton in Space: GalaxSec - Amazon
Go read my other story; Skeleton in Space.
I took the WriTE pledge, which means I will finish it. Or at the very least not drop it or put it on hiatus. Check here for more info.

Title: Trinity Dawn
Synopsis:
Rines Tremor. Genius and Smart. To words that are meant to describe him. He was able to do amazing things. He could build his own starship. He could regulate a planet into a place a person could call home. He has a family that loves him. He brings new meaning to the word Tremor. As he he brings his presence into the universe. 
 
A/N Trinity Dawn is something I've thought long and hard on about starting. It's something new to me as I don't really go routes without the legendary superpowers or something like that. He isn't super powered. He isn't weak. I will attempt to stock up chapters before I start a upload schedule.

Title: Side Quest
Synopsis:
GAME OVER. AND OVER. AND OVER.
Falling from grace leaves a mark, even in virtual reality. No one knows that better than Mitch Mantock, an ex-gaming phenom now scraping by in the back alleys of Skirmish, the most popular VR game in the world. When his mentor reveals that Mitch's old team—a ragtag band of gamers with more baggage than bullets—has vanished, Mitch knows he's their only chance to get back alive. Now, all he has to do is track down his old teammates in a series of unknown virtual worlds, defeat an undefeatable artificial intelligence program, and find his way home in one piece. No big deal.SIDE QUEST is READY PLAYER ONE meets GUARDIANS OF THE GALAXY, a sci-fi romp that follows our hero as he fights, sneaks, and bargains his way back home through a collection of game worlds, blasting digital zombie cowboys with one hand while trying to keep his old team together with the other, no matter what it takes.

Title: The Fight for the Mirkwood Kingdom(completed)
Synopsis: After returning from the battle in Dale, Thranduil becomes lonely and decided that he needs a queen to rule beside him and to keep him company. So Thranduil makes a decree that every eligible woman should be brought him to see if they will become queen or sent back to their normal lives. Alassie and her friend, Kedi, didn't know about this but their parents did and keep them hidden until one day they found a way out if their hiding place.

Title: The Chosen: Colossus of Evil
Synopsis:
For all beings are the paths of fate carved, but for three dark elven children did the loss of their parents put their fates in clear unwanted view. Being murdered by a wizard in the body of a beastly Minotuar, this brutal unscrupulous terror was bent on ruthless backlash to all in the realm for his own dark suffering past.
      Through the aging course of fifteen years, being both guided and protected by their new guardian uncle did the children’s mission finally start. Forced for their own safety from all they knew they leave their home that was fashioned in a world under the world. Their clan was nothing more than a rebel shadow of their old race, driven into hiding from persecution and disloyalty of not willing to uphold the continuing evil traditions of their ancestral nature; and with struggles unseen they fight to emerge from the shadows to the surface realm, with a final goal  to one day be again equal both in sociological weight and rank.
      Accomplishing such tasks held its risks; for the three on their endeavor discover the complications of sibling rivalry, loyalty and personal acceptance.             Unexpectedly do they find trials of the body, mind and soul with allied companions along their journey, that introduce them to truth, love and self sacrifice when stories of their own past intertwined with theirs. 
      Will such tasks lead the children to the same doom that brought them to this very dark alley; or strengthen their resolve through the sight of true purpose not only to defeat their mortal enemy, but defend their continuing wished existence within the realm.

Title: The life of Jeyvan Avorian [Discontinued]
Synopsis:
This is the tale of Jeyvan Avorian, the man who burned as a beacon of hope yet also became a symbol of despair
This is the tale of how he came to be, his trials, his battles, his mistakes and his story.
Now, are you ready to witness the legend of Jeyvan Avorian?

Title: Skill Creator
Synopsis:
A classroom full of children were suddenly transported into another world by God. Each student was given a special ability to help them grow and become heroes worth saving the world. Marvin, the typical good-looking popular guy, is given an unusual skill that only he is able to see.
Mistaken for being a weakling Marvin decides to grow stronger than everyone else.

Title: Gambler's Fallacy
Synopsis:
Koji, an asian-american 25-year-old gambling addict, has just lost the biggest gamble of his life in an underground poker game. He has hit true rock bottom. No family, no friends, no money, no house. In a fit of rage, he tried to assault the mobster who had won against him. Of course, he failed. As he was about to get shot in the head, a loud bell rang and he passed out.
He woke up in a strange completely white room, where a talking platypus in a suit stood looking at him.

Welcome to Level X, Koji! You have been selected to participate in the galaxy’s most watched reality show. I’m gonna explain everything to you later, please stand still while we run some tests on you.

And so, Koji's journey in this deadly game began.
 NOTE: THE STORY IS IN INDEFINITE HIATUS.
I'm working on another story that makes more sense to me. I plan on reworking this one on the future.
Real Synopsis: A LitRPG fantasy adventure with light sci-fi elements. I'm gonna have a focus on developing interesting characters and on creating a cool system, skills and gear.
This is mostly something I'm doing to externalize my imagination after reading so many asian novels and LitRPG stories. If you end up enjoying it, I ask that you leave comment whenever you find a mistake on my part, maybe a plot hole, grammar mistakes, if you think the story is taking a shitty turn etc. I appreciate any opinions but do note that I won't put something in the story if I don't think its interesting. Also, I'm not a native english user, so there will probably be a bunch of language mistakes. Please correct me.

Title: The Ifrit
Synopsis: Troy is training at a military school when he discovers an Ifrit, the strongest form of Djinni. The Djinni allows him to use magic similar to in a video game and he uses it to pass his tests and go on missions with other graduates, whose goal is to prevent the possessed summoners from turning the world to ash.

Title: Another End
Synopsis:
At first, earth was a planet blessed with an overabundance of mana and sentient species, all connected to an interplanetary world system. That is until a drunk Goddess of Birth, Origin, and Beginnings, Ardvite, showed up. In her drunken haze she created a race that absorbed mana to evolve themselves at an incredible rate – Humans, after which she promptly passed out drunk and took at 12,000 year nap.
Without mana to support them, 90% of all life on earth was extinguished and almost all traces of their civilizations crumbled into dust over time. Now in the modern era, Ardvite wakes up and tries to get rid of her hangover while fixing her mistake without alerting the other gods, who would furiously mock her for ending something.
After getting humans to drop mana filled bombs on each other, both restoring diversity and mana to the planet while also culling the human population. Mana mutates the earth’s inhabitants, changing the race of some, granting some magic or mana induced powers, or for the most part just violently killing them.
Now a boy who was turned into one of the only 5 legendary beast kin, the kitsune, decides to set out to get to the homeland that he always dreamed of returning to in his small town in rural Washington.

This is my first attempt at writing a story, so I would greatly appreciate any comments, question, concerns, or feedback on my writing. Thanks, and (hopefully) enjoy the read.
The cover image is actually a scene from x-men apocalypse and I claim no rights or ownership of it, all of that goes to its original creator.

Title: Bloodletting
Synopsis:
He was a master of war; a friend of death. He had the dash of a Lion, the patience of a Serpent and strength which could rival nine Oxen.
He yearned for the rainy nights when he stood alone isolated from all man wearing armor with a sword and shield in hand; looking towards the eastern horizon, waiting for sun to rise so that he could start the battle.

Title: Strongest Soul Engineer
Synopsis:
200 years after the first advent of Soul Beasts, the world finally regained its former peace after the sacrifices of countless heroes. The civilization has greatly improved with the help of Soul Stones, Soul Cores, and Soul Cultivation. Soul Devices and Weapons slowly replaced the former technology, helping the human race to achieve greater height compared to the 21st century.
On his 10th Birthday, Randi's Soul Talent was measured and the result turned out that he had no talent in Soul Cultivation. Left without any choice, he chose to embark on a path of Soul Engineers. 
Follow the story of Randi, a boy who aspired to become the Strongest Soul Engineer.
