Title: The Nine of Tash
Synopsis:
God Relics are scattered throughout the world. Nobody knows how the items came to be or why they exist. It is said that they are relics blessed by the gods themselves. However, many commoners choose not to believe in them. They are regarded as fiction by most. Items used by heroes in fairy tales for kids.
In this world lives a boy. This is his journey.
 

I've decided to not add that much to the synopsis as it would just be spoilers with so few chapters out. I am open for critique, you're welcome to point out mistakes.

Title: Noah's Ark
Synopsis:
Noah’s Ark, a place where people with monstrous power gathered to prove their strength against one another. There are three different types of species that inhabit the islands. 
 
The first are the [Regulars]. Common citizen who hold zero power in terms of strength or ability, but make up the majority of the population and help make clans, cities, and guilds thrive. 
 
The second type of species are labeled as [Noah’s Chosen Ones], [NCO] for short. These are the people who were either born with Spirit Animals, or were able to fuse with Spirit Animal Eggs that are scattered throughout Noah’s Ark. Only people with a certain affinity with the egg are able to hatch it and fuse with the spirit.
 
The third type of species are the [Demons] who come up from the Abyss to Noah’s Ark on occasion and wreak havoc on the people there. A common enemy for the the people on Noah’s Ark. The demons main goal is to help their Demon King Bahamut, take over the whole world and bring everything into chaos.
Raion, however, was an [Irregular]. [Irregulars] are people who are gifted with talents and skills that make them as strong as [NCO’s].

Author's Note:
This story is pretty much something I'm writing for myself. I've had this story in my head for about two years now and it's time to put it down in writing. Expect a new chapter every 2 days.

Title: Redemption
Synopsis:
One man must rise from nothing to save humanity from itself and forces from the outside world.
.....

Title: Omni Thunder
Synopsis: 16-year-old kid hit by a thunder and reincarnated in a fantasy world with a full control on thunder power lets see what he do in his new life

Title: Rebirth Online V3
Synopsis:
*This is the reworked version of my original story Rebirth Online, due to the vast changes that will be taking place and a desire for a proper number of views and new comments on the changes I have made a new page and will include a link back to the original Rebirth Online for those interested in seeing the changes. Click Here for Rebirth Online*
 
Adam Sterling, A man who through a series of events went from being a bouncer at the local biker bar to being a pro gamer in the world of Rebirth Online, a fantasy VRMMO based upon real life ancestry and myth. Players will each have a tailor made story much like a tabletop campaign, their choices in all things will have an effect on the game itself even if it is small. 
Players will have their DNA tested which will allow accurate placement within the old world, in the same general area as their ancestors would have been. Allowing them to chose their starting area from the many races that make up their ancestry. from there they will undergo the Trials, a series of events serving as their entry into adulthood which will start the players off at the age of Thirteen, with every trial completed they will be advanced in age until they are Eighteen, from there they will have the option of staying Eighteen or advancing to their physical age.
From there the world is open for them to go where they please, be it becoming a blacksmith, a cook, or a lord, though they will have to earn everything through the proper ways, hard work, and dedication to their roles. After all, one can not show up to a city expecting to be its mayor for nothing.

Synopsis: The hidden story of Jake the Ripper from the journal of a former dark brotherhood member.

Title: Happy Hour

With only a small amount of help from the academy and a log book hooked on his belt the Alchemist begins their journey to understanding slime evolution.

Hello, thank you for having a look at my story. This is my first time uploading anything to a website, so I hope to get any feedback you could offer. My main concern is grammatical errors, so any you find if you could point it out it would be a great help in later chapters. I should be updating every few days. Thank you for reading and have a good one.

She is reincarnated into a young girl who had died from an illness, and she finds that she is an entirely different world than her formor. This world is actually a world that is filled with many things that she had wanted to see ever since she had began reading the wuxia/Xianxia translations online. 
Despite her excitement at first, Nekora is immediately thrust into continous plots and dangers that will test her willpower, strength, and morals. Her mentality quickly changes from excitement to one of constant caution. 
___
"No...No way! I am actually within the type of world that I have longed to be in! How amazing is my luck! Haha!" -At first
"This is simply too much to handle. I can't believe that all of those main characters were able to survive for as long as they did...This place is basically a death trap!" -After reality settles in

Title: I got transported to another world with my collection!
Synopsis: This is a story where the main character is transported to another world with his collection of statuettes. We will follow Bastien Lemaître as he is on a quest to retrieve his collection and make his life in this new world.

Title: Road to Ruin
Synopsis:
The Foolish Prince, Aleuas Eins, left the kingdom when he was only twelve years old, as his naïve wish to see more of the world coincided with his stature as merely a second Prince of the Eins Royal Family.
Five years later, the country is struck by war, as the invading Rorldon Empire enters swaths of land across the Great Alm with a large army, leaving Aleuas stuck a sea away in a large island nation.
After five grueling years of war, an underground organization takes roots in the lands, as a young and cunning girl infiltrates kingdoms and empires, tipping the gentle balance of power to the way she imagined. With her help, Eins survives the invasion.
Surviving all this despite, or because of, their enemies, the war-torn Kingdom of Eins is left without its King after a gruesome civil war, and it is up to Prince Aleuas to step forth to try his best to save his kingdom.

Title: The Destiny of a Mortal God (Hiatus)
Synopsis:
Currently on hiatus, in part because I'm unsatisfied with how the story was starting to develop, and even though I had ideas how to run it, I still made mistakes far too big to correct them. Secondly I'm currently stressed about university, and sincerely, I don't see myself keeping this project. I may or may not retake this project or even start a new one, but one thing's for sure, it isn't happening anytime soon (Meaning until june, aprox, or until I can keep up with class).
...
Lyon Ironblood, 19 years old and orphan, is taken by Kronos from the present Earth to another world, where he shall fight and struggle to get stronger so that he shall acomplish the mission Kronos assigned him. He shall fight gods, demons, dragons and monsters and even mortals who surpass those. But to do so he shall receive, though only after he proved himself worthy, a power beyond imagination.
This power will not be handed freely to him, and he'll have to work hard to develop it. He shall receive the X-Men System. A magic system designed to enhance Lyon and give him the mutations from the X-Men serie. He shall start from scratch, with powers that will seem less than a mere human, and develop them with effort, to surpass the gods.
 
[I don't claim ownership of any of the X-Men powers or characters, neither the cover, only thing I claim are the ideas which make the story and put together their powers, how they'll develop from scratch to even higher worlds than they were suposed on the series, other than that, all X-Men characters named (which I'll try to avoid to a certain point) are not of my property]

Title: Cultivators are extinct!
Synopsis:
Elizabeth Rielle wants to be a hero. To be a hero that would protect the world from the thieves that steals old women’s bags to monsters that threaten the survival of humanity. But when she took the dormant meta human DNA test she finds out that she is a rare specimen, her DNA is 100% clean without any changes. No nuclear change, solar change, and not even any hereditary diseases.
 
Elizabeth is absolutely the perfect example of a perfectly healthy human being. Since Elizabeth is perfectly human anything injected in her body to make her stronger will kill her since the human race has evolved to be capable of making their bodies stronger. Rejected, the distraught Elizabeth goes to find a job that would allow her to help society in the smallest of ways.
 
She entered the police force but even the police force is mostly handled by metahumans, making her a simple traffic enforcer without any capability to get to a higher position.But when an incident almost costs her life, memories appeared inside her mind showing her a way on how to become stronger without changing her body in any other way. With a new way of becoming stronger and the hope of making a change towards humanity Elizabeth followsthe path of becoming the last cultivator but what she doesn’t know is that higher powers are watching her and one day she might need to face them.

Title: Noli Me Tank in a Mall
Synopsis:
Noli Me Tangere and El Filibusterismo are important cultural works that ignited the Philippine Revolution against Spain. They are novels that exposed to the populace the abuses and the injustices of their Spanish colonial rulers, the hypocrisy of their priests, and inherent cruelty of their class structure over the powerless masses.
Unfortunately, they rose up in the middle of the Spanish-American War, one which saw Spain lose most of their overseas colonies and decisively end as a World Power. The war ended in the  1898 Treaty of Paris, in which Spain also sold the Philippines to the USA for the sum of twenty million dollars. The revolutionary government was then crushed by the overwhelming military might of the United States and the Philippines turned into a territory. While the Philippines stands as the USA's greatest successes in nation-building, their early occupation left almost one-fifth of the population dead from combat and disease. Jose Rizal was executed by the Spanish long before knowing what might happen to his country. The world presented within The Noli and the El Fili is therefore stuck frozen in time, forever caught in that moment before a Revolution. Now let's see what happens to this nation if we give it the Light Novel treatment and jam the entirety of the Internet into their protagonist's skull and watch him try to fix things with his unfortunate tendency to sound like a supervillain.
 
Updates Mondays and Fridays. 
 
Note: The Noli and El Fili have been public domain since 1946. This is completely fair game.

Title: Chocolate Obsessed Genius Mage
Synopsis:
"Why is everyone else so stupid? Why can't they understand easy things such as control over space and time?"
"And why can't YOU understand common sense or feelings of others? And which mad god made you treat chocolate as your best friend, more important than money and your own health?!"
  Meet the best friend of Alexander - his name is Chocolate. Whoever offends HIM, suffers the wrath of sir Thorn'rose.
Questions you might want to ask:
*Is Q really so interesting? 
*What's weird about MC's wife?
*What happened to Lucy who Alex left behind?
*Will moving eggs and/or talking tentacles appear?
*What is Sir Thorn'rose scared of?
*Who's Mist Sprinkled Rose?
Find out this and more in the next chapters :-)
  Follow the journey of "The Youngest Genius" - Sir Alexander Thorn'rose - secret author of 366 known books of "Magic Knowledge", famous as the best magic encyclopedia all over the world. The first volume, under the alias William Wardock, was released when the author was only 4 years old and amazed every wizard who read it. The real identity of William is the most coveted knowledge in the whole world.
...things are just starting...beware of sudden plot twists...everything is obvious and as expected? Oh, I don't think so...

Title: The Black Heart
Synopsis: This story is a Mystery/Crime story about a girl named Lilith who's been through hell for most of her life. But at the age of 20 she meet's a demon, who gives her the 'Black Heart'. An ancient power also known as Lucifer's or satan's heart. The one who holds this power has the abilities of all of the supernatural/ paranormal beings and can control them. And they're goal is to kill 66 people and turn soul and heart black so they wount be able go to heaven. Witch will give them the opportunity to free Lucifer from his prision. Lillith uses this power to get revenge on everyone who made her life miserable. But a team of detectives are on her tail. Trying to stop her. Will they succeed or will eternal chaos take over.

Title: A Healer's Gift, An Adventurer's Heart
Synopsis:
Daniel was Gifted by the gods at birth, able to heal with a touch even the most grevious wounds. Born in a mining camp, he's unable to still his restless heart and journey's to a nearby Dungeon town to take his first steps as an Adventurer. 
 
Book 1 is released on Amazon and Smashwords.
Book 2 is now released on Amazon, iBooks and Kobo!

Title: Story Dump
Synopsis: Hey guys... I love to write the beginnings of stories. However, usually they stay that way, seeing how I have never finished one. These are a few short stories that I have written, and I've been told by several people to share them with others... honestly, theyre not even that good, so why they wanted me to share, I dont know...

Title: The Divide
Synopsis:
Alan Messer was an average person who only desired to learn and enjoy life. Things were even getting better, he met someone who is perfect for him. However everything completely changes when he wakes up in the crimescene of a murder and is apprehended. His life thereafter becomes progresively futher from what he always knew.  Magic? Monsters? Worlds within his own? Gods?! How can he survive on the other side?
 
This is my first time writing something other than what I've done in school so keep an open mind and constructive criticism is welcome.

Title: The Last Gray
Synopsis:
Between us, secretly lives a race of aliens called ‘Grays’, these mysterious creatures came for a far away planet where they contested the ‘Dwellers’ for energy resources, only to be nearly eradicated completely.
With the merging of their bloodline with ours, humans have obtained many abilities that attracted these Dwellers to earth to seek energy after depleting their planet.
This is the tale of how the last Gray stood against the invasion, and unraveled the untold story of the Grays and the Dwellers.

Title: The Anthology
Synopsis:
This is my collection of short stories. I ask what stories would my audience like to read and write whatever they post in the comments. I strive for more than two dimensional characters and I like to make my stories somewhat unique. 
 
The first six entries are my experiment to just write without stopping and see what comes out. They can serve as an introduction for the reader to me as a thinker and writer. Although it should be known that the majority of those entries were written in a foggy state of mind.
Entry seven is where my short stories begin.

Title: The Arach King
Synopsis:
He opened his eyes. It adjusted slowly as he opened them fully this time and took in everything before him.
He froze.
‘What…what the…’
'I'm a dragon?!'

Title: The blood prince
Synopsis:
If there was only one thing William ever wished for, it was for a peaceful life. From a young age William was taught of the importance of being born royalty. He was also taught how the kingdom was managed, military tactics and swordsmanship. Although he hated it, he knew how fortunate he was and took his responsibilities seriously. 
His father was a kind king. He would do what he could to make life easier for the common people. He tried to keep taxes low for the poor, and tried to maintain peace with other countries. He was an exemplary peaceful king loved by the people. In times of peace he would have made a good king but these arent times of peace. 
Betrayed by those he trusted, and no longer who he once was, he sets out on a path of revenge.

Title: Jinsei no Hogo
Synopsis:
A 14 year old boy fed up with life decides to end his very own, only to be met with an abstract form of what one may call "God." It is now his duty to protect the lives he disregarded.
 

 
I hope you all enjoy the series! It is very exciting to write and see so many people read it! New chapter is scheduled for every Wednesday at 10 pm Est. Enjoy reading!  
                                                                           ~Tatsughetti

Title: An Old Villian's Tale
Synopsis: Leanard Blinde has been called one of the cruelest men to ever walk the earth. However, there was a time that even he could have been considered 'good'. This story, written by his own hand in the months before his death, begins on the day that evil first sunk it's fingers into his heart. This is not a tale for those of good character, nor those pure of heart. However, should you fall into neither of these categories...then please, do enjoy.

Title: republic of the dead.
Synopsis:
fantasy land no stats.. no rpg settings.. its just a fantasy story..
Main character Lou Brown 36 years young. Wants to change his life around.. sells his grocerystore. purchased a herd of domesticated land wyvern. hitches up his chariot. And is about to set off from the town of pleasentville. His ex got the house he sold the store.
Lou is going to make a name for himself... He just not sure he is willing to make it a good name.
In the Republic of Dawn. The peace of the nation is kept. with large armies of undead. in addition to there standing army.. Criminals skeletons are sold at auctions.. if the nation does not need any. This has kept the peace with the neighboring countries that are sometimes 10 times larger in size...with one country surrounding the northern and western border.. and two other countries that have at least one side. the nation has profitated largely from trade. 
The republic is only 694232sq mi2 just a little larger then the state of Alaska.

Title: Son of the Wolf
Synopsis:
The world of Alria is a vast world filled with legends, gods, and magic. It is beautiful, yet harsh. In this world where slavery, war, and death are common to all people, can a young demi-hume find his place? Follow the story of Fenris as he takes on both good and evil in a struggle to find his own path. He will be brought to face demons, angels, gods, and men in this world of hate and love. Will he truely ever be able to find himself?
Note:

Title: Pacifist Run
Synopsis:
A man moments from seeing his grand plan for revenge come to fruition dies.  Cursed and blessed after death he is reborn into a world he never dreamed of.  How will he survive in a world of demons and gods when he can't attack to save his life.  Similarities and differences to everything he ever knew, a new life awaits.
An ongoing original work.

Title: Our Town
Synopsis:
Cedar Lake is one of those sleepy towns where nothing bad ever happens and everyone knows eachother.
Or so they thought.
 
When a missing child turns quickly turns into a murder case, a splint is driven directly down the middle of the town. An event that would usually bring people together only creates suspicion and opens up the door to both mystery and many other secrets previously unknown.
 
Will the town's peaceful idility survive this ordeal?

Title: Cursed Immortals Path To Godhood
Synopsis:
NOTE: This is not a full fledging story as it is simply an idea that I want to express and see if anyone would like to use it to create their own story. If someone can create a story out of this then be happy to do so.
A man is cursed by the goddess of life for not accepting her offer to become her husband due to her 'not being the one'. Cursed, the man lives the life as an immortal. At first, it is a gift but after many years can only be seen as the worst curse of all. Sick of life, the man attempts to kill himself only to fail after failure after failure. Creating a machine that wipes his memories to 'kill himself' he forces his future self to carry out his wishes in hopes he can find peace.
After 2000 years, the 19th cursed Immortal once again wipes his memories in hopes that his future self will alleviate himself of his curse. However, instead of his predecessors who searched for ways kills themselves, he searches for ways to gain strength in hopes that the only way to rid himself of his curse is to kill the goddess of life himself.

Title: Interdimensional Traveler
Synopsis:
This Story is about Alex who found out about the world's secret and the danger that would come sooner or later.
Will he defend the world and become the hero of humanity?
Will he kill all the beasts that would threaten humanity's existence?
" Nah that sounds troublesome, I'll just travel to some random planet and enjoy the scenery. "
 
Follow Alex and Lynn as they travel between worlds and maybe finding their lost parents in the process?
 
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
This is my first story, we all have to start somewhere right?
Why Tiger you ask? Because it's COOL
Art taken from ClipArtFest, Check them out will you!

Title: Ice Hangar
Synopsis:
Carl Reagle is sent to a comet mining facility to investigate why the crew went into radio silence. What he uncovers will put him on a collision trajectory towards the unknown.
This short story won 1st prize on TheNextBigWriter ? Locked Door Contest

Title: Summoned Heroes' Life
Synopsis:
The same familiar setting of a brave youth being summoned into a different world to defeat a demon lord.
The formula that happened simultaneously across the globe as youths were forcibly taken away from home.
This is what happens when they all went returned back.

Title: Records
Synopsis:
What is Power?
What is Skill?
And what does one do with them?
These define a person.
Follow the story of one who is both blessed and cursed , of one who has everything and nothing.
p.s. My first story. I'll appreciate any and all criticism. Please point out any mistakes. Thank you.

Title: The Melancholy of An Immortal
Synopsis:
God's "Perfect Being". That was who Ambrose was.
Or at least that was what he was supposed to be.
He had the perfect mind, the perfect body and was even immortal. However it was because of his immortality that he could never be the perfect being.
So God had tried to kill him off, but not even It could do that. Ambrose was truly undying.
It was because of his immortality that he never, felt any desire, unlike Humans who could find meaning to their lives in that desire.
He lived for hundred of millions of years and has seen everything from the extinction of the dinosaurs to the birth and death of empires, all the while remembering every single second of it in excruciating detail.
Living his life without any meaning, Ambrose could do nothing, but exist without any desire.
Until he looked across the crowd of people.
It was then that he felt desire.

Title: A Tyrant: Unshackled
Synopsis:
A man once lived in a modern world, surrounded by the tragedy of humans, he was despaired. He did his best to ignore it. Did his best to hide in the safety of his own circumstances. But eventually the tragedy reached him. And when it did... it left a broken man, who was tired of the world and it's circumstances. He took things into his own hands. He would change the world. But this story isn't about that. For after all was done, the man dying peacefully on his own terms, he would have a new life ahead of him. Now unbound by attatchments and responsibility, in a completely new world for him to explore, he would make sure his new life didn't end up like the last one.

  This fiction won't be updated regularly due to my own circumstances and while I will try to update it often, I won't always be able to. That being said I hope you enjoy this little work of mine. I'm not an experienced, and don't consider myself a good author in any way. But hopefully some people will enjoy this fiction like I do writing it, regardless of that.

Title: A Green Tale
Synopsis:
Watch a Goblin go from the instinct creature that serves as every adventurers fodder mob into a force to be reckoned with. 
 
This is is the first story I'm putting up where another person can read it. Constructive criticism is always appreciated

Title: Re: Demon
Synopsis: Grey Greenwood a man who died by the hands of Mr. Truck was given a choice by a god. Go to heaven or be reincarnated. He chose reincarnation and he was reincarnated as a little girl. What will happen to him?

Title: Re:Panda
Synopsis:
A a young woman in her late twenties dies and is reincarnated as a forever baby panda.
Cute and tiny how will she live in this new game like world?

Title: Finding Equilibrium between Oil and Water
Synopsis: The story revolves around a young man by the age of 22. Freyr Halldorsson struggles with his mental disorders and his joint issues, having being diagnosed with ADHD, Asperger's and severe issues with his joints. As an outcast of society with no purpose, he wilts away in a dormitory run by the government and hospital. His fate seems to be decided by psychoanalysis and documents. Yet he soon discovers a new path, as he gets introduced to a world of fighting using ancient techniques and mysterious energies by a receptionist, and friend from the hospital. Watch as Freyr struggles on his path to find purpose and release from his physical and mental anguish, slowly stepping into a world he doesn't understand, though a world he has always yearned for.

Title: Life in the North (the System Apocalypse book 1) - An Apocalyptic LitRPG
Synopsis:
All John wanted to do was spend a week in the great outdoors. Clear his head about his ex, find some peace and eat some bad junk food.  Instead, he wakes up to a series of blue windows and the world ending. Stuck in the North with the world ending, how will John and other Yukoner's survive the coming apocalypse?
 
Book is LIVE on Amazon for purchase and reading via Kindle Unlimited

Title: Of The Nine
Synopsis:
***DROPPED***
The entire Hyperion Empire, ruled by the Granitas Imperial Family, celebrates as all nine of the bloodline Houses have given birth to children. In a world where bloodlines place some mortals above the rest, the Hyperion Empire has cause to rejoice.
Maximus Soltain the Second, or Max, is just one child born in the celebrated new generation. He hails from the Soltain House, which has ruled over the land east of the Elotl Mountains long before the empire was even founded. 
Max must discover for himself where he belongs in a world where ability and personal strength reign supreme.

Title: A NEET being sent to a fantasy world, isn't as great as it's cracked up to be. (Cancelled)
Synopsis: Kaito Magami is what most people would call a NEET. He never leaves his room, watches anime,  plays games all day, and most importantly, hates anything to do with the outside. One day while browsing the web, a popup appears on his screen. "Want a change of pace?" Playing along Kaito clicks yes. Upon doing so he is thrown from his own world, into the world of Melexia. Will Kaito be able to adapt to the rules of this new, RPG, like world in order to find his way home? Or will he give up and become a shut in once again?

Title: God, Stop that! Chaos Happened When She Became a He. [Dropped, Has no intention on continuing. The author got job]
Synopsis:
She was a normal rich girl that regarded often as side antagonist B that hold insignificant roles in people's heart.Because of a certain God that was a prankster, she had to become an entirely different person with only the name being the same.The world was nothing that she was familiar with. There were a lot of monsters and beasts. Apart of that, the world fashion sense was weird that made her felt as if she had returned to the time of ancient china. Without any base knowledge of martial art, she somehow had to fight a lot of things, monsters, and people.The only good thing about the new life was that she could treat her eyes with all the pretty boys in the new world, and herself being one of those hot guys.
Warning! A story that most men find disturbing, but Fujoshi and Fudanshi find its pleasuring. Because it is Yaoi, damn it~Slight Sexual Content also warned~ <3

Title: Up a Creek
Synopsis:
Alex is a normal college student, exhausted by classes and the demands of the rowing team and trying to keep her roommate out of trouble. With all these distractions, how is a girl ever supposed to find time to prep? 
She seems a storm looming on the horizon, and she fears there isn't enough time to bring her roomate into the fold...

Title: Nova Gaia: Winds of war
Synopsis:
Nova Gaia, a world fraught with suffering brought about by the folly of it's inhabitants has finally achieved an uneasy age of peace.
 
Ever since the Dark God, Baal, whose dark dominion started over a century ago was defeated within the last decade, many thought it would finally usher in a dawn of a new era of friendship and prosperity between races and their respective kingdoms. The believers of this idealistic notion were correct... For a short period of time.
 
As the various kingdoms and nations of the world struggle to rebuild the devastation that was caused in ousting the God of destruction, some seek to further their own standing within the world by using the aftermath of the great war to their own ends.
 
Follow the stories of a few people who will eventually shape and mold the outcome of the new era. An infamous and mysterious mercenary, indebted to the princess of the floating city. A naive swordsman who seeks to find his tribe's missing goddess. A steam knight defecting from his country and a seeker who wishes to find her fallen kingdom's long lost prince and return him to his righteous post.
 
Time moves forward, and the die of fate is cast once again, as the winds of war stir once more.
 
-------------------
Author's note/s
So this story will have multiple POV's, and might start off a bit slow.
Note: The world I am creating uses magic, swords, guns and mechs all in one big mosh pit of a steampunk-esque world so it might take some time for you to get used to it (and for me to write it properly) so, constructive criticism is encouraged I guess, since I want to get better.
Note 2: Not sure if cyberpunk tag also includes steampunk, but I tagged it just in case, I will remove it if it doesn't however.

Synopsis:
In the year of XIII, the world has changed since then..
 
The world has been destroyed. The remaining civilization is trying to start over..
 
The noble families have kept their power. But this is causing conflict..

Knights fight for different reasons, whether or not they fight for the noble families.

But when she hears the truth about what happened to Ben, how he went to the dark side, and is now Kylo Ren, she is determined to bring back the Ben she knows and loves.

This storyline originates in Tekton history and builds around the Main Character, who narrates. He is reluctant with the standards of the Otherworldly as his situation can be humorous at the expense of our Narrator.

Title: A Promise to Keep
Synopsis:
"I will prove you right."
Those were the last words he said, after getting involved with a sketchy organization, blowing up a forest, nearly assassinating a princess, and getting blamed for all of it. After watching a massive slaughter and getting his head cut off by a guillotine, he wakes up seven years later with a promise in his mind and a chance to fix it all.
---
This is not a wuxia. Please, I've had enough of Yun Che, so I'm not going down that path rest assured. Anyways, if you could all leave any criticism or comment in general, I'd be really happy about it.

Title: Heroes & Villains [Dropped]

In a world where ability-users are everywhere, he chose the heroic path but can he really continue on this path that he has chosen, or will he fail and ultimately be consumed by his terrifying power ?

Title: A Breath of Fresh Air

It took ten years for the radiation levels to drop enough for the government bunker to unearth. how will patriotic values cope amongst the 'savage' marauders?

Synopsis: A man reincarnated as a god in a world where magical races exis. Come and follow his journey through Alnizia and beyond to become a great god.

Title: Monster Creation?
Synopsis:
On a cold night much like this one, a homunculus child, the first and only of its kind, was born from a unexpectedly successful experiment. 
The first step was to create a soul. A molten mixture of 1 part ether, 1 part malium, and  and 2 parts gold was made and poured into a mana condenser. Colloquially speaking, one could say the ether was the “good” in a person, the malium “evil”, and the gold was the “courage” to overcome both good and evil.  Realistically speaking, these materials were found to keep mana signatures even while under high heat.
The second step was to create a mind. Tiny, tiny alchemical circles were painted onto the very atoms of the mixture, creating a neuron-like connection between the particles. The mana condenser was activated forcing the very image of a newborn human’s mind onto the molten-hot mixture as it slowly cooled and condensed the liquid into a round stone.
The final step was to create a body. One 10 liter vat of artificial slime was prepared to have very high surface tension, smooth, flesh-like texture, and a solution of enzymes that processed food into mana, processed mana into artificial slime and processed artificial slime back into mana.
The stone was carefully placed into the artificial slime and mana steadily added until it began to take the form of a normal baby boy. Two teary-eyed, parents stood before a now-crying baby. They felt a happiness and relief beyond measure at the sight of their newborn son.
They had no idea of the kind of monster they had created.

Title: Tyizor's Shorts (and Poems)
Synopsis:
I like shorts! They're comfortable and easy to wear write!
These are just a series of shorts that I've written at some point in time. They're just something to distract myself from the struggle of my main story (not posted on here yet). A few poems are mixed in as well.
Note: Tags/Genres have been picked, but some stories may be tagged independantly if the content is on the more disturbing side. ^^
Short stories that will be related to my main story will be tagged [EOS]
Short stories featuring some of my EOS characters in a story unrelated to the main one entirely will be tagged [eos]
Hope you all enjoy :).

Title: The Orphan Fox
Synopsis: Arin, an 8 years old boy, grew up as an orphan in Switzerland. Thanks to the Orphanage he lives in he could count as a lucky child. Sadly his legs were weak which could already be called completely crippled. Understanding his situation he still tries to do his best and uses his hands to craft all kinds of different objects. One day, just as he was about to join the other kids in a game in the garden, an event occurs that send him and the other on a Trip, none of them would easily forget.

Title: Psycho in Dragon Ball
Synopsis: Psycho reborn in Dragon Ball attempts to make himself the most infamous killer.

Title: Shori Quest- The Herones Series
Synopsis: The land of Hivoc has existed for many centuries with a vast and mystical history that has lead to it's current form. Magic and wonderful landscapes dominate it with a wide variety of different areas. However not is all well as a large culture of dark clans exist each causing chaos for the major official clans and territories. When an offical clan from the south of the continent acts unexpectedly against the offical clans, a student of a respected dojo finds himself caught in the middle of the conflict with an uncertain future lying ahead.

Title: Undeath: Kingdom
Synopsis: In a small village far from any major cities lived a man, this man was taught in the ways of the sword ever since he was a young lad. He not only knew how to use a sword but he could also manipulate mana but knew very little in the magical arts. But his life in this village would soon come to an end.

Title: No Name ( A Black Butler Fanfic)
Synopsis: She wakes up in the middle of a mansion, right beside a boy about three years older than her. Ciel is curious about the little girl who came out of no where and seems to have the power to see the future. What will this entail for the two?

Title: Wuxia fanboy reincarnated to a wuxia world
Synopsis: Ace Chamber, a fanboy of wuxia novels, wants nothing more than to be in those worlds as a main character. One night, while sleeping, he felt a pang in his heart and woke up moments later in an endless black void. He met a god in the void and was told he died due to the god's mistake and will be reprimanded with being reincarnated with his memories into the world of his choosing, he is also given to wishes for his new life. He happily accepts and begins a new life with exciting adventures and non-stop action on his way to becoming the strongest.

Title: The World Inside a Dream
Synopsis:
Lucius, a simple seventeen-year-old student, had a dream of another world that sparked his interest. The dream seemed to be no ordinary dream. Lucius could move without problem, use all five of his senses to their full potential, and fully remember what happened. But when he encountered a massive, strange flower, his life was changed forever. What seemed to be a normal dream turned out to be something much, much deeper than what he thought.
 
 
cover: https://nz.pinterest.com/pin/568157309227029694/
*Any and all things in this story are a work of fiction. Nothing is real, even if it takes place in the real world.*

Title: Out of Time
Synopsis:
The year was 2253.  The Earth was at war.  The governments on the planet had united into a single federation and the populace of the planet stood with a single goal - survival.  Humans, who are exceedingly talented at cruelty and warfare put aside their differences and worked together to defeat a common foe.  Scientific taboos were tossed to the wayside in order to help mankind win the war.  Victory was the only option. 
We lost and it's been over 50million years.

Title: U.H. (Ultimate Heroes)
Synopsis: It all started around 300 years ago. A child was born with unimaginable powers. He cast on the world a spell that made everyone who was born from then on have powers but none that shall rival his. After 200 years of people being born with powers, a school was made to teach these children to control their powers and become protectors of the world. This school is called U.H. Academy. The birhtplace for all heroes.

Title: Shadow Serpent
Synopsis: It is the year 2086. Teens from all countries flock to attend Mezzacon, the largest online gaming convention in the world. The game of the year is Shadow Serpent and the winner does not only take home the prestigious annual trophy but ten million dollars, the largest prize money pot in the history of Mezzacon. What's the catch? This year, if the player dies in the game, he or she won't be going home at all. So who is ready to play?

Title: How I Play Solo in an VRMMORPG
Synopsis: After years being unhappy, Markus wants to live his dream of traveling the world, creating art. But after a messy divorce, and tying his boss up before setting his desk on fire, a trip around the world was just not in the budget. Then he saw a commercial for a new VRMMORPG game and he came up with the idea of travelling around the world in a video game!

Title: The line between heroism and tyranny
Synopsis: Everyone knows that violence is a part of our human nature. Since the age of caveman we had evolved through the progress combat from wooden clubs to iron spears and from muskets to full-auto weapons. Now in society today violence is seen as a taboo and the urge to kill another has been extinct for a long time. However in some cases we still have that urge to shed blood. So I asked a question to myself after the first terrorist attack faced in my country happened, What I did was I being a human or a monster? Little did I know that God had a little surprise prepared for me just a few weeks after.

Title: The world is in your... roots?
Synopsis:
Luxmillia was always a bit of an oddball diety, known for experimenting with her world without regard for consequences.  This was very unfortunate for a certain man who was her champion, doomed to a life of tragedy to confirm a hypothesis, and further doomed to a life as a plant to satisfy her curiosity.  Follow him as he tries to win in a deific family's game while struggling with his past - and his future.
 
Author's Note - Always feel free to point out any errors you may find.  Understand the the story won't be in full swing till the third chapter.  I write in word and copy and paste, so spelling *should* be ok.  Thank you for reading!  This is my first work.

Title: The Magic Tower
Synopsis:
A thousand years ago a Tower appeared in the middle of a small village, from out of nowhere this giant piece of architecture that could not have possibly been built by humanity arrived. It was pitch black, as if there stood not a Tower of stone but rather a massive void that all of light and creation dared not touch.
105 floors of danger existed within this Tower, however with great danger comes great rewards for at the very top of this Tower was a Door, a Door that was half open and from that door there was something that leaked out and throughout the Tower. Humanity upon entering the Tower discovered what it was, it was a form of Energy that humanity named Mana.
A young man from a world beyond that universe, one from our very own and from our own planet at that, is transferred to this world, a world of Magic and Danger.

Title: The Supernatural in my Room
Synopsis: Ken finds someone unexpected in his home.

Title: Blood Queen
Synopsis:
Taken from their homes, used as nothing more than experiments but something happened in that dark room where the experiments took place, something that will change the world.
 
An: Synopsis in progress!

Title: A Destined Encounter and the Story after that
Synopsis:
Story of two boys....who wanted to protect the other.....the hurdles they face........... and the precious time spent by them,..together.....
......in the future they will be called .."The Broken Shards"..........both broken without the other.... and complete together.

Title: Chronicles Of The Storylord: 12th Chronicle - Origin
Synopsis:
Twelve souls were chosen to expand into the void surrounding the known universe(s), and were given a grace period in which they would experience a relatively safe expansion of their domains. Once that period is up, however, they are free to interact with each other...and what lurks in the depths of the Abyss, the Void, and the Primordial Chaos. I am the 12th soul, but I am not as those others are, for I am merely a shard. My purpose: begin the Tale anew. For I am the Storylord, and I am the Tale. The Tale is all, and all is the Tale, yet the Tale is myself, for I am all in my domain.
 
This is my story, the saga of many, the legend… of the Tale.

Just remember this: “This world is but a story, and all the stories are true...”

This story is in the same general multiverse as RE: Deity by lightningwarrior21, but will be almost completely separate except in a few chapters. I have permission from him to use his base multiverse, and you should go check out his fiction, it’s really good. http://royalroadl.com/fiction/9597 This ‘fiction’ will be updated sporadically, so don’t expect much of a steady stream of chapters. (I’ll try to do one chapter a week, but no promises.) Suggestions on how to improve this universe helps with the management, so comments are welcome, as are Grammar Nazis.
 
I’ve had this fiction mostly as scattered notes in my google drive, and only recently had enough time to actually put it together, like I promised lightning back in January. (Writer’s block and schoolwork do not mix well.) The cover is not owned by me, I found the image on google images.
 
Anyway, I’ll be back yesterday… or was that tomorrow? (I really need to get that damn causality generator fixed, me-damnit!) See ya!

Title: Wolfie's Rather Spectacular Adventure (In Space!)
Synopsis:
"Wolfie, I was wondering if you could tell me a story from your adventures?"
"Which one do you wanna know? The one where I was captured by giant Tolphian slugs and had to chew through the bindings to escape? Or the one where I was stranded on a tundra planet with nothing more than my clothes and a knife. Or perhaps the one where I won mega money at Oen's Lucky Star casino?"
"Can't you tell me all of them, Wolfie?"
"Where do I begin..."
 
Follow Wolfie, the halfbreed wolf-human, on his rather spectactular adventure through space. He does have a tendency to get himself into trouble, though. Trouble that, more often than not, results in him being passed between ships and communities.

Title: Heavenly Mage Shura
Synopsis:
In  the ancient times on the God Seeker continent.This continent is located on the eighth realm. There were many powerful mages and clans living on the continent.The mages at the pinnacle of sorcery were strong enough to cause the sea to be turned to lava with a sigh. The clans living in the ancient era were decendants of gods or acient divine beasts. 
    This story is about a boy born from two of the greatest clans in this era, named Ryu Shura . But before he could grow up in these clans a calamity befell upon the two clans causing the extinction of their races. Shura survives this catastrophe due to his parents sealing him in a sealing stone. A thousand years later Shura is found by a small clans elder.
Will Shura be able to climb to the top of the nine heavenly  and demon realms and find out what happened to his clan or will he be struck down in the cruel world of magic.

Title: Aozora of the Blue Sky
Synopsis:
Aozora, a world governed by humans and technology. After global heating reached a critical level, humanity decided on a plan to give parts of the world back to nature. Thus began the production of massive forests that replaced small towns, and super cities that built vertically to house the refugees. Small towns still exist in this world, often by the shore, an ideal location to monitor both sea and forest. These establishments are connected by a vast monorail service spanning the whole of Aozora.
Our story follows a young man named Blu. After receiving an interview for a job in the capital city, he boards the monorail...

Title: Skyfire Magus
Synopsis:
Lynne Hyorn, seventeen years old laziness-personified, manages to enter one of the four prestigious Academies for the Arts of Magic, Skyfire Academy for Magical Arts. However, unlike others, the reason he enrolled was not to pursue Magic, but rather because his father promised him hefty allowance if he manages to enter. His temporary tranquility soon comes to an end, though, as his father is drafted for war and his home is confiscated shortly after, leaving him to sleep on the streets. With no other choice, he decides to finally dedicate himself for the first time in his life, rising up from being just a lowly, Unranked Mage, to the ultimate guardian of the Academy: Skyfire Magus. 
A coming-of-age story set in a world of Magic follows young Lynne through the perils of strength, dedication, and world where fist isn't always the answer to every question. 
 ~If you find any mistakes, please do comment on them or send me a message. Even though I proofread my chapters, mistakes stay from time to time.~
Glossary of terms (may include spoilers): https://freelanceronfire.wordpress.com/skyfire-glossary/
 
~~COMPLETED~~

Title: The Chosen Ones (Cancelled)
Synopsis:
The world is inhabited by a subspecies of human, known as the chosen ones. These 'Humans' look and act the same to you and I, however they have one defining feature that separates them from us. Each Chosen one has a special power, unique to them alone. For example. One may have superhuman strength, while another may have the ability to control the elements.
Minato Katsuragi is one such person. He's had the ability to control the flow of time for as long as he can remember. From stopping to rewinding, he can do it all. With this ability in hand, he has cruised through middle school doing whatever he pleased.
However upon his first day of starting high school, he is challenged by someone with another power. Minato, using his power, easily defeats the challenger but draws the attention of other chosen ones.
Will Minato be able to return to his carefree life, or will it be changed forever?

Title: Monok's Bones: Transgression (sequel to Discovery)
Synopsis:
This is a continuation of Monok's Bones: Discovery and things may be confusing if you have not read the first one. There will also be spoilers for the story in this synopsis.
 
The horizon was filled with sails as the Armada came closer to shore. The promise of riches beyond anything they had imagined spurring them onwards. A giant skeleton, made of pure silver, had been discovered in the centre of the island, surrounded bu the cliffs they could see from shore. Francis watched them roll in from where he rested with the first expedition.
Innic allowed the humans to think what they will, he had other plans, and now that Ohenoki was out of the way he could start with his plans.
The only one who had been putting up a fight against the humans, Kabian, had been struck by a strange glowing ball and was now unconscious, with no signs of waking.
Tristram had been beside Kabian and was caught in whatever ailment had now befallen Kabian.
Arman, who had thrown a wounded Ohenoki from the top of the cliff, was heavily wounded himself and had no way off the cliff.
Morgan was patiently waiting at the bottom of the cliff for any word from above.
How are the wolves to deal with the fast approaching Armada when they could barely deal with the humans who had spilled from just two ships?

Title: Guardians Of The Helm
Synopsis: Humanity is forced to escape to another planet KC - 135. There they live peacefully for fifty years, protected by the Helm. But one day, their false sense of security is destroyed, as the barrier is broken. Will humanity survive, or perish?

Title: Nightwalkers
Synopsis: Jared Faram is a famous novelist who has decided to end his own life. Betrayed by everyone he trusted, he is rescued by the beautiful vampire Emily Orsh, who offers him a chance for revenge and redemption.Great powers are bestowed upon him, but the vampire world is not as sweet as expected.

Title: Fan'hel
Synopsis:
A procedure known as "Fan'hel" or Magic-Veins is a procedure that pulls the leylines directly from ones body and places them ontop of the body as a sort of tattoo. I has only ever been succesful on two people, Leon Ther'os Thal'al and the Hero of Old. In the efforts to create a Champion worthy of his arena, the Emperor uses his magic and the forbidden ritual on millions, killing all, but one. Leon Ther'os Thal'al, a dark elven man. After a few years time, Leon, became the ultimate crowd pleaser known for his brutality and his hatred for humans.
What the "Fan'hel" does is something of no simple manner. It makes the user stronger, faster, more agile, he resists magic at levels even the Dwarves couldn't handle! The mark also absorbs mana from spells/the environment giving the bearer an increased healing rate and a higher pain threshold.
Though these benefits seem astounding the cost to obtain the "Fan'hel" is something no one should have to suffer through. The markings from the "Fan'hel" causes the bearer's skin to feel as if an acidic solution is constantly being poured over their entire body. Due to the veins being ripped from their body, they can no longer cast magic of any kind and in trying can cause severe injuries to themselves. Using the "Fan'hel", Leon becomes the Ultimate Champion of the arena, but all he wants is freedom.
One day he obtains that freedom when a mysterious void opens up and calls to him.

This story is a culmination of a few different stories that i kept writing and then scrapped turning them all into ONE. The Warnings are there incase i try something and content with anything sexual will be marked. I'm not a great writer nor probabley even a GOOD one, but i wanted to try! If people would like to leave tips or suggestions i would love that. If you hate it or like it i NEED to hear(read?) those things to become better, so please let me have it! Also, this is  being written by me and only me at the moment so i have no proof-reader, so expect mistakes. I'm also SUPER DUPER incompetent so releases could be 0 a week or 2 or 6, it's whatever i feel like writing.
Oh and also if anyone wants to design a cover for this or draw what they THINK the characters look like (if i feel they're close and/or I like them) i'll notify you, make a link and give credit! (Not sure what that's worth, but eh.)

Title: The World of Epidemics in a Fantasy Universe!

Intro: 
A famous epidemiologist, who studied epidemics named Leon Berg. He was pretty much a loner, even before his parent’s death. He was a man of science, although he was mostly emotionless. He was very famous for his research, however he wasn’t interested in fame and thus built his own lab around his house, using his parent’s inheritance. He died due to his relative’s greed of his fortune and is reborn into a fantasy world. A world filled with mystery, gods, mythical creatures... Oh and lets not forget a world of endless bloodshed and carnage!

Title: Soul's Choice
Synopsis:
Vastoria is a world that is so advanced in technologies that it is possible to send a person's soul to a different world and universe. In order to keep the peace, they predestine the next stop for a person's soul at birth, only criminals do not get this privilege.
Sarah Dogswater is an aspiring scientist who wants to further the development of Soul Destination.  She is under the dissociative identity disorder, DID, as she has two distinct personalities. One wants to kill everyone who gets in their way while the other wants peace. The "stronger" side of her created a code that could make SD into a weapon that could destroy an organism's soul with a simple press of a button. However, the "weak" side of her destroyed the code and implanted a new one. 
Because of "their" mistakes, she had become a criminal.
Lightning Shadows, dogs who were experimented on, escaped from the lab, allowing her to emerge from her cell. After much difficulty, she is able to make it to Soul Destination and destroy it with her traveling to a different universe. 
___
I will say that the picture on the cover is not mine. I found it online, and the credit goes to whoever had created it. I had only added "Soul's Choice" onto it so that it would be a cover. 
There will be some choices the reader can make while reading. Although these choices will not influence the main story, it will allow a nice change of pace. 
The romance will be slow. It will not happen right when the story begins. Plus, it will not be "steamy" as some call it. All of those scenes will be done out of the text. Hugs and kisses will still be there, and some drama as well.

Title: Mesozoic Apocalypse
Synopsis:
Author's Note: This is my first attempt at a story. If you spot any mistakes please let me know and I hope if anyone actually reads this they will enjoy it as much as I hope i enjoy writing it. 

At the bottom of the food chain humans struggle to survive against the harsh conditions of this world. Every day is a brutal struggle where the weak become food for the strong. The humans are on the edge of extinction and are fighting on a daily basis for their own survival. They live in fear of the monsters during the day and they hide at the thought of the creatures that hunt in the night. I was born into a world of magic and monsters. This is my story.

P.s. I have wanted to be a writer ever since I was a child but never been brave enough to actually try and write anything. I got into webnovels a long time ago when I first started reading LMS. Title: Spawn Summoner
Synopsis: The apocalypse happened fast and angry, within a day, our population was cut down to 250 million. The cities were the worst, any city with over 1 million residents suffered from the attack of a monster. New York fell to the giants, Boston fell to a clan of dragons and LA was burned to the ground by a wave of undead. Across the seas, Beijing fell to 5 tribes of orcs, Shanghai was overrun by nests of giant spiders and Japan was wiped out by nests of harpies. I was lucky, I survived.

Title: The pale dungeon (dropped)
Synopsis:
Dungeons: environments rich in magic and rare creatures. It could be said that a dungeon is alive and somewhat sentient. It can aid the creatures within itself and order them around to some degree. The creatures and plants within a dungeon determines its intelligence and power. Most dungeons alter its inhabitants to achive greater power and intelligence as they evolve, but some have the ability to claim creatures from the outside that find their way into the dungeon if the right conditions are met.
So what happens when a young werewolf lands in its grasp?

Title: Innate Light
Synopsis:
This is a story inspired by one of my favorite poems: "Ozymandias" by Percy Shelley.  Setting aside the known historical background of the poem, this is a fantasy setting that tells of the rise of a powerful spellcaster by the name Light, establishing a reputation the likes of Ozymandias at his height.
 
 Cover:
The cover is called Alpine Autumn, created by Ryan Bliss over at DigitalBlasphemy.   This is one of his free images, and I highly encourage you to check out all the amazing images he's created over at his website.

Title: Bloodborne
Synopsis:
What if you hear about a place where men could reach immortality? What if you're a man with nothing to lose? Only one last chance at getting your life back? Surrgit, desperate to find a cure for his mortal disease, sets sail towards the fabled city of Yharnam. The city of healing and miracles. The city of Legends...
 
The story is a fan fiction inspired by the events occuring within the game: Bloodborne © made by From Software. Places and some characters are taken from the game world. The story of the main character on the other hand is fictional. 
The book cover is made by Snatti89 on Deviant Art. 
 
Upload time: Daily

Title: Midnight Moonlight
Synopsis:
Abigail is not afraid of anything in particular. She’s just… afraid. All the time. Of everything and everyone. She weaves wild stories to explain her state of perpetual anxiety to the people around her, preferring they treat it as a joke than treat her as a neurotic freak. It’s a plan that works well enough: with a little help from her best friend Megan, Abigail can almost pretend to be normal.
But when Megan decides to help out with Abigail’s love life, Abigail finds herself trapped on a date with a ridiculously sexy man who accidentally lets slip that some of the things Abigail has “made up” are true – and that the rest of the truth is stranger than her fiction.
Suddenly thrown into a world that has turned out to be crazier than she is, Abigail is going to have to learn to cope with werewolves, vampires, faeries, and being passionately kissed – and she’s going to have to learn fast, because there is a shadow war that has been roiling through the background of history, and she’s just come to the attention of all the players.

Title: Game Changer - Day Dreams
Synopsis:
The greatest foe that man shall face lies within himself: his own mind. It can contort the world around him and make friends seem like enemies. Most often times we cannot see these delusions for what they are, the daydreams and the nightmares; and worst of all the crushing despair that cloys all we do and makes it seem for naught. 
One such soul in the depths of his own despair met an untimely end, but with his dying breath he made a plea, a plea to live. And so it was a being, neither human nor god or anything inbetween chose to save a life out of pity. But it did not understand the consequences of its actions, the changes a single life could bring. Like a pebble dropped into an ocean, first a ripple, then a wave, and soon all the lands of the world would be drowned before its might...
So begins a new life, in a new world. While those who once knew him call it a game he calls it home. Now the question will arise, how far will he go to defend it.

However, when Faireblot academy, one of the top three schools of magic, announces it will accept a single commoner child among their noble ranks he decides to take his chance.
He must travel across the country, alone, to be tested. If he succeeds he will be tossed into the political games of the nobles only with the hope, he can survive.

Title: re:memories
Synopsis: Maybe when other people die they at least have the satisfaction of leaving the world quickly or have peaceful death. She had neither her death was slow and painful a prisoner of her own soul and physical body beaten by her own mother for her looks.Her white eyes with a sliver of black straight line in the middle from the top of the eye to the bottom .She gave off a air of apathy after a year of her own mothers abuse the pain nullified but after five years when she turned sixteen she died from poison the poison slowly melted away at her insides but she was happy the thought of leaving her mother who hit her left he outside when it was snowing and let her freeze and after stuffed needles inside her intestines not enough to kill her no only enough to drive her to the point of deaths bed before she nursed her back to health her mother kept saying the same line "this is for your own safety" or "it hurts me more than it dose you" each time her mother would sing a song into her ear a wonderful song her mother was once a singer before she got fired and started to abuse her but just as she was dying she started to hear that song in her ear that god damned song but everything around her was turning white and she started to hear a person speak "congratulations you have died" the voice mocked her "your talk with the mad jester will now begin" and then she saw a man sitting in the air but it's not as if she could say exactly it looked like it but everything was white so he could have been sitting on a chair that's white as well An:I write for the sake if writing don't expect too much as I am just an aspiring writer who wants to know what other people think of said writing that being said this story won't be nice or forgiving the main character has a broken heart as well as no soul from the time spent with her mother and for all intense and purposes I will call her monster for she has been called that instead of her name Or until she gets a new name

Did you think fate want to be bothered with that many jobs? There is no way the mighty Primordial of Fate, Moirai, able to complete that many jobs even if she is a Primordial. Title: Onslaught.
Synopsis:
Everything, be it good or bad, comes to an end, just as VRMMO Onslaught which was both the most popular and immersive game known in 2067. Having more freedom than any other game of that time it offered players a chance to become something that was not yet possible in real life, Explorer. The players could be of one from around a hundred different species and their variations, including some that were clearly of fantasy origins besides simple aliens, like undead, spirits or regular parasitic aliens.
Unfortunately the game had quite a broken balance, which favored those of skill or those with enough money, but even in this case it was rather popular. But it was over thirty years ago. Now Onslaught was going to close, and with it the new story would be born, though no one told the players about it...
***
This story was influenced by "Crushed into fantasy", "Overlord" and some other stories which names I already forgot... Side project, will be updated slowly.

Aias was brought up in an orphanage for children who were left behind in war. He and the rest in the orphanage were trained since joining to become strong capable warriors so that no other children would have to lose their families. Most who were brought up in the orphanage decided to become soldier, generals, or knights, but Aias wanted to see the world! When he turned sixteen he would go out for his own adventure. This is his story!

Title: Welcome to the New Earth!

Title: The Void Wolf

Romanised Japanese - English meaning/ equivalent

Title: You World
Synopsis:
You were web surfing on RoyalRoad, wondering about what kind of crap you will stumble across while you searched for your daily dose of stories, seemingly with nothing better to do in your life.
While scrolling down that never ending list of novels, you noticed a novel named ‘You World’ which immediately grabbed your interest, and decided to click on it – yeh, you and that curiosity of yours.
You waited for the page to load, then began reading the synopsis with maximum concentration. By now you are probably wondering why this novel is written in the 2nd person perspective and why the hell the narrative has suddenly changed from the past to the present tense – or what kind of weed this author smoked while writing this.
While lost contemplating, an invisible force attacks your body, ripping your soul apart. Your body doesn’t feel anything but your conscious fades away as your precious soul is taken away from you, somewhere far and far away…
 
[small hiatus - working on a more serious project :)]

Title: I need to repair the gods of a world?!

Have you hear of those mass summoning? And what about a class summoning?.
Yeah, maybe you’ll think I’m crazy, thats something is wrong on my head, obviously everyone had hear about them, how an entire class is summoned and they fight for a kingdom, a race or even a world.
Sometimes they all die, even if they lose or win, sometimes they managed to live an return to their world, or they start to live in a new world. But sometime they are betrayed, the world they have saved stab them, or they are enslaved…
Yeah… I know what you think, “why is he talking like that?” or even something like “who is he talking to?” those are some questions filling your head.
Well, I will tell you my story… an story that began in another world…
Eh? You already heard that?

Title: Malhar's Totems
Synopsis: Four teenagers are kidnapped from their contemporary lives and transported into a game world designed by a mysterious person who always speaks of The Prophecy of Doom. This person has designed the game world by predicting how the earth was going to be a thousand years from now. The overarching storyline of the game world takes elements from Hindu mythology and inserts creatures and monsters into the gaming universe where the teenagers have been catapulted to. Every one of them has to complete daily missions and increase their levels to such an extent as to face the most powerful demon of all times, the great Kali. Even as the gaming universe attempts to prepare the teenagers to prepare for the coming of an eventual apocalypse, the kidnapper has to contend with the authorities and other external supernatural forces who are trying to hamper his objective. Will his game world be successful in its attempts? Will the infamous Prophecy be fulfilled? Will the kidnapper be able to achieve his mission on earth?

Title: The Author
Synopsis:
I am what I am.
 
I am many, I am no one.
 
I can be the bard, the poet, telling tales of yore, from here to yonder.
 
Or I can be said person living said myths.
 
For I am the Author and the Author is who I am.

Title: A Life's Lie
Synopsis:
What if you found out your whole life was a lie? What if you found out this world would have everything if enough people believed on it?
A World were religion reigns, people live in extreme poverty in favor of their lords, who shall scavange whatever they can for themselves. Follow our hero in an adventure to end this mad rule of the corrupt Estian Senate, until he discovers that all religions can be true if enough people believe in it, draggin him into a much larger Conflict!

Title: Agordos
Synopsis: A boy, after losing his loved ones, enters a new world. Now, with just a black feather and mysterious power risiding in him, he goes on the path of revenge? but definitely his fate gonna make him face his new destinies.

Title: My Life As A Superhero Slash Supervillain
Synopsis:
James Jude Jamison is experiencing something a bit odd. He was sitting quietly at his computer desk, playing some kind of RPG, he couldn't which one, although the fate of the universe rests on him remembering which (Oh well, it had to end sometime). So, anyway, suddenly, out of nowhere, he got a bit of a headachne, his nose started to bleed, he then proceeded to make a mess in the family room at the computer room. His mom shouted at him, then he died.
Then he woke up.
He was reborn. Only he had a UI screen suddenly at the edge of his vision. What the hell. He was meant to have some cool powers, like lazers that shot out of his nipples, maybe some mad dancing skills. He would finally be able to speak to girls without laughing in their faces. Sigh.
So this is his story, of how he couldn't decide which career prospect appealed to him more. So he decides to give both being a hero and a villain a go. What could go wrong?
 ***
Edit: 2017.06.18 - 03:08 am EST - JJ seems to have buggered off somewhere without telling me where he went. So I am going to have to piece together this story back from the start with the fragments that he gave me. I will leave the original chapters up, but I will be renaming them so they are obvious if new readers don't want to read them.
I am currently trying to write chapter one anew. It will feature new reasons of why JJ starts with the villainous lifestyle first, and the reasons of why he is granted the power he was given.
If JJ does come back, I will inform you thusly. Then it will be decision of writing from where he left off or telling him to go choke on his own c**k. If I do decide to take the story up, then it will be a decision of to split the stories in two, and if to keep my version alive and concurrent.
Thanks.

Title: Red Mantis and Avenger Doll
Synopsis:
"Anything can be a dildo if you're brave enough." That is the motto Red Mantis lives by - and she is the bravest of them all. The nymphomaniac inter-dimensional assassin for hire, also known as Olethea Sykoria in most worlds, is on an endless quest to discover the highest form of pleasure, which generally means getting it on with anyone and anything that can give it to her. She has a steep fee and only takes jobs she finds interesting, but when she boasts a 100% success rate, her customers never have reason to complain.Cynicism. Cheek. And a serious personality streak. These were the ingredients chosen to create the perfect sassy girl. But Meakashi added an extra ingredient to the concoction... Meta Knowledge. Thus, the Avenger Doll was born! With her fourth-wall breaking, Ootsuki Senka has had her life dedicated to becoming the straight girl in this dimension-traveling duo. The only reason she is going along with Olethea's antics is that the author forces her to do so, but maybe she will develop a deeper connection to her new partner.
Follow the inter-dimensional misadventures of a resourceful but sex-addicted elf, and a cynical, sassy genre-savvy cursed doll, as they carve their names into the legends of the multiverse - as troublemakers and a menace to society. Maybe the assassin for hire will discover more to live for than just ephemeral pleasure. Maybe the doll girl will finally find the reason for her tortured existence.
Whatever the case, the one guarantee is that there will be plenty of cynicism, killing, sex, and breaking the fourth wall.
 
_________________________________

Title: Collision of Fate
Synopsis:
Laila Bryne was going nowhere with nothing to lose.  Dead end job, dead end future.  Trapped in an old fashioned American town she knew she would never escape from.  The wasteland of middle-america, where the only things seen are desperate faces, suburban neighborhoods, and golden arches.  Life could not be any more monotonous, not to mention she has to take care of her sickly mother.  She sits at the counter of the local Grab'n Save convenience store each day praying for something to happen.  An armed robbery, a handsome stud, a heroic act...Anything.  Little does she know that when she drove home that night, she would leave this earth to go to the land of 'Anything'.  Elendil, the cosmic sandbox, which most would describe as a "lawless, chaotic world", will be her new home.  Conquer or die.
****
Brian locke was graduating high school.  Four years of hijinks and senior pranks and he would "piss out of his stupid ass town to greener pastures", as he so eloquently put.  He was college bound and ready for a change, but change would not encounter him in the way he expected.  Driving to his ceremony at the highschool gymnasium with his parents and litte brother in the backseat, he suddenly saw a pair of headlights in the oncoming traffic.  Thus began the end of Brian's budding future.  The descent into darkness which began with a simple little *crash*.  The only future which Brain will seek is revenge, for his...Misfortune.
****

Except: Spoiler



I’m floating
In the blackness of nothing I am floating.
Neither a sound nor a feeling, this place has nothing whatsoever.
My mind is an expanse of empty space, void of any semblance of idea or personality –A blank canvas, ready to be shaped into anything imaginable.
Suddenly, the sound of a desperate unearthly gasp for air rang thorough the darkness, violently crashing into my being. It screams through my mind, bringing with it a myriad of information.
Knowledge is injected into me at an alarming and confusing rate –the vast majority of which is exceedingly general –and I inexplicitly possess an understanding of atomic theory, as well as the basics of relativity, mathematics, biology and countless other fields.  
Over in a second and I am left in a state of tense hyper alertness –completely still in the abyss with my non-existent eyes clenched tight. Then, the memories come –and with them one final piece of information is imparted unto me and I know where I am.
I have died –and this is Limbo.
Though given no inkling of how or when, I know that I had ceased to live at some point –of that I am certain. I do remember not my name nor my circumstance, and even the manner of how I lived my life is a mystery –my very species in question. However, one thing is forever burnt into my memory –my very being –and that is the White.
I remember coursing through that accursed stream of white fluid –the ethereal substance brushing past me as I fell through endlessly.
I was only half aware when –after I had flowed across its endless Elysian gases for untold ages –the barely present liquid thickened into tangibility and I slowed. Almost coming to a stop, I pass through what can only be described as a corporeal lens flare –seeping through the outer membrane of the universe. Compared to the aforementioned sensations, this was as if passing through stone.
Through the White had been arduous, the result has been worthwhile. For I have passed on to another world.
I have reincarnated.

Synopsis:
Everyone dies. That is a matter of life. But if that started to happen every second around you? That surely isn't. With the introduction of Earth to the near omnipotent system, humans learned one thing. The peace we have is nothing but a flimsy cover for the grander scale of things.
Death became too common, too common to be said dying a normal death. Death tolls soared through the limits, and soon even the death tolls stopped. No one just cared anymore.

Title: The Real Life Manga
Synopsis:
Akio Fujimara is a normal 19 year old teenage boy who spends a lot of time with his best friend Sashi Sugiyama.
Akio writes manga, as a part time job & is getting quite good at it. One day when he and Sashi got home from school Akio's PC gets hacked & there is a strange new program & text file on his PC, telling him to finish his new manga.
Akio did, but what happens after is something no one would even think was possible. His manga might just have becomen real life.

Title: Wilma's War
Synopsis:
When Wilma Dern left her home planet of Aldune, she never imagined that life could get any harder. Where at home, she had endured the devastating blows of losing a child and then divorce, here on Jangeroo she was fighting to keep her life.
Wilma sought solace and healing by running an inn on the barnium ore-rich planet of Jangeroo. She quietly endured the presence of the occasional miner as they rested from their travels on their way to the mines.
She worked a small mine in back of the inn, with hopes of striking enough of the mineral to afford a trip to another more hospitable planet. Wilma was already a strong woman, having been an intergalactic MMA sensation in her day. Working the mine brought new strength to her already athletic body. Little did she know she would ever need again, her martial arts capabilities.
Until she struck it big. Hitting a vein of barnium that would let her live the life she wanted, anywhere in the galaxy.
But the Chang Cartel got word of it and they wanted more than a part of her find. They wanted it all, thinking Wilma would be easily walked on. Nothing short of a war ensued, tearing apart Wilma's life as she annihilates scores of her opposition in a running fight that took her over most of the planet.

Title: When The Sword Falls
Synopsis:
Four years ago, many watched as an island fell from the sky. It landed in the middle of an enormous lake and caused a lot of destruction near the shore. But Ander and Emilia were found on the lakeside by a passerby and brought to the nearby town. When they woke up, they both discovered they had amnesia. They also come to find that they both have exceptional combat prowess. Time passes and now they live outside the town with their daughter Mila. But after all these years, the island wakes up and the world will soon know it's power. What did Ander and Emilia forget? What is the true nature of the island? And most importantly can they survive the coming storm, when their past threatens everything they hold dear? 
When your past threatens your present what will you do? The MC has lived in ignorance of his past with his wife and daughter. But now that past will come to claim them again. An old conflict revived, the MC must choose between duty and family as they both try to tear him apart.
