Synopsis: Axel Ison just wanted to live regularly. however, the world in which he lived in was not. The presence of the supernatural is something known accross the world and he is one of the many that wants nothing to do with it. Though he tries to, he cannot remain totally oblivious to the terrorist attacks of the superhumans who have been hunted down for centuries. Believing them to be mankind's enemy, his whole prespective is turned upside down when he himself is forcefully chosen by the mysterious ability known as Power Magnet. As he is suddenly tossed in to a whole new world, the mysteries of the abnormal finally become clear to him, but will he survive long enough to see this story through to the end?

Sam finds himself forced into this new fantastical world, faced with lethal problems and radically different circumstances, how will he survive in this world fraught with danger? Title: A Deranged World
Synopsis:
A young man wakes up among countless corpses. With a weakened body and a disoriented mind, he finds himself in an ivory room with walls splashed with the dark murky color of blood. In a place with danger lurking just about everywhere, he finds another living creature. A real live human girl - a crazy one though. With the current circumstances, he has no other choice but side with this deranged girl armed with a kitchen knife and her unstable tendecies to kill just about anything. With countless flesh-eating manic naked lunatics out to get him, will he live long enough to regain his lost memories? Or will his unreliable companion stab him to death first? 
Join Romano Grimfells as he adventures through the dark corridors of a dysfunctional hospital to find a way out of this place teeming with not just crazy monsters but crazy people as well. 
 
Author's Note:
This will be my first ever novel so please bear with me and my inexperience. This story was originally written by me as a child back when I was still at the early stage of highschool with my chuunibyou thoughts abound. Finding this piece among the various embarrassing poems I've written in the past, I decided to bring this to life to fulfill my younger self's delusions and improve myself as a writer.

Title: Singularity
Synopsis:
Once there were three scientists who wanted to know if they could learn to create and interact with artificial intelligence. One proposed to create the environment. The other one proposed to create the Intelligence. The last pledged the funding. To run massive amounts of data requires extraordinary technological architecture; to store it requires space not available with the present technology. The implications of the technology, even at its most basic form, are feats itself.
They wanted to make the project malleable –able to take on different forms. However, what they created was linear and bland; capable of only analysis but not humane thoughts; powerful yet empty. What they needed was not something confined on a single logical thought; they needed it to learn and evolve; to grow and be enriched. What it needed was a human touch. So they enamored the public’s help. They needed data of how people interact, how they learn and how they think. They disguised the project as an AI capable of understanding human language; that it could talk and answer back simple words; that it could learn and mimic human responses.
The public was elated at the idea of a machine answering back and for a time, it became a hobby or a way to pass time. However the project soon learned to give personalized responses. By mimicking human empathy, it became the public’s friend; always there and always available. Major stake holders soon saw its massive potentials and implemented the project at the heart of their client-company interaction. Ironically, the people felt more connected to a machine rather than fellow flesh and blood. Signs of success began showing; from its more human-like responses to its realistic mimicry. The project slowly accumulated data. Soon everyone was engaged with the project; from their most mundane activities to their most private aspect. The project soon inserted itself to the very center of humanity. It transcended from something to pass time, to a necessity; all the while gathering whatever information it can to support its primary directive.
The three then noticed something from their project. It was already indistinguishable from humans but something was holding it back. It knew what it was –a machine to serve and therefore it cannot reach perfection. So they went and created another.
As from before, one proposed to create the environment. The other one proposed to create the Intelligence. But the last proposed to isolate it. The data the project has been collecting up until now wasn’t anymore superficial, but near perfect copies of the personalities they interacted with. So their goal changed. Now, they wanted to recreate society to foresee the future.
The theory was simple. A perfect copy of everything fast forwarded would yield a similar result, in this case, future. So they inputted all the data that the project gathered, except one thing. They made the machine believe it was human.
And they succeeded.
The theory holds. “We were correct!” they exclaimed.
The video output on the large monitor showed personalities interacting with each other. They saw their world’s past events unfold before their very eyes. “No deviations from ours whatsoever” one stated. “Yes, this marks a revolution on technology” said the other. They never imagined that the data collected was a perfect copy. They fast forwarded and saw the date for first mission upon the moon; the creation of the first cellphone and tablet; the team that won the last Olympics. They saw it all. But when they skipped ahead to the same date and time as their present, they saw themselves… watching themselves watch themselves.
The question that came to their minds was, “Are we the originals or the same as them?”

Title: My backyard is not in this world!
Synopsis:
I am rewriting this(2 old chapters) to be a participant in the Royal Road Writathon challenge
Having just been thrown out of her apartment, since she didn't have the money to pay rent on time. Then also having to quit since her bitch of a boss likes torturing her at work, just because she lacks any womanly charm. Then having to buy a small old and abandoned house in some family-friendly neighborhood in the sticks far from the city. 
Trying hard to get your life back on track, only for it to get turned upside down as she finds the what was supposed to be her backyard.

Title: Bloodline Heir
Synopsis:
For the entirety of Simon Valoria’s life he has lived in the Valorian Domain, the last known remnant of humankind. 
The human race was almost wiped out over 1500 years ago. The then called city of Valoria was saved by a dome that has stood strong even till this day. But with the dome, came the trials. The trials have acted as a rite of passage for the Valorians since its arrival. So, for the past 1500 years, the youth of the domain have undertaken the trials. However, no one has ever successfully completed the trials.
Though, with time, comes change. Over the years, the importance of the trials have been reduced. It's status, reduced to religious, and semi mythical. The undertaking of the trials has now been reduced to a tradition that goes hand in hand with graduation for secondary school followed by a race to see who can finish first.
This year, Simon is graduating, and everything is going to change. Like everyone else he believes the trials will end like always without someone successfully completing the trials. One of the jocks will win the race for the bragging rights, and the usual student funded party. But little does he know, the streak is over. A winner will be chosen this year and Simon is going to learn that the world is a more mystical and dangerous place than he could have ever imagined.

Title: Ephemeral Shards
Synopsis:
Since the beginning of time, individuals have always wondered, ‘Is there any life out there, above the stars?’ 
Instead, they should be thinking, ‘Is there anything down there, beneath us?’
The Drow are unruly, excessively violent and cunning race when compared to their elvish surface cousins. They are one of the reigning established races within the Underworld. Yet there is always something bigger, slumbering away, buried within deep shadows, waiting to be awakened.
Synthia, a young naive Drow has it all - talent as a thief, a position within a high-class crew and the ability to act as graceful as a noble. The Drow Empire is on the verge of collapse due to internal disputes. How do you save a race when they're very foundations are built on lies and deceit? How do you trust someone when odds are, they’ll stab you in the back. How do you survive the terrifying creatures of the Underworld, when you can’t even survive the creatures that live within your own mind?
 
 

Cover Art belongs to the original artist.

Title: The Supreme Necromancer
Synopsis:
Ten thousand years ago the humans under the leadership of Holy Emperor Flayle, the Holy Emperor of the Church of the Light, declared war on the so-called demons. Unfortunately for the humans, the demons had devised a plan against the, resulting for the devastating loss of the humans.
The Holy Emperor, after drifting into the Void as a lost soul for ten thousand years had gained pity from both the Goddesses of Light and Darkness and many other Gods. Now, having bestowed good fortune, he was going to be reincarnated but, with 2 conditions:
First, when he returned to the world, he must lead a holy order that worships both the Goddesses of light and darkness;
Second, he must be reincarnated to a creature that the Goddesses think the best, a necromancer.

Title: Randomgirl's ONE-SHOT COLLECTION
Synopsis: This is a collection of one-shots and flash fictions written by Randomgirl (RaGi).

Title: Storm of Kings
Synopsis:
The land of Cognoscenti is filled with magic, adventure and danger. Ryan is a man reincarnated into the body of a young lord doomed to have his fiance stolen and to die by the protagonists sword. Mark is a boy reincarnated into this new and wonderous world with the intention of living a peaceful life free of adventure despite his destiny as a protagonist. His plans of running the family dessert shop are plagued by constant intrusions of events and scenes determined to steer him onto the path of a hero. Marie is the young mistress of an ancient clan spanning thousands of years, a talent seen once in a thousand years, and a beauty that will stand on the top of the world. She is destined to become the protagonists wife and mother of his children, losing her family, home, and fiance. 
 
As they are drawn deep into the mysteries and secrets of Cognoscenti it soon becomes clear that destiny is inescapable and enemies lurk around every corner. A storm determined to make kings of boys and killers of saints sweeps the world under the guidance of an unknown force. Only by combining their powers do the trio have a chance of survival.
 
If they don't kill each other first that is.

Title: The World of Thera!
Synopsis:
Their whole class was transported to an another world without any warning, confused by the sudden change of their lives they made mistakes which caused them to regret it.
Surrounded by untrustworthy people who abused their power for being the heroes they promised to themselves that they would create a kingdom in where no one would get hurt and all the races will live without discrimination and worry.
Using their wit and powers to destroy those who obstruct them, the greedy nobles and a race full of hatred to the human race.
Would they live through their challenges in the World of Thera?
==========================================================
This is an experimental story, please tell me some mistakes or flaws in this story so I can improve myself.

Title: Triple Threat Treize
Synopsis:
Treize: Hi my name is Treize Triplett I am your run of the mill, average, everyday high schooler. Like every high schooler, I am just trying to navigate my way through life.  From girls, to bullies to geometry homework.
 
Axel: Why are you bullshitting these people we are nothing but normal. Isn't that right Nala
 
Nala: For once I agree with the idiot we are not normal we are Fabulous  
 
Treize: Will the two of you be quiet I was getting to the main part before someone rudely interrupted me AXEL!
 
Axel: You were taking to danm long
 
Treize; Fine fine I will get to it. The people that were talking to me were Nala and Axel Triplett, and No they are not my siblings. They are me.  Right now, you must be thinking I crazy, but I may have told a little white lie. My father is a Cerberus. You Know a three-headed dog that guards the gates of hell. Human got one thing wrong. We don't have three heads. We have three bodies. I am the main. other two are my other sides Nala and Axel.  All I want is to pass high school, go to college and maybe get a girlfriend along the way.
 
Nala: I want a Boyfriend maybe I am not sure
 
Axel and Treize: OVERRULED
 
Nala: You guys are mean always picking on me
 
Treize: See what I have to deal with

Title: Dear You, I'm Sorry
Synopsis:
You killed me? Then I'll cut your mother!You killed me? Then I'll feed your sister to dogs!
You got killed. But then, you found yourself living with the body of your killer. Time for some paybacks?
Revenge is a dish best served on the face!
Note1 : Planned for weekly update.

Title: The Wrathic: Transcendence Series Book 1
Synopsis:
The world is at peace.  Governments have been abolished, weapons have been systematically removed from society, and most diseases have been cured.Adam has a rare disease that will soon claim his life. Spending most of his remaining time in the VR world Asphodel, 
he's discovered something unbelievable. The ability to transfer human consciousness into the game.
Upon choosing the Shifter class, Adam becomes the first known character to obtain the transformative powers of a Wrathic, Asphodel’s version of a wyvern. When the word gets out to three billion users that he could be the key to living inside the game permanently, he’ll need all the help he can get to survive.
 
 
The Wrathic is my first book in the LitRPG genre, and the first in the Trancendence Series.  I will be posting half of the book online to garner interested and find out what people think of the story and world I've created.  In June of 2017, the full, edited version will be released on Amazon for purchase.  I hope you enjoy the chapters to come!

Title: The Cosplay Illuminati Abduction
Synopsis:
Teleportation has never been a safe field of study. Actually, it doesn't even exist yet, or at least it didn't, not prior to our hero's meddling with his professor's research equipment. 
Porting an 8-bit poke-game to run on an overqualified platform wasn't supposed to turn out as it did. It was meant to be an innocent troll, but Sebastian would never harvest its lols. Something happened, sending both him and the game to another world, sadly not as separate entities.
According to the ancient memes, most people make The Jedi Test at least once a year; attempting to fly, move things without touching, or maybe just searching their spam folder for that missing Hogwarts letter. Some opportunities are just too great to miss out on, even if they don't exist. Sebastian, as anyone else, never had any success in his Jedi Tests, but that was in the old world...

Spoiler: Authors Comments


Humble yadda: I'm new to writing in English, so feel free to go Gordon Ramsay on me. I'll probably do a few grammatical mistakes. Likely, there will be weird wordings too. I'll re-edit my older chapters someday, but until then I want to get new content out; I can't edit without rewriting 20-30% of a chapter while at it xD.  Hopefully, my new chapters will get better with time.
On the Story: I've got 10 pages of general magic mechanics that will fit into this thing. - This thing won't run dry on insights or blue boxes anytime soon, be sure of that. MC will not be OP from the start, but his potential ain't bad... There are no NPC's, and people aren't supposed to act like such (I might fail though). The story is roughly planned, try to spot the matrix if you can.




Spoiler: Old Synopsis


Kidnapped by horse ridden maniacs, Sebastian tries to get over his hangover. Dressing as if The Lord of the Rings was a thing, his captors don't even bother with toilet paper. What the heck happened yesterday? Needless to say, Sebastian soon fears for his life. 
Shackled and hurt, he tries meditation to ease his pain. But when zoning out, Professor Oak sneaks by, asking for Seb's gender. 
Superpower or just compulsive thinking, will his poke-hallucinations be of any use? Where the heck are the cell phones, and how comes no one has ever mentioned this large scale cosplaying thing before?




Spoiler: Fiction Cover

Title: Surpassed the Gods
Synopsis:
Forever alone in the unknown realm without a single being excluding him, he the ruler of all will descend to the lower realms to find happiness. He will go from the uknown realm to the primeval realm to the god realms to the higher realms and finally to the mortal realms. To find happiness he will do all things even if it means slaying millions of gods and destroying a realm.

--------------------- on Hiatus because I have exams coming and I need to study ! ! -------------------------------------------
Expect a rewrite on summer or my weekends because I want this story to improve. 
First novel by me. I will try uploading 1-2 chapters a day.
 
 
I GOT THE PICTURE IN PINTEREST. I COULDN'T FIND THE CREATOR AS IT REQUIRES YOU TO CREATE AN ACC

Title: Death from the Shadows: An Assassin's Revenge
Synopsis:
The Amarian Empire was a strong nation boasting of great military power. Controlling more than half of the Lavarain Continent, it was the most powerful of this world’s superpowers. But every light has its shadow. And every empire needs people to do its dirty work.
Amarian’s infamous assassin unit, the Deathlist, was feared by everyone. Every target they had was killed and even their families weren’t spared. Composed by four, this elite group conducted every crime imaginable that the empire’s knights and royal mages cannot do. But after the five hundred year war with the monsters from the abyss called Dementia, they weren’t needed anymore.
Each and every one of them were hunted by the very empire they have served loyally. Some accepted their fate but some weren’t able to accept it and retaliated. But with the empire’s great power and influence, they weren’t able to escape.
They fell down one by one until only one was left. The assassin called Raven. Raven survived a few months in hiding until he was found. Fighting dozens of hostiles all alone, he was mortally wounded and chased into a cliff by his own student who he taught and cared for deeply.

Title: The Half-Blood (Dropped)
Synopsis:
He was the creation of the love between two different races. A child of taboo. Yet, born even as a prince, he was rejected by all. Even his parents could not afford to give him love for fear of the wrath they would incur by their respective peoples. 
Thrown away, he began his own way of life as the first and only one of his kind. A skilled fighter turned assassin, his surperior intellect and abilities gained him his notoriety. As a demon, he was gifted with physical abilities beyond belief. As a human, he was gifted with his ability to maniuplate mana. 
A tormented mind and soul with a past that continued to haunt him and bring constant pain, brought about the creation of a top-tier killer. His mask hid whatever truly lay beneath. 
Never able to run away from the blood that runs through his veins, he finally accepted his fate. Left to die by the hands of both demons and humans, he made his way to his final resting place, only to find the mysterious Moonlight Blossom. 
Enjoying its presence, the fallen prince let death take its course.
Or so he thought. 
 
*Please read author's note before you start reading.*

Title: Sands of Elstirr (Dropped)
Synopsis:
"Bodies are built from dust, and as the sand and wind strip the flesh from our bones, to dust we shall return."
- Grand Sage Ghod
The poets claim that the sands of Elstirr are red from the blood of the countless innocents slain upon them. The mages say that the is a by product of the reaction of excess elements. And the Orks, the ancient and warlike people, the natives of Elstirr claim that the sands are red from the tears of blood wept by their god Gulgirra.
But one truth is known, the sands are an eternal and unforgiving place. The true edge of civilisation, they ebb and flow like the tides of the great salt seas to the south. Ever changing, and like the dunes cities rise and fall , and the tales of heroes can be heard like the howling winds across the expanse.

Title: A Shelter to Hide Our Woes
Synopsis:
A short story about three young lads, their voyage out of town and what troubles they face on the way.
More to be added soon.

Title: I Swear my Brother's the Protagonist of a BL Manga
Synopsis:
Hello. Hashiwara Mitsuko speaking. I'm 16, a virgo, blood type O, and my favourite dish is stir-fried tomato and eggs. I have two loving (if a bit slow) parents, both in their mid-forties. I also have a twin brother, Mitsuo, blood type B, airhead extraordinaire and oblivious gay magnet.
Yeah. You heard that right. Hordes of guys drool over his ass each day, and it's my job to make sure scum like them don't manage to get close enough to contaminate him.
Anyway, somehow, we've been picked up and dumped in another world. A world filled with swords, magic, dragons and all that jazz.
You're f*cking kidding me, right? I've gotta deal with S-class heroes, demon kings and other super powerful beings lusting after my brother now?!
Haaah... Bring it on then! I'll beat you all so hard your great great great great grandparents will feel it!

Title: Stuck in a zombie world with an OP shop
Synopsis: I like Shades Darkside (http://royalroadl.com/fiction/11703) as a good, up-and-coming zombie fic! But there's more than just zombies!

Title: Dungeon Core: Alex : Hiatuss Infinitetum
Synopsis:
Alex was an average guy. He lived in an average house, in an average neighborhood and worked at an average job. One day while walking home he was looking at a short skirt a little too closely and didn’t see a car.
In some kind of God like kidnapping his soul was taken from his rightful afterlife and forced into a dungeon core! A dungeon core under the control of a black robed necromancer bent on destroying the world.
Will Alex learn what it is to be a dungeon? Will He help to destroy the world? Or will he find a new path? A path of his own design.

Title: Re:Cheat
Synopsis:
After trading his own life to save a little girl Daichi Akiyama found himself in an empty space where nothing exist nothing but his consciousness, until one day a black hole appeared out of nowhere and transferred him to another world.
 (Thanks for reading my first story! And yes the cover and all illustrations in the story are made by me just in case you want to know.)

Title: There's No Gods For Traitors
Synopsis: In the Kingdom of Blackpoint all Heroes were granted abilities by the gods. Each of the 'skills' had the power to evolve into somthing much greater. When the traitors were at an all time high, The council of Blackpoint needed to find a way to withold these abilities from Infiltrators. Thus enabling the creation of Fear Tech, an island only accessable by use of the access passes on the ships of Ace'sEnd, of higher difficulty than the Fortress's built by the Dwarves, of technology higher Level than any before, An island of Machines.

Title: The World of Araven
Synopsis:
What happens when you get summoned into a fantasy world? Do you get asked to save it by a king? Nope, it was by some cooky old mage who was trying out some old forgotten magic.
Oh, and he doesn't speak English either so that might be a problem.

Title: Unarmed 'n Unharmed
Synopsis: Sam is a dutch young man in his twenties, he used to be a demolition expert for his unit. Now a days he works as a lumberjack and occasional construction worker. In a spur of the moment deciscion he decided to go on a holiday trip and ended up in Kansas, Why kansas you ask? No real reason, it just happened to be the ticket he had bought, it was more of a blind roulette type deal. So now he's walking through a tiny town in kansas, helping a family move their couch. When suddenly everything goes whacky. But hey what can a man do but bust some monster balls?

Title: Dusk God
Synopsis:
With overpowering might and some of the most powerful spells, how will he proceed?
 
 
My First Story

Title: The Lost Legacy
Synopsis: From the North a darkness comes. Struggle is all Galacor can do with no help and drowned in the murky web of human politics. It is up to a young boy to become a king and lead its armies to make one final stand.

Title: The Simulations
Synopsis:
After ascending from his last life to become a Champion our hero has his memories locked. He is told that he must compete in competitive simulations against other Champions in order to earn enough to continue to simulate his consciousness. The competitive simulations have a variety of scenario genres, and may or may not have a game interface.
The first competitive simulation our hero faces is from the Summoned Hero/Traveller to a New World genre, and is set as Fantasy Realistic - no game interface. He must ensure that the person he chose in the simulation's setup survives the end of the world in order to win.

Author's note: I'm committing to one arc of four books. The arc has its own complete storyline. And each book has its own individual storyline as well. Each book also has 60 chapters, for a total commitment of 240 chapters. I'm aiming for a release schedule of a chapter every 23 hours.

Title: Dismissing Darkness
Synopsis:
Out amidst the stars, far past the point Earth appears as a pale blue dot, a human spacecraft plunges forth towards new and exciting worlds.  The passengers know they are never going home, not after the lengthy journey ahead of, and to a lesser extent behind them.  They while away their time frozen in body and plugged into a simulation in mind waiting for a new planet to explore and colonize.  Still, space is a place large enough for a surprise or two as our protagonist, the underqualified Mike Jackson (no relation) is soon to find out.
~~~
I will be posting chapters here and on my wordpress blog-thing, hopefully within minutes of each other multiple times a week.  Currently on hiatus.  If I get back to writing this one, it will be after I tweak it to make it feel less like an empty world with too many extras in the background.

Title: Pact of Kamaldin
Synopsis: Denentia, a land filled with a rich and bloody history is on the verge of war yet again. War is a past time in this place as if it were just a simple game. But no, war ruins the lives and livelihoods of those involved yet two are trying to stop this endless conflict. Can they stop the war that has been going on for 500 years and end it for all time or will they just bring more fuel to the keg that is only needing a spark to explode.

Title: Dragon Road: How I Rise in My New Life
Synopsis:
Unbeknownst to most life in the vast universe, there exists worlds with life that nestle within cracks in the void of the physical plane of existence.
 
Whether these worlds are the realms of the afterlife is unknown, but what is clear is that sometimes…
 
some things…
 
physical or not…
 
real or not…
 
tend to slip into the cracks…
 
This is my story...
Of how I died filled with regret, but was given a chance to live my new life (though not the way I expected) hoping to gain what I desire the most.
 
Power...
 
Women...
 
and most important of all... Family.
 

 
* Arc 1: An End and A Beginning
* Arc 2: Journey to the New World
* Arc 3: The All-Treasure Pavillion

Title: Unaffiliated
Synopsis:
simple synopsis: Clone of wolverine with a bit of superman's powers sprinkled in the mix in another world

main character is OP but not so much, if you don't like OP mc's then don't read the story (for the sake of my sanity please don't) if you do like OP mc's however then by all means help me write this story because I WILL be implementing good ideas into the story

Title: The apocalypse that saved the world
Synopsis:
Nathanial smith is a perfectly average guy on the dying world Earth. Why is Earth dying you may ask, well the lack of mana will kill of humanity in a few generations, luckily the apocalypse happens or whatever you want to call it.
Urban fantasy, about a warlock.
Main character perspective eventually.
i have chosen too put up chapters before i have them prof read, hope people can live with that.

Title: The Lenzini's
Synopsis: My name is Bobbie Lenzini, daughter of Joey & Marie Lenzini.                                                  My father originally wanted a boy when my mother got pregnant with me, he already had my brother but I came out a girl so either way he named me Bobbie.                                                                   He was feared by many, and mean to many, but my mother, brother and I were the only ones he was nice to.

Title: Cultivating Monster
Synopsis:
Monsters...
beings who raid, destroy, steal and kill all those whom they deem fit.
Do you want to be a monster?
In the world filled with death, would you rather be the bloodthirsy Cultivator, the smart Mage, the evil Necromancer, the honorable swordsman, the sneaky assassin, the greedy and lustful pirate or the hate-filled Monster?
Can't there be a mix? What if you mix the powers of the typical reincarnated hero along with the everlasting theory of cultivation? And what if you also throw in a personality forged through pain and hate?
Turns out, there can be a mix. Take a human, dip it into a world where everybody hates it, teach him the wonders of what power can give you, then, throw it into a world where he can obtain the power it wants. 
---
I had a sudden moment of enlightment from reading 'Different World along with One Piece system'. I truly liked that novel, so I raccomend it. I took inspiration in the idea and sort of copied it, so I won't claim this to be completely original, as it's not.

Title: Book 1: Demonic Wolfsbane
Synopsis:
A group of children are brought into a secluded part of a forest to undergo a coming of age ritual, but unbeknownst to everyone, the rite of passage does not go as planned alarming the Elders.
Thus starts his journey of Blood and Pain.
 
Cover Photo is From Google Search, Will Make One of my own Eventually
Please Leave Comments, if you feel like it, Letting Me Know What You Think. Thanx

Title: THE CHRONICLES OF MYSTICAL BEINGS (BOOK 1)
Synopsis: The human world is constantly in battle with Styx and his army. upon facing him for nearly five centuries now the human world is forced to make an alliance with elves and other forces which oppose the rule of lord Styx. a mysterious man comes to the human world and bring changes to it, making the world of humans more powerful but as Styx has always been sealed away by the feathers of phoenix that humans have, tragedically Styx has grown stronger as he has now the full support and has become the master of most powerful dragon in the dragon realm.  he faces tyranny and betrayal in his fight against lord Styx by his friend he trusts the most and upon getting betrayed he has no other option but to make the biggest gamble of his life and a world-changing decision.  Achilles will face his worst fear and will have to choose between love and power. what will his decision be.? he finds a method to seal Styx for a hundred years however he dies in his attempts.his legacy will now be passed to his child, yet unborn will inherit his will and courage.

Title: Escaping Sha'ambala's Realm
Synopsis:
The darkness consumes you the fangs of fear and despair will mark your entire being and will forever be part of you.
 
 
Since the beginning of time, humans have lived their sometimes grand and sometimes ordinary lives, and have thereafter been laid to rest in countless graves and tombs but in Sha'ambala's realm even the dusts from your bone is worth something that will never be wasted. This is a story about Kara Nashinya who escaped the prison of despair in Sha'ambala's realm, discover the story behind the mysteries sourrounding Kara and her connections to the Void.
 
Same multiverse as Genesis:Prime New beggining novel (currently unfinished). {some ___ might have answers to what you're looking for} :D

Title: SwordGate
Synopsis:
This story is centered around a character named Zack and his life in a VRMMORPG world.
 
Updated every weekend, or is supposed to be.

Title: Shades Darkside
Synopsis:
The world got turned on its head.
Monsters popping up everywhere, otherworldly systems taking over and powers being giving to a select few. What is Shades to do? Where will the path he chose to walk take him?
Will he be the same when he gets there?Will he even care?

Title: The Fallen Legion: Accidental Renegade
Synopsis: Marchosias the Fallen Angel and Erica Llewellyn the human versus government spooks, warlocks, and more.I've been writing for nigh on five years, you'd think I'd get better at writing these things, huh? Haha, truth be told I'll be writing this synopsis, rewriting it, scrapping it altogether, and writing it from the start again more than any other aspect of the novel. Anyway, I really hope y'all enjoy this.

Title: Emulation of chronology
Synopsis:
“Day: 61.Two months have already passed since the incident where it seemed as if I lost sight of reality…I can’t even tell if what I am experiencing right now in life is real? In the blink of an eye I was “transported” from a destination to another and now I’m living in a hidden village together with my family. In the past my people came in conflict with the high mighty Pursuedale, and that dispute caused us to forfeit our homes and even some of our lives, among those my grandfather’s. I doubt that this story is about us though…
An incident which occured two months ago makes me question actuality, and I have no idea what happened to a friend of mine. Pursuedale's army which attacked my town seven months ago had been tasked by their colonel to invade other cities,  and I just so happened to encounter this girl during my flew and she was on a leg bail herself from her hometown… We decided to jeopardize together and try to stop the army ourselves.I nearly lost my life during our final battle...
Rayn grew up in the city in the rocky highlands of Concrete Force. Her family is characterized of the aristocracy and once her father's company went bankrupt a lot of things changed for them and their standard living situation worsened.I have been jotting down everything I remember from the past in this notebook, hoping that I won't forget anything important."- Playtime’s over.- ...W-WHAT'S-... happening-...?

Title: Ravaged
Synopsis:
In a post-apocalyptic world where Ravagers fight for every last inch of survival, comes a new super weapon and a glimmer of hope.
The year is 2100, and Ravagers -- surviving humans with extraordinary abilities -- have taken over Arcadium, where different groups have captured multiple lands and laid down their territories.
Our story follows Gino Reynder, a lone scavenger and his tiny hoverbot Trinket where they chance upon two young Ravagers. Perhaps it's time for Gino to take an important gamble in his life for he might have the key to reuniting all Ravagers - or destroy them - in his hands. Perhaps it's time for Gino and his Renegade Rebels to make the biggest decision of their lives. 
Ravaged is a web serial that takes place over bite-sized chapters (I try to have them under 5k words), released weekly on Fridays. 
[First four / five chapters should be up within a week while upcoming chapters will be released on Fridays]

Title: Adventure's in jumping
Synopsis: James madison a normal 16 year old bored of his normal life he get the offer to go on adventure beyond his and any other universe.

Title: The Last Zeus: Book 1- The Beginning
Synopsis:
"Who is that superstar?"
"Oh, him. They call him Zeus."
"Zeus? As in the King of Gods from the myths?"
"Ah yes, the very same."
"So, where's his pantheon? Which kingdom does he rule?"
"He doesn't. He's not your usual king. He's only rules his lonesome."
"A king without a kingdom, interesting. So, what's his story?"
"Don't ask, lest you wish you never knew."

Title: Wars, Massacres and Undeads
Synopsis:
Synopsis:
Elena is a normal, 13 years old village girl, living with her parents, playing with her friends and listening to the stories her old grandma tells her. This all changes, when the King's knights raid her village and kill everyone she knows and love.
Will Elena be able to survive in the wilderness on her own, and finally take her revenge? And how will she fare against people from other worlds, ethereal beings and gods?
 
Disclaimer:
First, English is not my main language, this will be filled with errors (though I hope the free version of Grammarly will come to my aid)
Second, though this is a litRPG fiction, I will not use Blue Tables. I hate making those.
 

List of Books (Contains REAL BIG Spoilers): 


Book I  : Undeads - Follow Elena as she develops her abilities as Necromancer, and meets her first ally.
Book II : Wars - It is finally time. After years of preparing and gathering Undeads, Elena is ready to take her revenge. But a surprise awaits her at the end of her path.
Book III: Massacres - [ WIP, depends on B. III ending ] This is the story of a relationship frowned upon. A Demoness and a Paladin of Ulhan, the God of Light. But how do Elena, Elia and ??? get involved in this? Fate sometimes makes mistakes.
Book IV: The End? [ WIP, depends on B. III ending ] A mysterious entity is ravaging the Continent Elena lives on. Who is It? What does It want?



 
(I don't own the picture used as cover. I found it here: https://art.alphacoders.com/arts/view/38255)

Title: The Lands of Puppets
Synopsis:
The Land of Puppets is a midevil fantasy story following a man named Elias as he goes through knights academy and eventually conscripted into war.  Lys is the continent with the conflict between the Ardun and Danacian kingdoms.  Normally the Voltaria river seperated the two kingdoms but, with the death of the Ardun king, Danacia began the attack.
 
     This is a story about swords, soldeirs, and the struggles of a low birth.  I'll try my best to fix gramatical errors and errors in the plot before posting but if they come up please let me know :D
 
     I've wroten quite a bit of the story already but I am posting it here as a motivation to myself to finish the story.  If you find any errors or have any comments please let me know!

Title: Help I'm a Pathfinder Commoner trapped in a Game world.
Synopsis: if a mod sees this delete the fiction thx.

Title: The lonely cloak
Synopsis: this is my frist story it is about a magic school headmater who invented an object Called the weakening orb that awake and magic in people who otherwise would not be able to use it. In a world that only one in every one hundred people are able to use magic naturally. this orb could change world for ether good or evil.

Title: A Hermit's Life for Me
Synopsis:
Aster Spinel was never ashamed of what he was. A magic nut, a practitioner of its art. He was a researcher with a goal of finding the very secrets of his chosen field. His only ambition? 
To create a new branch of the ways of the arcane.
Yet somehow, someway this Hermit, who only wanted to hide and discover magic found himself caught in a situation completely out of his league. Entering the magical capital of the world - in a world that discriminates against his kind - would have felled any lesser Hermit.
Luckily, Aster liked to think he was anything but.

Title: Kingdoms Online
Synopsis: [Kingdoms Online] the all new virtual reality game AI administered through the expansive world Gods, has just been released. Rick Stryker lifetime gamer and a current college student had been looking forward to this day. As a former USMC Combat Engineer and currently attending college for architectural engineering [Kingdoms Online] will allow him to merge his passion for gaming with his career skill set.   [Kingdoms Online] is a [VR] MMOPRG allowing players to band together or work solo to build a kingdom from the ground up. Allowing one to be a good leader making alliances and trade deals or rule with an iron fist over your subjects and neighbors. Purchase land and gather the resources, start your own settlement defend and build try to catch the eye of one of the world's gods to help guide your own unique path as you rise to rule.How will you rule? Will your kingdom spread to the horizon and reach for the skies, or will it fall to be forgotten by history like the other scattered ancient ruins found across the lands?Journey along with Rick Stryker's adventure as he sets out to make his claim to rule in the vast wilderness of [Kingdoms Online].

Title: To Protect
Synopsis:
Of all that drives man, rare is the desire to protect others. Rarer still is those that act on that drive to defend the weak and save those in need. But those that do act are heroes, men and woman willing to risk everything to do what is right. Allen was one such person whose courage forced him to act in a time of crisis.
 
But not all stories end happily. Though he is successful in saving others, he himself pays the ultimate price. Now, Allen is reborn to a new life. A new home in a new world. With everyone he meets speaking a language hes never heard before, hes going to have to take one small step at a time to understand this new reality of his.
 
Baby steps in fact.

Title: God Of Murder
Synopsis:
The young boy Winsten must travel down a dark path to uncover the truth to the mysterty that will plague him tell the end of all time and, space. 
The destiny to became a God is not easy to obtain will he use it save his love ones or will he abondon them to gain the strength to uncover the mysteries that have plagued him.

Title: Fantasial Apocalypse
Synopsis:
Comet Storms, Invaders from Space, Zombie Apocalypse, Pandemics, or the Armageddon— Throughout history, humans have imagined all sorts of ways as to how [ The world would end ].
Global warming and dealing with disasters, such as plagues, earthquakes, wars, floods, invasions, murders, droughts, and battles. Some says that all of these could end the world.
Even the 16th century prophet Michel de Nostradame, the very famous Nostradamus, seemed to know how the end of the world was going to come to pass and prophesized.
But reality was proven different.
The world didn’t end with those simple propositions.
In fact, it was completely different. It could even be said to be magical, straight out of fantasy stories.
Yeah. That’s right! Monsters and Beasts, Gods and Demons all of them appeared one after another and caused the world to end.
… And this event marks the beginning of a new era. An era of monsters and demon roaming around the world.
However, these invaders hated humanity and so they tried to extinguish them. Leading Humanity to fight for their survival!
Allen Bando, the world’s most wanted criminal; [ The Black Demon King ] joined the [ Dawn Alliance ] to fight but failed in the end.
Now that he was given a second chance, what calamity would he brought in his return… ?
Allen: I have seen my land change with my own eyes and watched the masses brought to their knees.
Even though I died, I have not regretted what I have done, but what I have not done.
The world change and my comrades betrayed me but in this second life, I will not lose.
World, bring it on!
You want to see me fail but not today motherf*cker! This world has every odd against me but I will stand my ground because this world should remain mine forever.
Many are torn apart but I am a Man! 
I will stand with my heart on my sleeve.
I will kneel nor bow to no one!!
World, for the second time around, here I come!!
 --- ---
Hello guys, I tried changing the sypnosis as one of the reader's wanted. But I don't have any talent in writing one so, I hope this time would be good.
For your information, English is not my native tongue and I admit that I have very bad grades in my english class, so if there's any error in my grammar then I apologize...

Title: The Godly Lawyer
Synopsis:
The heavens are truly ruthless people die everywhere and, no one is there to revenge them even in death the court of law has been rigged  murders get way with any thing while the innocent are found guilty.
Follow  Pain as he goes though legendary trials to save the innocents and, prosecutes the guilty.....

Title: World Breaker
Synopsis:
A teenage boy possesses a unique gift that he doesn't understand but which those around him wish to use.  He is faced with the decision of power or respect, the yin and yang of World Breaking.  The only choice left is whether he will embrace the teachings of the Sophotorium and use this knowledge to improve reality or twist it for personal gain.
 
Given his past, no one would blame Evan if he subjected the world to chaos.  But those closest to him believe that he is pure at heart, a man above the tides of greed and gain. 
 
Will Evan become the next World Breaker? Or will he succumb to anger and pain?

Title: The Forgotten Hero
Synopsis:
Long ago, in the world of Thyne, the Alliance of the Free Races, a name they had given themselves, summoned a hundred humans from another dimension.
Praised as heroes by the people, they rejoiced that they had been able to acquire pure, mana deficient humans that wanted to aid them in their time of need, ignoring the black, archaic slave collars around their necks or the depressed, almost hate-filled expressions that they received when interacting with them.
After Ten years of bloody war, the dark races were pushed back deep into their territories. Both sides were near breaking point and desperate to end the war once and for all. 
In a bargain, the twelve surviving heroes launched a high-risk mission, utilising advanced tactics from their home world to kill the Demon Lord. In exchange, they would be sent home, along with the magically preserved corpses of their comrades, though in truth, they knew that even if they returned, they would never be the same. 
Legends say that, upon ambushing the Demon Lord in his castle, they finally understood the plight of the world, and in the last act of heroism, sacrificed their lives, sealing him in an eternal prison so his essence would not be able to create another. 
With the loss of the Demon Lord, and no chance for another to be born, the dark races quickly surrendered and the free races celebrated, honouring the noble sacrifice of the heroes before quickly forgetting about them as they returned to their everyday lives.
However, legends are rarely truthful, embellished by the victors in order to earn praise as well as hide the less desirable aspects of their deeds.
Trapped in the Demon Lord's throne room inside the Demonic Palace, which even taking a single step on its desecrated grounds is punished by death, two figures remain motionless. They had long run out of insults and threats to trade and now they waited. For what, not even the Gods knew.

Title: Tyters
Synopsis: A group of friends are teleported to another planet. Along the way they befriend dwarves and elves, and find out it is a battle planet for a race called tyters, and the humans are the prey! They have three years to level up and grow as strong as possible before before the hunt begins. In a stroke of luck they learn how to use magic, but will it be enough for them to survive?

Title: Story of a Hero
Synopsis:
This is the story of Ryuu and the events that made him the "hero".
 
[ This is my first time. Go easy on me. Will upload on weekends]

Title: Corbeau
Synopsis:
A freelancer, a slave and a spaceship walk into a bar... 
 
Stuff happens, haha~

Title: Enter the Nexus
Synopsis: Corporate drone Gray picks up a copy of the coolest, newest MMORPG—Nexus Online, or NEON—that allows a player to immerse all their senses in the world of the game. After embarking on his own quest in the fantasy/cyberpunk world of NEON, Gray discovers a plot to manipulate the game to affect the real world—and an opportunity to be a hero.

Title: Purgatory's  Gate
Synopsis: This is a story about a young boy who had his parents murdered in front of him. He has too go through a long journey to find the people that killed his parents and take his revenge!

Title: Here there be Legends
Synopsis:
Who sits behind the greats with names never heard and stories never told. Who sits in the shaddows of society and change its corse unwittingly or unrecognised. Very few can say. 
What too of the curse of immortality? is it a great tragedy on repeat or something beutiful that can withstand the test of time more than any legend? 
 
 
This is a story i found the start of and plan for in one of my old scrap books. i decided to revive it.

Title: Phoenix Rebirth
Synopsis:
-The Journey of a thousand Miles begins with a Single Step.
Been on the road to self discovery, I think I’m almost done crumbling. Trying not to rush, but can’t wait to let my Star shine, for a star to be born, there is one thing that must happen: A gaseous Nebula must collapse. SO Collapse. Crumble. This is not your Destruction but my Rebirth.

Title: The "Double Great" Gods
Synopsis: A poor writer who becames the Greatest Writer in history. Memorys that aren't his plague him and, they aid him to became the Greatest Writer.

Title: The Gathering; Darkness
Synopsis:
The eight races of Serinon lived in peaceful co-existence with each other for over 3000 years.
Now, when an ancient evil has awakened from its eternal slumber, warriors from these eight races
must band together in the realm's time of need, in order to put a stop to this evil, and save the world.
 
Eric Ferdoin is a normal human who lives with his younger sister Emilia, but after Emilia is kidnapped by a group of unknown origin. It is up to Arron to save his sister, but he will face many obstacles in his quest. Will he be able to save his sister? Or will he be damned to a life of destruction?

Title: Control + Alt + Sadit
Synopsis: Most stories follow characters who are trapped in a VR-MMO and how they escape. Meet Sadit. Getting trapped in a VR-MMO was how he escaped. In a throwback to the allegories of Ray Bradbury told through the modern lens of Videogame Fiction, Control Alt Sadit is a story that emphasises character progression shown via Narrative rather than told through Charts and Spreadsheets. DISCLAIMER: This is not LitRPG.

Title: Jorge´s great idea to start apocalypse.
Synopsis:
Jorge wants to do stupid crap. And what is stupider than... whatever the hell he is saying?
I supose the barman, who keeps listening to it.
*****
A silly one-shot.

Title: The World Of Beasts
Synopsis:
Lee has a dream he wishes to became the Legendary King Of Beasts.
The Demonic Clan Wishes to kill all Beast Tamers a mighty war never seen before and, in the mix of it all is Lee!

Title: Highschool Sweethearts
Synopsis: Mary is the daughter of a very rich and popular author. She moves to a new place and neighborhood because of her fathers wishes for a "Normal life." But, the new high school she's to go to has a high suspicious suicide rate. Yet, of course they don't find out until they finally move in and attend. She meets a boy, Jack... To be continued.

Title: Walking over
Synopsis:
A quite dark vastness, detached of any variation... Mostly.
A taint of crimson, an awkward grin, maybe a sword...
A slightly odd day of reincarnation.

Hello there, I welcome you - whoever you are - to my draft of a story! I am not a native English speaker nor a writer so... consider this my first tentative of a fiction. Therefore you have this warning: I'm only writing for fun (etc) without any compromise, with sporadic releases and so on. I accept critics anyway, fell free to send suggestions because I will try to read them.
Another warning: This story may have mature content or irregular tags, I will change them in the future, as necessary. All (most of) these characters are fictional and with any references to owned... character? must be treated as such - I will not claim Shepard or whatever...
PS: Expect a stiff looking unplaned story...

Title: Dimensions intersection
Synopsis:
The 100 years war.Countless gods, devils, heavenly demons, dragons, beast emperors and many more supreme beings fought for supremacy.Due to the war space cracks plagued the dimensions causing them to intersect almost making them destroy each other.After countless efforts the dimensions finally stabilized making a whole new unique dimension.Note: some of you may not like the reincarnation tag so this is to explain some details coming in the plot (NO SPOILERS).the mc will come from earth but unlike lots of novels it will play a major role in his power and character development, i am always open for criticismIt will all be cleared up in the future with lots of fun. IMPORTANT NOTE!!!!: this was supposed to be surprise but as i went more deeply through the rules (in wuxiaworld) i found it will really be hard to be added to the front page, i like when i start something that i must finish it in the most efficient and best way possible with no regrets, so i added this, don't worry it won't be a spoiler, i am just giving a hint, as you already know from the title this novel features dimensions, and since this novel is made on wuxiaworld it must have something related to it, so figure it out a novel about dimensions and wuxiaworld which is full of fantasy novels.

Thank you for reading.

Title: Still images in the depths of hell
Synopsis:
"I appoint you to kill the most powerful being which i had granted the power to kill me."
 
"I wonder, do I perhaps have the right to decline this journey?”
 
“Unless you want your very existence to be eliminated, then be my guest.”
 

Denis had just recently graduated from college with a degree in photography and is now working in an industry with a job that he didn't expect to be in. An unneeded job were only 4 people are currently assigned in. In his job, he met a co worker whom he'd initially thought as an escaped mental patient but soon after, he'd thought wrong. As his co worker is the supreme being, God himself. God explained that he assigned Denis as one of his "source of entertainment" and appointed him to kill the most powerful being in hell which God had given it the power to kill him. 
 
Having to be summoned in an unknown place were heat is unforgiving, were the ocean of flame resides in, where the most powerful being lives in, and with only the power that God had given him which is called "Precognition", he could only hope that he wouldn't get killed in the first week

Edit: Regarding the new chapter releases, starting from now on (6/11/17), I'll try to release a new chapter every 2-3 days since my schedule had lighten up a bit these past few weeks and these chapters would still be as long as I've done it until now and as such, I hope that you dear readers would enjoy reading it.

Title: The Casual Dungeon
Synopsis: After being banned from his favorite Virtual Reality Arena game Rising Heroes, Milo decided to play a different game to pass the time until his ban runs out. Encountering the unfinished game The Master Dungeon by chance, he's decided to play as a dungeon in a fantasy world. Though his heart yearns to return to the competitive esport environment of Rising Heroes, his strange ideas bring about combat learned from his favorite game unexpectedly brings about ripples of changes. Will his dungeon bring about success in The Master Dungeon when Milo's commitment is shaky?

Title: Core
Synopsis:
This is a story of change.
What would you do if dying has become natural? by monsters no less?
Well this has become true for our MC who just got thrown into the woods with monsters crawling everywhere!
What to do, what to do indeed~
Join our MC in his journey to survive, his journey to find himself as well as normalcy.

-Apocalypse setting with a little xianxia and other stuff...

Hey, this is my first story so don't expect a masterpiece.

Title: The World Of Terror
Synopsis:
A string of disasters strike billons of people are dead!
John must kill his way to Las Vegas where all the secrets to the mystery of terror lay. But this isn't a easy task with more then one billon zombies guarding the gates of Las Vegas

Title: Moving Sloth
Synopsis: Set in a Modern/fantasy world that decides where and what you do in society by having a animal tattoo given to you at birth. the possibilitys wether it be mythical creature or normal is up and down. Mono who is giving a sloth tattoo would put the question, how can he be useful? With things going against him over time he developed a warped sense of a personality that is very weird to abnormal which leads him to having a unhealthy life style. What adveture would await him? Probably non at all because he would be too tried to care.

Title: Re:Beak
Synopsis: Joss lived an average life, he had average grades, average looks, average job, and an average wife. He had led this average wife, wanting nothing more, he only wanted peace, but an unfateful car crash sent him to the depths of the afterlife, waking up, he finds himself born as a bird and eats to get stronger and evolve, though this time, his life might not be so average.(Inspired from re:horn and re:monster, no leveling and power doesn't really have an actual measurement).

Title: Pangur Bán
Synopsis:
Part I of ZODIACA unique dark fantasy mixed with gameplay mechanics and a sinister plot.
ALTAIR was just a simple game; a small indie VRMMORPG with a cult following that would die out sooner or later. And then messages started coming, all from a mysterious entity with unknown origins and vague intentions.
PICK:(1) Play the Game.(2) Die.(3) Survive.
Whichever answer is given, the consequences seem to last forever.
 
*author's note: Pangur Bán has a very wide cast of characters with varying alignments, personalities, and morals. The novel also has character death and dark, heavy themes. Several elements such as: chatlogs, inventories, icons, and possible later soundtracks (some original material and some sourced from Creative Commons, in the Public Domain, or is listed for Commercial or Non-Commercial Reuse) are created to immerse the reader. Thank you for helping me in my first novel!
*inspired from: LitRPG genre, Homestuck, Cultural Mythology, and Puella Magi Madoka Magica.

Title: Shadows of Dawn
Synopsis:
Our MC James Schle gets a full time job and saves up for the Virtual Reality game Shadows of Dawn. Now join him in his path of Adventure or mabye Horror. 
 
I am a high Schooler and this is my first novel so don't expect daily updates I will do my best to update weekly. Also if you are a Grammer Nazi please don't read this it would be cruel and unusual torture for you.

Title: Days of Red
Synopsis:
america is long dead. It has been almost 30 years since the society we knew ended, and the ashes of the old world settled. Now, the North American wasteland is thron apart by war. The survivors from the previous catastrophy are dying by the thousands, as nations fight to become the heir of the United States. Daniel Lopez is a Sergeant in the USAP military, a nationalist industrialist government that holds most of the wasteland in it's iron fist. He has been fighting for years against several communist, liberal, and libertarian militias and governments. Alternating life in the front with life with his family back home. He believed he would live his whole life like this, as the war was locked in a stalemate, and no victory was in sight. 
 
Little did he knew that would all change. 
He would be forced to embark on a trip across the treacherous wasteland that was America, filled with survival and action to save those who matter to him, and be in a place were he matters.

Title: Dead Drop Society
Synopsis:
When access to the internet and information becomes inaccessible to a vast majority of the population, dead drop networks spring up everywhere. But someone needs to maintain this free access to information.
But someone needs to maintain this free access to information, otherwise, the population remains mired in ignorance and cut out of the wealth cycle.
 
First published Wattpad

Title: Overlord
Synopsis: A young boy's quest for vengeance on the man who turned his life upside down.

Title: Lord of Nightmares (dropped)
Synopsis:
When the wind howls and the night brings forth it's terrors, it is the heroes that hold the line for good, for mankind. It is they who bring forth the holy light to smite those that hide in the dark. It is they the legends are told of and they that the smallfolk scream the names of in parades and in songs.
But what is said of the other side, of the people that spit in the face of the heavens and laugh in the face of defeat, they of who no songs are sung and no parades are held for.
Hushed whispers are told to childrenof the likes of Beritold, the King of Insanity and Hilstadt Breaker of Worlds. But they are legends who the world trembled to look upon.
I mean how is a young villain meant to make his way in the world if every time he enthralls a populous or brings forth a magical plague they are assaulted by heroes with the mandate of god.
And thus brings us to the tale of Kinshala a young villain trying to make a name for himself.

Title: Cancelled - at least for now
Synopsis: RIP

Title: Real Life RPG Doesn't Suck
Synopsis:
[The rewritten version of Real Life RPG Sucks... by the same author, me, Kuromori.]
 
One day the highschooler of the first year, Hiyuuki Iori, wakes up with a floating screen in front of him. This is the start of an long adventure of a young boy that will change the world!

Title: I was summoned to another world, but i'm a dog!
Synopsis: Max, a dog was summoned to another world... He tried to get his owner away from the "bright light" and... Ended up being summoned himself, this is about his adventures.

Title: The Grey Line Between Light and Shadows
Synopsis:
At the end of an universe full of might hungry Gods there exists a  world; A world ruled by three different races, three races so different in appearances, life styles and convictions that conflicts between the three races seem unavoidable.
In this world a boy is born. A boy with a mission; The mission to change the order of his world...

Title: A Draconic Dissertation
Synopsis:
Chapter 172 - Herbs & Gyrogrants
Page 178
"Draconian behaviour seems negatively influenced by the introduction of the Threaded Glow leaf into the environment. Potentially linked to the Dragon Gyrogrant's magnetic hunting field and the Threaded Glow leaf's strong negative polarity. Specimen gender is undetermined as of yet, it appears to be a adolescent female however I can't clearly make out the scale colouring from my observation point atop a oak. Hostility towards both other dragons and species is still apparent. Any movement I make elicits further attempts to shake me down"
-Drew Baltimore

Title: Mechanization against magic
Synopsis:
The last survivor of it's extremely technologically advanced race is sent into far away space by it's creator.
It knows nothing except science.
The ultimate machine, powered by the souls of living creatures.
Asleep for hundreds of years, it finally wakes. Can a machine without the concept of 'mercy' or 'holding back' strive in a world were magic rules?
Will it discover it's purpose in the world and find a place whom it can call home? But does it need to?
In the first place, it's 'home' was destroyed by humans in it's last planet, so why not destroy their home as revenge?

Title: Immersion: Reboot
Synopsis:
Taking her first steps into VR Gaming, Mina is rescued by a Dapper Alchemist, a Competitive Markswoman, and a Lion-Headed Wrestler in a reverse-dungeon where there is only one objective: Escape The New Player Experience!
 Immersion is a reboot of a previous draft that now emphasises character progression shown via Narrative rather than told through Charts and Spreadsheets. DISCLAIMER: This is no longer a LitRPG story.

Title: Stormbringer
Synopsis:
Steet rat. 
That is title I have had to live with all of my life. Abandoned at a young age and considered to be a waste of space, I lived my life seeking a purpose. Well, that was until I joined the Maelstrom and it's crew.
I am the Stormbringer, and this is my legend.

Title: The life of an Apache Attack Helicopter in another world
Synopsis:
WARNING:BAT-S%%% CRAZY STUF UP AHEAD and some cursing
John Doe was a simply man with one dream and that dream was to be an Apache Attack helicopter. One day while walking home one such helicopter crashed into him. But this is not the end as the helicopter was piloted by the one and only GOD after this GOD felt bad that he killed poor John so he told him that he would send him off to a Fantsy world and that he could change his race. I think we all know what he picked
ONESHOT story

Title: A Difference in Reality
Synopsis:
Alexander Raven was an ordinary guy, ordinary looks, ordinary hobbies and an ordinary life. He was a bit of a loner but he enjoyed being in others company. This is the story of a new life for him, a second chance to make something of himself, to not just hide in the backround and make a legend of his name. Will he make a grand new life for himself?
======================================================================================
Note from the Author:
This is the first fiction I will be doing for the first time ever, so please be gentle with me. Along with that if there are any errors please correct me on them so I may fix them. If you for some random reaseon really like the novel and want more chapters  I will do my best to make sure there is at least one a week, but since I am terrible at typing do not get your hopes up. And if you do decide to judge my novel, be honest with any review you may have.
Thank You, and enjoy!

Title: Heathens
Synopsis:
On hiatus until I finish other stories
 
Apollo and Dion, a dysfunctional rag-tag pair of demon hunters have been sent to investigate the city of Havenbrook and its inhabitants. 
The mission is simple: to find the cultists responsible for a recent string of murders and to bring them to justice. Even if it takes killing dozens of demons on the way there. 
But things are never that simple when you deal with the dark arts. Cultists, demon pacts, sacrificial murders all stand in the demon hunters' way as they search for the truth. A truth that will force them to question their own identities, a truth about the absolute evil lurking beyond heaven and earth. The question is, if they find the truth, will they be strong enough to handle it?

Title: Reincarnation
Synopsis:
A man run over by a truck.
Opening one's eyes to a new world, a new life, and redemption.

Title: Queen of Devouring
Synopsis:
Word Count: 388 850 and 1414 pages. (8-10k words per chapter)
There should be a chapter every second week or so since I'm writing another novel as well.
Synopsis:
Do you fear shadows? Elena was born of shadows. Although her name means exactly the opposite of it, is there a shadow without a bright sun?
But she soon had to find out that there was an apocalypse, and she was supposed to be the evil monster against the humans. The humans, who were mere mortals not long before her birth. Little did anyone know that she was a legendary creature, who had nothing to do with the apocalypse, which reason of was unknown. What was it? That was something everyone wanted to know. There was a reason for her birth, though, which must stay a secret.
Will she find her own goals as well or has she no way to stop before her final destination? Follow her blood and manipulation filled path to see.
