Title: Telesma
Synopsis: An immortal being who has existed ever since the very first breath of creation decided to assume a human form and descend down to the mortal plane in the attempt to observe humans and experience their society first hand for his entertainment purposes. Unbeknownst to him, chaos has been stirring up both in the cosmos and in the earthen plane below which will bring about a catastrophe that will affect the fate of all of the planes of existence. With a tremendous amount of power far greater than what his physical body can handle, how will he fare himself with keeping his identity hidden all the while being right in the middle of the ensuing maelstrom?

Title: Youjo Kodama
Synopsis:
When your time has come, and you close your eyes for a final time, what will you leave behind? When Man has forsaken its once proud nature, what will it become? When forests turn into cities, will you still recognize your old home? When humanity unites, albeit in a strange manner, will you be proud? When your time has come, and you reopen your eyes, will you finally embrace the world anew?
 

The premise of this story is reincarnating as a Dryad in the future, I hope you will enjoy and comment or give feedback about the story.

 
Youjo Kodama is my first story on Royalroadl. I draw heavy inspiration from series such as Ciaphas Cain from Warhammer 40K, Star Wars, Youjo Senki, and Overlord. This story combines elements from both Sci-fi and fantasy genres.
 
You will recognize some elements from those series as I will copy some lore or background elements as I craft them into my own story.
This story could be considered fanfiction but I will bring them together in a new direction.
I hope you will join me on this fantastic adventure. Any comments and feedback are always appreciated.

Title: [Runist]
Synopsis:
Cipher is on a never ending quest to kill the system. And he has the power to do it. But he hasn’t always had this power. Only an hour ago he just a ordinary programmer. Things have not been going well today for Cipher. He hasn’t had his coffee yet. 
 
-----------------------------------
Cover isn't mine, credit goes to ?ukasz Kami?ski.

Title: Heaven's Daughter
Synopsis:
Every Immortal God in the Celestial Realm has to go through the stage of reincarnation into the human world at least once in their lives. 
The Celestial Emperor's daughter has always a been bookworm and has read countless of stories of the human world. This time, it is her turn to reincarnate and she is excited to experience it. 
What she does not know is that in the first reincarnation, memories are erased and she will live this life as a normal human with no prior memories of her life in the Celestial Realm.
However, being the daughter of the Celestial Emperor and possessing a pure soul, Tian-er is naturally reborn into the human world with a high amount of karma. The result is that her ability (/power) thus grows at an astonishing fast rate. 
Watch as we follow the heaven's daughter - Tian-er as she travels in the human world as Zhao Zi Yue.
This is a story for people who loves overpowered (OP) female main characters.

Title: Scion of the Void
Synopsis:
What happens when a retired Sailor, avid gamer, Player versus Player nut and an H.P. Lovecraft fan all rolled into a man with slight psychopathic tendencies gets brought to a world of fantasy with role-playing elements?
Chaos, absolute bloody chaos.
Join Jake as he attempts to find his way in a brand new world filled with elves, dragons, and all manner of strange and magical creatures, all the while he butchers and slaughters his way to power. Can he make it, or will he be brought down by the darkness inside of him?
Cover by Novissimus.
 
Authors Note:
Hey guys, thank you for taking the time to look this over. As this is my first work of any sort of writing, I would love it if you can give me any feedback you can think of. Hit me hard and hit me often, so I can make it better for everyone. Thank you!
 
Authors Note #2.
Some of the wonderful people reading this horrible attempt at literature have reviewed the Main Character as an unlikable a**hole that thinks everything is stupid or idiotic, while others have reviewed the Main Character as realistic and sarcastic. As the author, I think that both of these points are true, and if you, the reader, feel like you won't enjoy the MC being these things in your story, then it might be that this fiction is not for you. But if it is, then I welcome you with open arms. Thank you for your time.

Title: Would you like to continue?
Synopsis: *"Damn, not again where did I go wrong?", Durante Martins wondered. "The man surely said the prize is in one of these 49 suitcases and I've opened 47 already and no matter what I still lose. I'm starting to think this games rigged or something. *Durante Martins, your classic 17 year old who has only lived for like 112 years. How? With countless do overs of course follow Martins on his journey full of comedy and drama.

Title: Chaos Harborer
Synopsis:
When a tyrant, conqueror of the world, is killed by a god and ordered to become his apostle, would he accept such an offer?
Of course he does.
Why does he do so?
Let me ask you a question to answer the question. What's the point of living when you already have everything?
None.
With one task, a peculiar man is sent upon a world where heroes and villains with technology, powers, armies of monsters or other crazy things rule.
What is said task? Well, bring chaos to that world. It's as easy as that~.

Title: The Epic of Gaia
Synopsis: When the Earth was still young and molten, a race of beings emerged from her. Forged by the primordial flames, they were the strongest to have ever lived. They were called the Elder Dragons and they only exist in legends now. With the ability to absorb magic but not use it and tremendous physical strength, they could have ruled the world. But they decided to seclude themselves on their island. But tragedy struck when humans decided to capture a newborn from the island. The parents were enraged and all the Elder dragons burned the Earth searching for it. They never found their offspring and all the Elder dragons were sealed away, along with their island. Now the world knows that event as the Elder Wars that ended with the destruction of countless civilizations across the world. But the child lived on and a thousand years later, she woke up. The child is special as she has the ability to use magic as an Elder dragon. Her power could destroy the world, rule it or anything else she wants. But she has spent her time hidden among the humans, living a carefree life. Her only wish is to one day return home. This is her journey as she wanders the Earth.

Title: Miniature stories.
Synopsis: Hello! I like to write but i can never manage to write long and ardous stories that i wish i could, so i am writing small poem like stories here. If you want me to write in a different fashion just say so! If you like these stories do share them and tell me which one you liked the most :)

Title: H A L F   L I F E
Synopsis:
Humanity                                as I, we who lost the will
                         There will be no Heaven or hell
                           Reincarnation nor second life
                            the soul of man will wander
                                    the forsaken land
 
                               Live and thy shall breathe                                die and thy shall perish!
 
 
Blood brothers born in a harsh environment; where they learned essential skills and tempered their innate talent to survive, but what if one day the world changed what if death means removal of your whole existence. Will they EXIST or will they be REMEMBERED?
Embark the journey of a man as he unraveled his power to hold the destiny of humanity in a foreign land.  
Dream - Believe - Survive  H A L F  L I F E

Title: Chronicles of Soma: Rise of a King
Synopsis:
When I woke up, I was dragged into a grassland.
 
Uwaaaaa! Where is this place?
 
Why am I here?
 
Where is my comfy bed?
 
This is my tale, a tale of man's struggle to rise, in a new world with endless possibilities, and with an AI as a companion.

Title: Rune
Synopsis:
Four years ago, Alex was one of the first players of an experimental VR game called Rune, where death came suddenly and all the players had were a pitifully small health pool and a few runes nobody knew how to use. Today, the situation is better: Crafters manage item creation in the cities, while Fighters take those items into the world’s portals, slowly expanding the reach of civilization in spite of the randomly appearing monsters.
With civilization comes systems of power, and in the meantime, Alex lost her position, if not the prestige. Then, a routine job leads to the unexpected, and Alex is left to rebuild herself into a new image. This time, with other powers already established… and nipping at her heels.
(Harem is tagged but it's honestly polyamory. I hate the word harem but given that some people would interpret it as such, in it goes.)

Title: When humans "evolve"
Synopsis:
Read the story please, it's actually quite short. A synopsis is unneeded in my personal opinion.
 
This is my first story I've written that I'm actually confident enough to put out here, please leave your honest thoughts on it here.

Title: Enchanted: Past, Present and Future
Synopsis:
A life where everything will be always on your bidding with less effort, that's what she luckily have. Successful in her pursued passion and having a very loving husband and daughter is an absolute bliss. There's really no need to ask for more. But after she leave the hospital, she didn't thought that everything will change in just a mere moment. ***Fortunately, God didn't let her life end just like that. And she'd been given a chance to choose between two choices. .....The thing is she need to survive in this world until that day.
~~~~
 The cover photo is not mine and was only edited by me... 
Additional tags..
#shojo-ai
#otome-based

Title: Lost Memory
Synopsis:
Yamazaki Shido, a boy who just wake up from his coma after 3 years had passed. 
He live peacefully at his new high school untill he found this girl.
The puzzle and riddle inside his head begin to appear. 
The only question is... What had happened at that time before he went to unwanted condition.

Title: New hope online
Synopsis:
*as of right now this is my second time writing all this I really hate doing this twice in a row. well this story was made by me and a few friends ideas and stuff most of the pictures owned are not mine but some will be and every picture I use is respectively owned by their creators. Now let's go to the story. FYI this is my second time doing this so I'm a little pissed so I probably will not have good grammar and stuff so whenever you guys see something wrong why don't you come help me to make this story great peace out and have fun*
 
The year is 2009  there's a war going between robots and human Arnold swat@&**&6 . ah crap that was totally my fault wrong story ok here we go the real story. The years 2086 and life is hella awesome. in about the year 2065 a new fun toy came out they called this VR. but VR isn't just a toy anymore. Vr changed the life of everyone in America but really all over the world .  the thing that made VR awesome was that you can know go to work from your house laying in the bed with a VR helmet on making twice as much money for the hours you put in. you can know go to school from your house learn for a full 6 hours in VR but than when you get out its only been one hour in real life . there are so many uses that people can use VR for. of course military personal use it aswell to train there minds and stuff. But to me this really doesn't mean much.  The real beauty in VR is the gaming i love gaming with a passion me and my family are gonna get this awesome game called new hope online. This game is a mmo RPG it of course has the typical RPG quest adventures and a lot of other things that i cant explain. but generally I'm super excited for only 2 things in this game. The first is that there is  a cohesive and reactive world. Ok ill just give you a small example. so lts say im an adventurer and im killing goblins i go every single day for the next 3 year with 4 of  my freinds  to kill goblins after a while if you hunt destroy or do anything to envirment fror prlonged periods of time the enviroment will etheir act violently and try to destroy you or the worldwill remove that resource from that area. which i think makes total since. ok last but not least you know how nearly every single mmo lets you play as the adventurer only. Well thats changed. In this mmo you are allowed to be a monster if you want thats freaking awesome i love it. The object of a monster is to become strong enough to etheir, make a dungeoun, own a clan/ tribe. generally there are apperently alot of ways to win as a monster but since this is a mmo of course theres no real winning. But as a monster everybody is aiming for the top. another objective is to kill the demon king and take hismantle as hahaha demon king. oh i totally forgot to introduce my self my name is roin . like coin but with a r instead of an c . this is gonna be my story so peace out and read the story .
 
* the star before a sentence means me as an author is talking 
ok this is explaining meanings 
RPG=Role Playing Games 
MMO=Massively Multiplayer Online
Vr = virtual reality

Title: The Swaying Wind
Synopsis:
An Adventure of a prinncess who losing her throne, exploring the world with her friends just to want to know the world. a heartwarming adventure with action, romance and many more...
 
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Hello Its me  U.N. Yura its my second Work even my first work havent i write lately so was thinking finding some refreshing story to look for some inpiration.
If you find some wrong, bad grammar or anything like that just let me know...
PM or commend is kay
TY

Title: The Manalords of Aerth
Synopsis: Long into the future, as a massive cloud of energy was speeding at fluctuating sublight speeds towards the Aerth, one man by the name of Amadeian led a group of scientists to the forsaken continent of Antarctica. There they built many cryogenic chambers from which they would emerge thousands of years after the likely catastrophic event. However, they emerge into a foreign land, transformed beyond belief. How will they affect this brave new world, and more importantly, how has it affected them?

Title: Tusk!
Synopsis: A girl faces the consequences of a failed summon as her would be familiar ruthlessly tortures her. Near death, he gives her a choice; to die, or become his 'champion.' Thus begins the war between the two - and their struggle across the world.

Title: The new beginning and New World
Synopsis:
Ian is a soldier that die in battle when he plan to retire after finishing his mission but who would have thought that there’s a traitor in there rank falling in ambush after ambush and die in the end but he take all the enemy with him to his death but who would have thought that after he die he will wake up returning from the past.
There’s guarantee a chapter every week
First time i write sorry for it being not interisting still gainig experience

Title: My Second Life
Synopsis:
How many eras have passed until now? How many millennia  has it been? I stopped counting after I destroyed the hundredth world. Why? I got bored . People live and they die but I just exist as I have always been. So I ceased to exist by my own will.
let me have a nice and long rest....
an eternal rest....
(many aeons elapse.........)
That was my last thought...
That should have been my last thought.
So that leaves me wondering why a beautiful lady is cuddling me against her bosom???

Title: Cliché Fantasy I
Synopsis:
Love..— An illusion
Trust..— A fragile thing
Family..— A web of lies
Truth..— A betrayal
Warm memories of a happy, loving family shattered. They - the pillars that once held you aloft, crumbled unnoticed. 
The only thing left were the broken pieces of glass from a distant memory - a distant nightmare.
That is until even those were forcefully shoved down your throat along with the bile that oozed from the wounds that bled your heart dry the moment you learned everything. 
You, a fragile existence. A shattered being, completely broken and lost. Your persistence in living hell abruptly ended by an unwanted escape.
Then after the darkness, a new beginning. Unbound, unshackled.
Free.
'Now then, what are you gonna do?'

Title: Powered and not
Synopsis:
On the day that powers are revealed to the world people begin to take sides on their fate. The main character loses his arm and leg in finding out about his extraordinary power. Then when it gets him stuck in a gang war, framed as a murderer and hated even by his family he begins to believe that bad luck is part of his power that he will try to use to save the world from itself.
 
Warning: due to the nature of the mc's power there will be a ton of spoilers for anime, books ect...
this is another old scrapbook story so again it will not be updated unless it gets better recognition than my current stories.

Title: Yet another reincarnation story
Synopsis:
Viktor is a pure-breed gamer. He loves the challenges of new games, even if they don't last very long. In the last ten years, Viktor challenged the top in multiple games. Whenever he won the biggest tournament of one, he left the game behind and searched for something new. Always looking for something that can keep him hooked for longer than a couple of months. Always looking for something special.
Due to his unhealthy lifestyle, Viktor dies and his soul gets transported into another world to reincarnate into the body of a new-born.
 
--- Name of this story is still undecided, so I went with the above. Subject to change. Cover also temporary. Who knows. ---

Title: This is quite ironic.
Synopsis:
So, here's the deal. 
A not so long time ago, people all around the globe got hit by this strange goldish lightning.
Was this a positive thing?
Well... yes and no.
You see, most people just died on impact, simple as that. Those that survived however, gained something extraordinary.
One might say, the next step in evolution. 
But they lost a part of their humanity for it.
Except for me.
I never had it to begin with.

Title: Great Dragon Emperor
Synopsis:
Every race has an Emperor.
The humans, The Elves, The Dwalves, even The Warlocks. And yet why is it that there is no Dragon Emperor. Such Divine creatures. The masters of the world. Its beginning and its end.
They who are without order. Will Soon one day have a Emperor.
......
One day in the darkness of a dungeon an ancient dragon Slept, a being that was first of his kind. Sleeping since the dawn of creation. He who has selpt since time first came into being. Awoken by a boy a boy called Avion.
it was on an seemlessly ordinary a young  stumbles upon the sleeping dragon and from then on an ordinary boy he was not.

Title: The Magus of Origin
Synopsis: Daniel Kho was a man of hard work and too honest for his own good. Betrayed by family and friends all his life, he decided to live alone in peace where no one could take advantage of him anymore. After a decade of saving, he finally bought his own land, built his own home, and started a vegetable plantation. Daniel was only a few months away from becoming completely self sufficient in self-exiled bliss. Unfortunately, fate had other plans for him, as a malfunctioning artifact dropped him in the middle of the mountains in another world where monsters weren’t his only problem.

Title: Stick and Poke
Synopsis:
The story of a magician who is sent on a quest to destroy an evil cult.
Takes place in the real world, simply with magical elements that are unknown to most mortals.

Title: Crimson Moon
Synopsis: Waking after a accident just three weeks before her high school realizing she had changed. It's a struggles with her change in her in her daily life. What would she do as she goes on knowing the fact that she's now a vampire.

Title: Unknown...?? Is it Mermaid??
Synopsis: "Mermaid is the only one who have this power to erase the memory of human who have seen it and heard about it. Do you think it's mermaid??"   asked Deep... He was excited to hear the answer as yes...but it's an unknown mystery which has been a question mark to everyone..

Title: Nagisa's Nee-chan
Synopsis:
A sibling romantic(?) story with some comedic parts.
Nagisa is a 16-year-old boy with parents that are never home and an older sister that seems to hate his guts. One day, his relationship with his sister is drastically changed.

Title: Spread of Chaos
Synopsis: Leon has a problem.  He's been kidnapped from his world to be the champion of a god no one likes.  When his deal with the god Chaos falls through he's stripped of the best part of being a champion.  Now without the active support of his god, he has to turn his last remaining trump card into the mother of all cheats, spread the name of Chaos, and look good doing it, if he's to make it back home.

Title: Psychotic Break
Synopsis:
How far would you go to prove a theory? Would you sacrifice your friends, your lovers, or risk your own life all to find an answer to your obsession?
Dr. Ma is obsessed with finding out the truth to why a seemingly normal person derailed and became a mass murderer. As he delves into finding clues, he consults with his deceased girlfriend's ghost for advice.

Title: Monochrome Bleed
Synopsis:
There’s a world surrounded by a black and white cage. A reality with cracks in it. A world that’s always on the brink of ending yet keeps on spinning. This is the Earth of the Monochrome Bleed.
And this is the tale of a certain man and a certain woman, who both might or might not be entirely human. Who lead their live's making end’s meet, by venturing into places that most don’t dare go, looking for treasure, and other rare goodies. Occassionally saving a few lives along the way.

Title: A Magic Assassin is Reborn as a Dungeon?
Synopsis:
In the modern day, there lives magus. Powerful beings who could command the elements, control mortals at their whim, yet pass through daily life without notice. They used a phenomena called Thaumaturgy. Add on dead apostles, living dead who can be called vampires, and the 27 apostle ancestors and you have a world worth of powerful beings. Yet, each and every one of them fears one man. The Magus Killer. Widely considered the deadliest man on Earth due to his unortodox tactics, combined with a tactical mind on par with clarivoyance. However, he is killed when he meets a powerful dead apostle ancestor. He is then given the most one sided choice in his unlife...
 
So, Kiritsugu will be the main character. Just know that he will be much stronger, and he will be changed in many different ways to suit my needs. I may use a lot of elements from Fate, or I may use none. The only spoiler I will give, is that there will be servants, just not in the way some of you may be thinking.

Title: The Phantom Thief (One-Shot)
Synopsis: Please read at your own discretion. This is a very serious story which I only wrote due to the hot weather and my ever increasing boredom. Seriously, I don't even know why I even wrote this. Some might be offended and I am already giving my apology in advance.

Title: The reincarnated person who go back to earth was hero summoned back to the other world
Synopsis: Sara Blue wolf is a reincarnated person that were in her last year of university, she die in an unfortunate accident and reincarnated as what she is now, a noble woman  and first child and daughter of a duke household with a tradition where the first child of the family needed to go to the Knight order to serve the crown, she lived her life and ended being a commander of her unit but in one of her missions she rejuvenated and transported  back to earth were she become again a student and  again have a normal life when she again go to the same world where she reincarnated, but this time she not die, but she was hero summoned like all the light novels she like to read!

Title: Cultivation at Home!?00
Synopsis:
" hahaha, scream! scream all you want, for there's no one to save you lass! "
" How many times do I have to tell you I'm a boy! ..."
*boom
" Worry not, as I'm here for you! " said a Knight with shining armor
" heh! who do you think you are huh!, acting as a hero saving the beauty! "
"..." (facepalm)
note to self, don't leave the savepoint if you come to another world! 
 
Note:
English isn't my native language,
Beware!
I read so much MTL
 
YOU HAVE BEEN WARNED!

Title: Land Raider Online
Synopsis: The story begins in 2024, a game developer by the name of Kazuma created his newest worldwide game called Land Raider Online(LRO for short), of course, he was a gamer himself but he was a solo gamer he didn't really rely on people, here in the game is where he meets and befriends some new friends.

Title: Idmon the Skeleton
Synopsis:
[Participant in the Royal Road Writathon challenge]
What would a minion do if his master died before him? What would a servant do without its master? What would a Skeleton Soldier do without his Skeleton King?
Have you asked yourself this question? Well if you do that’s nice. I think you already know how this story will go.
 
In a world where goodness already prevailed. When the just have earned their place and the righteous has struck true. Is there a place left for evil forces? I mean about evil forces is like monsters and evil beings.
 
The bad thing is a Skeleton Soldier is having a hard time.
And from here Idmon’s story will unfold.
Personal notes:
My name is Idmon, Halo! English is not my first language but do enjoy my work and forgive my minor errors. I work alone and I’m also the one to fix errors so bear with me. Thanks for checking this out since this is my first novel here in RoyalRoadL

Title: HEAL: In Calamity, Terra & War
Synopsis:
By the end of 1914, humanity was drawn to the pits of extinction.
For the surviving records of the time, reported the cataclysmic change that shifted the world from its very core.
Everything changed in just a moment, and left reeling effects for weeks’ months, years and generations past.
Now, humanity is in the position of ‘prey’. Besieged and surrounded by ever fearsome and horrific ‘predators’, on all sided.
Once, the most dominant species, hunting others for game and passion, had now degraded to being the hunted.
Everything that was known, that was built, that was honoured, and that was prided, have been lost.
However… Hope was not lost.
Humanity, does not relent. No matter the adversity.
For that is the racial trait of the race that lorded over all the lands and seas.
Even in the new age of great danger and turmoil, pockets of resistance take place. To change what is, and regain what was.
Embark on the chronicle journey of Raman Istana, the eccentric inventor and warrior of HEAL. As part of the organisation that is on the forefront of change for the human species.
As they try to vanquish the dangers, garner support and unravel the mystery behind the calamity.
 
 
 
* Updates will be irregular.
** Mature content.
*** Bi sexual relationships are in the plot.
**** Gore & Torture will proliferate.

Title: Sky Emerging
Synopsis: A turn of a century brings hopes of new empire for the beleaguered populist. Merchant companies and bandit corps can only have a glance without regretting gambling it all for the hope of a better future. Welkin, a naive and affluent youth, stumbles down upon a path attacked and greeted by the magic of the world. His calling? Who knows?

Title: Birth Cult
Synopsis: A boy grows up with a split personality, only to be told by his 2nd consciousness that it is a member of an ancient cult that seeks to take control of the world. With the revelation of their objective given to him, will the boy oppose their sinister goals or give up on his chance of saving the world?

Title: Dragged to another world, I sought independence
Synopsis:
Hi! My name is Yagami Zen. Call me Zen.
Ehto… This is a story about my ridiculous adventure into another world. Albeit completely unwilling (thrilled).
It starts from how I arrived into a ‘messy’ situation, sucked-up to the highest person in that place and ran away for freedom.
I will explain about every step of my adventure. My exploits, contribution, troubles, pranks and fun.
My only goal here was to get independent.
I did achieve it, but it came in a very ridiculous way.
Not bad though.
I, myself, am a bratty, but elegant, smart and mischevio0us guy, who loves troubles a little too much.
Read my story and learn about my adventure.
Laugh with or at me as much as you like.
And curse me not.
It’s going to be as fun as the word adventure describes.
Well… Let’s not wait around like a looser and begin…
 
 
* Irregular Updates.
** Involves a lot of misunderstandings on all sides.
*** A fool loves to be one and make others just as much.
**** Involves a level of Gore & Torture.
***** Lots of sexual content planned.

Title: The anomaly wars
Synopsis:
Sometime in the future man has solved all its problems as far as food and resources but now half of it has become a real-life game show set in the desolate place just outside the edge of the pure civilisation where the strong ether rule over the weak or protect them even though, thanks to new technology, anybody can become stronger...
or die in the attempt...
 
 
 
 
p.s: this is another scrapbook story so will not be updated for a long time. My main one is found here (http://royalroadl.com/fiction/11563) and called "from dreams to magic"

Title: The Final Quest
Synopsis:
Everybody loves the Elder Scrolls games, no matter what game a person plays, it always is a unique and fun time.
This is just one verse in the song of Tamriel. Call it Fanfiction, call it a light novel, heck just call it a one shot story. I don't care.(well actually I do, but thats next to the point)
However, please remeber this as you read. 
This story is created through my own understanding of the story of the Elder Scrolls world.(with some help from online videos) If I misinterpret something, say so. I may fix it... eventually. 
Please, enjoy The Final Quest

Title: This Kitty has guns
Synopsis:
She was a rich girl with a dark hobby. But the fate has played a cruel joke on her and her life has ended ... or so she thought. What awaits her in this new world, that for some reason resembles a game.
 
 
 
 
 
Authors note:
English is not my native language, so if spot mistakes feel free to point them out. It's very much appreciated.

Title: Making magic, Forging fame.
Synopsis:
Waking up with no memories.In a world of magic.A new adventure begins.
The story however, starts with the red fox in the mirror.

Title: A Cycle started Anew
Synopsis:
An Endless Cycle. Repeating itself anew time and time again.
The two guardians of the cycle have long since lost interest in it.
The challengers have been left alone to face their trials.
What happens when the Cycle changes?

Title: One Hell of a Ride
Synopsis:
O why did it come to this.
I just wanted to have fun.
Welp, might as well finish what I started.
 
Blake is your average teenager who is on ok terms with his parents and has a decent amount of friends. But like everyone in their adolescence he desires something more than his mundane school life. His chance has finally come when he gets summoned to another world to be a hero! But is that really what he wanted? Either way a journey of epic proportions awaits him!
 
This is your average story about a summoned hero with a bit of a dark twist.
P.S. This is my first time writing something so I’m sorry about any mistakes  I’ll make and I would really appreciate it if you would write them in the comments. Be as brutally honest as possible! There will be no sex scenes but it will mention them every now and then.

Title: The Orphan and the Thief
Synopsis:
From the very beginning it was all Toad’s fault. A blundering, quick-talking thief, he was the one who cut a deal with the dangerous Edward P. Owl: track down the ingredients to the Seeking Solution, or else. Twenty-five thousand gorents, he’d said to her. That was all it took for Melena, a lonely orphan with a knack for potions, to pack her bags and join in on the quest.
From the majestic forest of Holly-Harp Wood to the labyrinth caves of Dunthur to the frigid waters of the Blackens, they search for Owl’s ingredients. Toad and Melena must face sea dragons, cave monsters, birds as large as wagons, kidnappers, and thieves. Toad’s in it to save his head – cross Owl and start digging your own grave. Melena’s in it to get paid so she can start a new life, one that includes her missing brother.
But you really can’t trust thieves.
 
The Orphan and the Thief is also available on Kindle and in paperback via Amazon.com. Thanks for reading!

Title: Gone
Synopsis:
This is the story of James Reide and his struggles. James is going to have to try and survive in a world that is no longer the one he remembers. See his triumphs and see his losses. Only Jame's will can keep him alive now.
Be forwarned that this is my first shot at writing. any constructive responses would be appreciated.

Title: World After Calamity
Synopsis:
Two hundred years ago, the Calamity occurred, an event which changed the terrain and climates of the world immensely, shifting continents and regions, developing new religions and altering life itself. The existence of magic and monsters was no longer able to be concealed, and until the Sage came and ended the Calamity, the world lived in chaos.
Now, two hundred years later, two primary forces in the globe, united under a single government, oversee all magical and supernatural crime and disruptions, working from the shadows and in the light to ensure the safety of all.
Something has upset the delicate balance the Sage created, however, and monsters sightings occur more and more frequently, and the signs of a second Calamity have begun to reveal themselves. At the same time, young superhumans begin training to fight against the forces causing this, to protect the mundane from monsters, and to ensure ancient artifacts are preserved and secured.
This is the story of Team Lusvar, a unit of extraordinary superhumans, the world they live in, and the missions they're sent on and trials they face.

Title: Benevolence
Synopsis:
The Benevolence project, created in part to ensure that the first A.I. would benefit humanity and not lead to its destruction. The Benevolence project was based in simple priciples.
1. That the A.I. would never bring harm onto a human being.
2. That the A.I. would never create anything that would purposefully bring harm to human beings.
3. That these principle would never change within the A.I.
During the developement of the Benevolence system it was determined that the system would be accompanied by a human partner in order to truly allow the A.I. to develop in service to humanity.

Title: I Am... Ananta
Synopsis:
"The world was taken by storm. It happened so suddenly, this company that no one has ever really heard of suddenly put super advanced technology on the market. One of those techs was a Virtual Reality machine called Arc. I was lucky enough to get my hands on some of the stuff they made for free. "True Life" is the name of the game they had made for it. The world's first VRMMO. Me being the game junkie that I am and given a free early access pass, I had to at least try it out.
 
Long story short... a "accident" happened and now... I Am... Ananta. 
 
 
... A True Life indeed...

Title: Tales of Gurak: Meatshield-chan, the walking fortress
Synopsis:
Settings: 3 hundred years after Guardian Reincarnation ending
Synopsis: "Ehhhhhhhhhhhhhh, that's really lame you know-desu?"
"You're asking me what's lame? It's everyone training themselves to have better offense-DESU!"
 
"I'll show the world the wonders of defense power-desu!"

Title: A Cruel World
Synopsis:
A story of an unfortunate child, desperate to cure his bedridden mother.Afraid to be alone, this child would do whatever it takes for her mother, for only she protected and loved him while others shun and fear him as a monster birthed from the misfortune of others.
Will he be able to cure his sickly mother? Or will he fall to despair after failing?
Can he accept the inevitable fate that he will once again be alone in this unforgiving world?
 
The story of a boy's struggle to become a man who can stand on his own two feet against the world and rebel against the fate that it bestowed upon him.

Title: Daily life of reincarnated goblin [Dropped]
Synopsis:
This is the story about a selfish person, the one who seeks peace around him, yet cares none of surroundings
Even if he does something unbefitting for his character, it will still be for his selfish desires, no matter how bad or good it seems from the outside
He dies because his perfect world of hikkomori is ruined, not because it was other's fault, but due to his own selfishness
Dylan did not need the world and the world did not need him so he was erased from his world as if he had never existed, like unneeded game character
And there was the new beginning from the end
God of games and sovereign of four realms reincarnates him in another world, viewing his growth, refusing to help as he is not worthy yet
Despite uncaring nature of sovereign, he wonders whether he will show his full potential in the world that is more befitting for him or not
Sovereign has nothing to lose, the eternity and a single second is the same because the time is always ''present'' for a being such as him, as for Dylan he's not the first and also probably not the last person to be candidate of sovereign's ambassador
Will he reach the qualifications to reach the end and participate in sovereign's 3 deadly games? Only the time can tell, yet sovereign has sealed his own future foresight, just because he wants to feel more entertained and see the struggle of yet another mortal, who has no idea how dangerous things might get if he ascends and gains the power, qualification to destroy the ???

Title: Sword Quest
Synopsis: For twenty years, the island states of Molovar have been walled off from the world of Dirac by the great Mist Dome, a thick fog that appeared on the mysterious 'Day Left in Grey'. Within the dome, the different cultures began turning on each other, in a fight for supremacy of their caged world.On the island of Takanova, the proud Teutons are reaching their limits in the fight against the practiced Wolverine Army, and desperately hope for one of their budding youths to become the next 'Heir to the Sword', a knight who will uphold the Teuton's will to protect their land.Cedric, a troubled teen who happens to be the most highly touted candidate, has always dreamed of being a knight. With his chance at glory ahead of him, the enigmatic boy must face the world head on in a quest to find himself and end the war, while discovering the world's secrets hidden throughout the dome.

Title: Hidden Behind Masks
Synopsis: When Gloria found the corpse-like child in the woods, she had been perplexed. When the kid started making (polite) demands of her, she had been irritated. When the kid refused to leave, she became panicked. She wanted to be left alone, but she also didn't want to be the reason that the kid died. After grappling with her emotions, a storm forces her to finally make a decision. A decision that yanked her right back into a mess of the past that she thought and prayed that she was no longer a part of. Coming to terms with her fate, or at least the bare minimum, Gloria takes the kid into her cabin and under her wing. Once the kid is no longer a walking corpse, Gloria leans that the kid is a young girl named Monica, as well as the fact that she had recently been in contact with the one god who has kept appearing in the past century. All others had gone silent, and the only one left was the brutal god of law, Behther, and him willing appearing was almost never a good thing for a mortal. It would either end in a painful death, or blessing-curse hybrid with a mission in his name. Obviously, the girl was given the latter in the form of creation centric magic based on crystals, and the punishment for not completing her job would be the rest of her life in his service. Now she needed to figure out her abilities, and she needed a teacher. Gloria just happened to be the only who could actually teach her what she needed to know that she could track down. Only issue with her whole mission was... well, Monica wasn't actually told what it was. That's a god for you.

Title: The Life of a Sadist~Torture
Synopsis:
There is a world called Urt, it is inhabited by people; who are selfish and desire power~, in a modern day era, where magic exists. There is a boy. Who is abused by his parents. Everyday he suffers again and again. And even when in pain, the boy smiled. He tried to keep his mentality straight. But one day the boy named Leo was broken~. A 'demon' was let loose and wreak'd havoc~ wherever he went.
After taking care of 'their' buisness he disappeared into the darkness waiting to appear once again...

Title: Princess Rinoa Reudinger
Synopsis:
Legend has it that a brave knight in shining steel armor would be the key to breaking the curse set upon the only princess in Estoria. Before he does, he would have to be able to handle the tests, obstacles and challenges thrown before him, and prove himself worthy.
Unfortunately, our hero starts with Zyler Buxton, an aspiring young writer with dashed hopes and dreams and a fallen relationship that once blossomed. He meets and falls in love with Rinoa Reudinger at a bar, and she is not who he thinks she is. After opening the world of Estoria through the Glimmer Portal, Zyler’s life is forever changed.
However, the legend does not lie: Zyler is not brave; Zyler is not the key to breaking the curse; and most of all, Zyler is not worthy.
Like an open-ended love story written by himself, Zyler will have to overcome unending odds, shark-teeth fishes and the fire-breathing dragon of Temper before the legend is true.
But, as with all stories, there is an ending. And the clock on the Spinal Tower is ticking.

Title: Gunrunner
Synopsis: In the year 2048, a virulent, self-replicating nanomachine dubbed "The Scourge" decimated the world's population and left most of the world barren. The world fell into a state of perpetual lawlessness, where guns were worth their weight in gold and people with the most firepower were kings. In the midst of this chaos, our protagonist, the Gunrunner, offers a safe courier service to those willing to pay. This is the story of his travels across a desolate United States.

Title: Unknown Tapes: Tale of a young Hyacinth
Synopsis:
A room that contains tapes of tales and legends happening in the universe for entertainment. This time a bald old man with a long white fabulously braided beard randomly chose what to watch to cure his boredom. The tape looks like its made of old ordinary wood but its brimming with boundless life energy. Without even reading the tape's description he laid down to his comfy sofa bed and waited the tape to play.
As the tape plays, the old man's unordinary eyes shines with anticipation of what kind of story will unfold.

Title: I am a Fish.
Synopsis: He is a fish. His life is his to live. He will learn. We will feel. He... is a fish.

Title: We are Peacekeepers
Synopsis:
Magic flows through the veins of all of humanity. But those born with noble blood are closer to the source. Staliel was not born into noble blood. He was content living a quiet, average life, when an event suddenly steals away his father and thrusts him into the responsibility of protecting the daughter of a minor noble house.
 
But the girl doesn’t want to be protected. She wants to become a Peacekeeper. A soldier. A spy. The queen’s blade in the dark. Staliel follows her, partly out of duty, partly out of his desire for answers.

Title: Pulsar
Synopsis:
Pulsar follows the story of Collin (Cal Warren) as he progresses through the first ever VRMMORPG.
Follow Collin, as he starts off in a back water system, just trying to survive and get out into the galaxy. As he meets friends and enemies alike, and reaches for the stars.
*As far as the Content tags, i figured it is better to throw them on there considering i will most likely add some mature content to this story. Although that will come at a much later time.

Title: Tainted Ashes
Synopsis: On the small island kingdom of Dreven, magic and danger go hand in hand. For a group of sellswords, a run-of-the-mill job turns out to be something far more sinister. Sometimes while questing to pay the bills, you accidentally save the world.

Title: The Beginning - Breath of War
Synopsis:
The Beginning: Breath of War tells the story of young man wandering through a ravaged post-apocalyptic world in search of his younger brother. Faced with brutality, death and pain from both humans and the fantasy creatures that have invaded his world, he changes. Togran Ka an Orc Warlord and conqueror of many lands finds himself embroiled in ancient rivalries and blood feuds. His attempts to reunify the Orc clans and adapt to the humans use of technology causes much division and unrest among the clans. But his greatest fear is that the Orcs will lose their ways and become just like the humans they hunt into extinction.
Cora a spirited ranger with skills in stealth and ambush heads out with her squadron to protect her settlement. Only to learn of an even greater threat to her home...

Title: History of Coroleya
Synopsis: For those interested in world building, history, and the origins of the orcs, their lifestyle, and how they became the way they are. I will be taking an in-depth look at the History of the Orcs as well as parts of Coroleya. For those who enjoyed The Beginning : Breath of War, you will definitely enjoy this.

Title: A Dungeons Quest
Synopsis:
Dungeon core story.
This is tagged Lit RPG. It does not however have a few common elements.
It is not a person stuck in a game story, as such, no immediate pixie appears out of no where to help. It also doesn't use things like a suddenly appearing status window with level and such. There is mana and creatures of greater and lesser strength. It's just that I feel status windows and such are an attempt by a game to approximate real life, as this is supposed to be real life. They aren't there. Things that have great strength are knowable in the same way you know you can't lift more than a professional body builder. 
 
Enjoy!

Title: Mutant Trouble
Synopsis:
The MC was born in an orphanage. He never met his parents and never truly knew love, but he didn't mind. He considered himself a pretty average guy. Sure, he was smart and didn't look bad, but he wasn't excellent in anything in particular.
23 years after his birth, he died during a terrorist attack. He didn't have many regrets in this life and he knew he would just go down in history as an innocent victim, but nothing more.
However, that was not meant to be. When he woke up again, he felt like he was underwater. After a long time, he could hear voices, thus leading him to realize...
He was reborn~!
---
This is a continuation of my novel Starvation March. I haven't dropped it yet, but probably will soon. Expect crazy villains, justice-hugging heroes, gun-licking mafiosi and a crazy psycopathic mother. Don't expect much from this, and releases will be quite random.

Title: The Eternal Emperor
Synopsis:
Ridley only has one goal in life, become rich!
However, on his road to becoming rich he finds himself trapped in a mine...

Title: House of Omen: The Sheriff Of Langerhans
Synopsis:
Our world is big, theirs is unfathomable. In Phios be it kings or emperors, all have to bow down to the might of the World Army. Its influence stretches across the entire continent and is virtually unmatched, due to the existence of a certain group of beings; Sheriffs.They can smite armies, split mountains and dry up seas with but a wave of their hand.
The path to becoming a Sheriff in nigh impossible; filled with constant bloodshed, but if completed then one opens the door to become a god amongst men.
 Luc Wood intends to be the first person to take the safe route and succeed. Starting in the corrupt city of Langerhans based deep within the remote southern rainforests, Luc intends to forge a destiny that others would be forced to accept regardless of the methods he takes.
The reluctant Forever Flowering King had no idea how long this nickname would plague him and his story would become one of the greatest legends in Langerhans, Phios and beyond.

Title: Death Incarnate (Completed)
Synopsis:
Kei was a menace or called by most, a demon. He gets into bloody fights with others. Which makes him a problem to the common folk and criminals alike. But he can't win forever. So, his life came to a close with another merciless brawl. With Kei trying to take as much of them to hell and in his final moments, he never regretted his decisions in this mad world filled with cruelty. If the world is cruel to you then be more crueler back. 
Then he received a second chance in a sword & magic world but with a condition from the Goddess of Death.
 To save the Demon race.
Note: Don't expect a good story, it's just smut trash as my first published fiction.
Updates are infrequent and may or may not revise these chapters.

Title: Celestial Reaper
Synopsis:
Follow our morally questionable MC as he walks into a new life in a world of myth. Money, fame or infamy, Women, and power all at his finger tips. New world no plans, but to shake the fundations of society.
Warning: Sex, torture, and other dark scenes. You have been warned.

Title: Wildfire - Intrusion
Synopsis: Allinon Zammit is quite content when his reception position isn't interrupted by the actions of his gang lord boss, however when the gang's greatest member returns with the captured "Phantom," a mysterious figure that has been disrupting their operations for weeks, it becomes quite apparent that this day will not be a calm one.

Title: Son of the Phoenix Queen
Synopsis:
Su liang at a young age dreamt of cultivatiing. Unfortunately his talent was lacking. He learned to get by despite a tormented past. And low expectation from both his parents and extended family.
One day while performing the main family entrance exam; Su liang stumbled on an immortal cave. This event would change Su liang life forever to one of violent and passionate love.

Title: Jerusalem 1449
Synopsis: They say Jerusalem had all the answers; and that one need only ask of it “the right questions.” When first I came on the heels of a master far too brave for his own good, I had none to ask. What life I had, long lost. What future, well, maybe that I could ask of it. Oh most holy of cities, Jerusalem, “What bode you, for me?”

Title: Journey To The Moon
Synopsis:
This is a story of a mad scientist and his nephew who go on a journey to the moon. Mathew Jacobs who is a scientist, believes that there is no life on the moon,but his nephew John Richards believes that there is life on moon, and it has been on the moon since the beginning of this huge universe.John's father himself was a scientist and he too believed that there is life on moon. However he was never able to prove it. John has been living with his uncle since his parents passed away in a car accident. However John's father, Robert left john with a great deal of his research. Once John was examining his father's work when he found some exclusive and weird pictures and as well as some co-ordinates. When john told Mathew, his uncle about he too was surprised. Now he too believes that there is life on the moon, however when they told the government about it, the rejected it.
Thus, together they both set off to a journey to the moon. Will they be able to prove themselves right or will they return empty-handed and prove hemselves wrong

Title: Almagear (V2)
Synopsis:
At Year 2123 quarter of the world had been destroyed caused by Mass Weapon. A Scientist named Schrodinger Schwarz really mad at humanity choice and make seven intelegent automaton to destroy humanity. Five scientist run and hide to counter the automaton. They take one hundred human with them to become experimental rat to make a humanoid soldier. Can humanity survive and prevail?
 
Or the Scientist rage hammer fall upon humanity?
 
Did Humanity extinct or humanity will prevail and survive?
 
Lets join this struggle...

Title: A Meaningless Hero
Synopsis:
Book 1
Gray, a college student in his final year of studies suddenly finds himself in another world on his way to class. For most, a dream come true. Not for him. Caught in a life-threatening situation minutes after arriving, can he find a way home? And if he can... will he want to after spending so long in this new world?
-Author's Note-
My first story posted here, inspired by elements from Japanese web novels, Xianxia and more. 
Not much to say other than enjoy and thanks in advance for reading.
Rewrite hosted on scribblehub as "Nothing Persists"

Title: Murderous Loves
Synopsis:
"Look into my eyes"I whispered he adjusted his eyes to look into mine.

"1 month ago, my mother was murdered. I came home to see her dead body lying dead on the floor. The man who killed her hasn't escaped yet. Imagine the rage I felt when I saw the man with the same 34 magnum that killed my mama in the waistband of his pants" I pressed his head harder against the table. "You tell me what I could do when I was filled with rage."

Zeke a 16 year old boy comes home to find his mom murdered, after killing the man who murdered his mother hes sent to jail, how will his new life be when he is released and how will his city feel about the new murder running around town.

Title: Richard the Paladin
Synopsis:
Pride… Courage… Faith... the three unbreakable oaths. These were the words the Paladins remembered every time they glanced at their swords.
But not this time, and definitely not at this place – the demons showed no mercy.
Day after day the unyielding Paladins fought, pitilessly slaughtered and butchered in the most humiliating ways. Their moral soon dropped. Most fled.
And just when everyone thought the war was as good as over, two Paladins, Richard and Wilbert, managed to do the impossible and infiltrated deep inside the demon’s stronghold.
Both aware that the faith of the battle and the lives of their compatriots were now in their hands, they arrived before the terrible Demon King for one final confrontation.
But what Richard didn’t know at that time was that the result of this battle would set in motion a new adventure; one full of misfortunes, hidden enigmas and new locations to explore.
But no matter what trials he faced, his goal remained the same: to gain the title of the Greatest Paladin of all time.
 
***************
Author's note: This is the first novel that I intend to finish the entire first arc, as long as my health permits, regardless of the number of followers and ratings this will be getting. Expect one/two chapters per week as I am a slow writer and I don't want to force myself. Whenever I feel like writing, I will don't worry.
Thanks for reading.
 
This novel will contain – Magic, Fantasy, Thriller, some tragedy, some comedy, adventure.
There will not be – rape scenes and boring chapters.

Title: There's a hole!
Synopsis:
Have you ever experience how to jump from a plane without a parachute?
Well I think no one knows since none of those who jump survived...
If you ask me if I have an experience...not until now!
Why there's a hole appearing out of nowhere?
Of all place, why in front of our door?!
Ahhhh!!

Title: The Blood-Soaked Circus
Synopsis: SkyTower City was built around the remnants of a long dead sorcerer's lair. Though the era of magic had long since passed, the  dark enchantments on the colossal tower still held firm. After thousands of years, the city has grown to be one of the largest, and most deadly places in the world. Over five hundred miles in diameter, and over twenty million inhabitants, the beast rarely slept. This is the tale of but one of those many people, and his goal of being the first person to enter the Skytower since the death of it's last master. To do that, however, he'll need an army, and an ocean of blood.

Title: A tale of the four warriors
Synopsis: This is the story of four heroes, each from a different land that come together to prevent a catastrophic war between their lands. Along the way they grow and come to the conclusion that they shouldn't have to be the ones to save their world.

Title: Freedom Universe Online
Synopsis:
In the universe there are beings known as the Gods, a race with super advanced technology, they found a way to preserve the consiousness of organics and proceeded to digitalize the universe. As they digitalize we move to a backwater planet of humanoids that still believe they are the only intelligent humanoid species in the universe. Discover the life of one of said people who leads the way for his species to advance in the virtual world based of the actual Universe.
 
This is a new fictional story I am working on and I will update one chapter a month for now until it takes off.

Title: Emperor of All
Synopsis:
Arthur wanted nothing but the strength to protect his family and make their lives better. But when his Awakning came, he got powers much stronger than he ever imagined.
Watch how a young youth unaware of the dangers lurking in this mysterious world ventures on an adventure to know the true limits of his powers and gain strength.
Watch how he defies commom sense and shakes the very foundation of the world with his friends.
Watch how he climbs towards the peak of stregth and becomes the Emperor of All.

Synopsis: Deleted

An average person with an average job, average family, average income reincarnated into the world of Fantasy filled with magic, wonderful scenery, and creatures that will even haunt you into your dream. Follow him on his journey to become the strongest person in the continent.

Title: Penny and her Desires
Synopsis: Penny wanted it all, but why did she have to get it?

Title: Tale of Ramiel
Synopsis: Ramiel got transported into an other world by accident.Things didn't go well for him.But one night, at the time where he wanted to close his eyes for good.A woman appeared and gave him hope.With that hope, he continued on living...

Title: Ragnarök Delayed
Synopsis: After I died I received an offer to be reincarnated in a Fantasy World.The problem is - I'm not exactly going to be a "hero" of that world, it wasn't really an offer to begin with, and the strange shapeless black entity who gave me that "offer" wasn't really trustworthy... or sane. Now I am alone in a world that wants me dead. A world I am supposed to ruin as a part of a game I don't understand. I don't even know who plays that game... but it looks like it's a game in which everyone - from pawns to players - is trying to cheat.**********Mature Content Warning - foul language, gore (in the future), potential sex scenes (in the future).

Title: More than Love
Synopsis:
A Transition and Restart sideshow
 
Far from the events unfolding in Tokyo, much smaller ones, but equally important for those involved, occur in Gothenburg, Sweden.
 
One way or another the arrivals touch upon the lives of those a continent away, sometimes only indirectly.
 
This is one such story. Less than love and more than love.

Title: Tower of Babel: Speedrunner
Synopsis:
Launch day. 
That was what they called it. The day when over four million people vanished in an instant from the island of Manhattan.  The day earthquakes ravaged the east coast. The day a one hundred and one kilometer tall tower rose from the wreckage of the now empty city. The day every screen, newspaper,  and smart phone displayed a single message from an unknown source:
The Great Emperor has issued his challenge.
From the ruins of the Old World rise the Tower.  Its doors will soon open, and the great game will begin.  
A hundred floors and a hundred challenges await the worthy.
And to the victor?  A Wish of Unlimited Power.
Cayden Caros yearned to play that game.  His only problem?  The Terms and Conditions. A strict set of rules that, among other things, prevented anyone under the age of sixteen from entering the tower.  
Forced to wait for over two years, Cayden did the only thing he could do to pass the time. He researched, he practiced and he prepared. It would take a lot to catch up to players with such an enormous head start.  Lucky for him, he was a special type of gamer.  
A SpeedRunner
 

So.... It has been a hot minute.
I don't like talking about my personal life, but suffice to say I had some fairly bad times for the last couple of years and have only just recently pulled myself back to good health, physically and mentally. I have a very supportive partner, and am put together enough that I want to get back to doing what I love. Writing nerd fiction that I am too embarassed to try to explain when people inevitably ask what my books are about.
Still beats when I used to write erotica.
Story updates for book 3 should be on a daily schedule, baring unforseen circumstances.
The majority of chapters from books one and two have been pulled down to keep with amazon's KU rules. 
Book one is found here.
Book two is found here.
If you like the story, please comment or favorite.  Each comment goes a long way towards pushing visibility for the story, which means more people get to see it and I feel slightly more validated as a writer.
I have a discord now where you can ask me things and I can be like 'no. no. I'm not answering that. no."

Title: Masochist Berserker
Synopsis: This story starts where all stories should start, at the beginning. It starts off with a young boy, who isn't aware of how the world really works yet. Lucky for him he has several dozen heavily armed teachers on their way to show him, they are even generous enough to teach his entire village. Will our young protaganist survive this? Or will he immediately die a horrible and utterley random and undeserving demise, read and find out!

Title: What is Home?
Synopsis: It was suppose to be a good day, his father had just returned home. But one after another things started to go wrong and he found himself on a strange world cut off from the others. Growing up here would have him live through a life beyond his imagination.

Title: These Spaces in Time
Synopsis:
For long, I was lost in a world of my creation, a world, or universe, or... Everything. I could do Anything, but did I want to? Now that I am back, I often catch myself thinking "was it worth it? Was my life, and sacrifices worth it ?" I'm not sure anymore. This is my story.
What if you found yourself able to do anything, to produce, create, change, invent, bring to life, anything you could possibly imagine? Everything, but the one thing you crave for, your heart craves for? What if you don't even remember what you crave for?

Title: Catch Me If You Can (a PicYourStory entry)
Synopsis:
A survivor of a spacecraft crash desperately tries to survive in a ruined world long enough to escape capture and find a way to return home.
(this is an entry to Scribble's PicYourStory writing event)

Title: The Lonely Hermit
Synopsis: A hermit, and his life. Followed shortly afterwards by a timely intervention to bring him out of retirement. Sporadic updates.

Title: Manapocalypse
Synopsis:
Mark and his sister Liz have grown up in a household that had always been preparing for the Apocalypse, but they never expected it to actually come to pass. Now, their family is struggling in a world where monsters appear from thin air and technology no longer works. They thought they were prepared, but who can really be ready for the end of civilization as we know it to?
Follow the Randall family as they discover what happened to the world, why it ended, and what new abilities they all seem to have.
Book 1 in completed, and book 2 is in a long, slow, and intermittent state, and will some day in the distant future be completed.

Title: Gun Meister Online [Second Draft]
Synopsis:
Gun Meister Online is a new and exciting Virtual-Reality Combat Simulator. Players assume the role of Meister; fighting and ranking up into new and higher divisions. Within the game, weapons take on human shape. These NPC’s use a new Dynamic Distributed Personality System recently implemented, and many are excited by how life like the AI characters are becoming.
Charlie has only just begun to play, and he stumbles and struggles with the matches. Slowly he grows as a Meister, and at the same time, starts to take charge of his real-life outside. Charlie finds friendship among a group of erratic misfits, along with an arsenal of beautiful weapons. Follow along on his adrenaline filled adventure. One that may decide the fate of a world.
Online experience may vary from person to person. Gun Meister is rated [Mature] and only those eighteen or older are allowed to enter a world of guns, violence, profanity, fast cars, pretty girls, and a hot mess of sexual content. Have we mentioned harems, yet? Every Meister gets one.

Title: The God Emperor System
Synopsis: A young man finds himself dying due to his idiocy, after he passes away his soul is transported to another world which fits his needs and wants perfectly. Read as he lives according to his rules. (btw not my picture)

Title: Almighty
Synopsis: Who am I?  Well I am the etheric energy.  I am the creator and the destroyer. I am all and also I am nothing. I am the drakness and also the light. Everything starts from me and also ends with me. Yet no one knows about me and I dont mind it at all. I take physical form when ever i get bored and decide to have fun and roam any one of the world that I have created. I have visited many worlds in different forms and this time i have decided to roam around in human form although i can change into anything at my will

Title: Divine Diversions
Synopsis:
In the multitude of Realms, Dimensions, Realities, Planes and other such things there exists a special place. There those who wish to be the masters of Realms, be it god, demon, dragon, asura or other higher power fight in games, the prize to ascend into the ranks of the greater powers. These 'games' are watched by billions of beings all over the Realms. There favorites, bets, and sometimes even sabotage.
This is the story of the start of one famous contender for the status of Higher Being, come and watch with us his risings and fallings through the ranks
-----
Note: For those of you who read my other story, I have not stopped it. This story along with other things has caused my brain to not spill out what I need for the other, so I am writing this one now in the hopes it will help unclog the neural pathways.

Title: King of Kings
Synopsis:
"ENDLESS!! This world is endless!
There is nothing in this world except monsters. No land, no oceans, no mountains, no sun, no moon, no day, no night. Nothing but an endless amount of monsters roaming around killing and fighting each other endlessly."
 
A boy stuck in an Endless Void roaming around endlessly only to kill monsters aimlessly. One day he was transported into a new world with a new body named Gio. Given this rare opportunity to finally be free from that hell-like Endless Void, he swore to be the ruler of this new world one day. 
 
** This novel will emphasise Army-building, Kingdom-building, bloodline and romance in a Fantasy Ancient-Era background. So if you like any of those please stay tuned and give feedbacks on how I can improve my writing skills. I will try to update this novel AT LEAST once a week. Once I improve my writing skills and found my writing style, I will try to increase the amount of releases. So please give me lots of feedbacks be it critics or compliments it will certainly help me.

Title: Creation - The Path of a God
Synopsis:
The day had not been a great day for Han.  After experiencing traumatic events, all in one day, Han went to a restaurant to eat.  This should have been a typical event, but he discovered a new ability while eating food.  He had gained the Creation ability.  
 
Follow Han, as he gains new experiences in a new environment and figures out what being a god is like.  What happens if an individual gets powers that don't have limits, where he can do whatever he wants.

Title: The Archaic Ring Series
Synopsis:
An original story inspired by xianxia and western fantasy.
At sixteen years old, Nolan spends most of his time skipping class and playing video games, though lately he's been getting into more fights than he cares to admit. His once record-high academics are nearing the end of a gradual decline, a byproduct of a growing indifference that began to fester after his parents' divorce. All of his worries dissipate like smoke in the wind when he inexplicably wakes up in another world, only to be replaced by a wider spectrum of vexing problems.

Title: Testers
Synopsis:
It's... on HIATUS until I get plot... orz
People get transported into a fantasy world.They all have goals: going back home, conquering the world etc.World has many game-like elements: Menus, Skills, Monsters etc.Let's... follow them around; see what they do.
