Title: Why They Changed
Synopsis: Sometimes, all you need is a little company.

Title: A Loud Echoing from a Silent World
Synopsis:
Fantasy and Science Fiction shorts or one-timers.
From epic fantasy to cyberpunk. Slowly, but surely, all the sub-genres will be explored.
 
No man's land - Military, War, Aetherpunk.

Title: I May Have Overslept Too Much
Synopsis: The story begins with the last day of Rain playing Aegis, the most popular of all VRMMORPG where everything is possible. Our MC decided to play one last time before quitting the game, trying to slay the most powerful boss in the game. After an 18-hours struggle, exhaustion finally takes its toll in him and decided to rest. Unexpectedly when he woke up and opened the door something is different...

Title: Juno and the Wanderer
Synopsis: Juno's life was forever changed the day Wanderer walked into her apartment lobby and brought her with him in his journey. He is unlike any other being to live. Mysterious and charming, his past is unknown, and nothing is normal when he is around.

Title: Realm of Legend
Synopsis: Levi knew it was suppose to be like another reality. He knew it was suppose to feel exactly like living. What he did not expect, was to not be able to tell the difference; To come to relate with the digital inhabitants and to love them. This is the story of an immortal cursed to watch the lives of the people he has come to love speed toward an inevitable end.

Title: The Blue Wizard
Synopsis: Jesús is a regular Colombian kid who enjoys his family life despite being lower class. Then one day Jesús' parents get kidnapped by an evil being. For a while, he gets used to a lonely life until the forces of good inspire him to become a hero. As the hero, Jesús finds that there has been and will always be hidden opposing forces at play, which he has been dragged into.

Title: Emperor Magus
Synopsis:
Ever since 'the incident', Damien has never been the same. There was nothing for him to live for. A sudden turn of events results in him catapulted into a new world where Gods, Eldritch Beings, and Demons are very and very dangerous. How will he survive in this very cruel world!?
First fiction.
 Stay Tuned
 
P.S Cover is not mine

Title: Death Is Only The Beginning
Synopsis: Death is only the beginning. Thane has just died after hearing of his only friend's death. Knowing he can't continue to fight his way through High School, but the afterlife has other plans for him. He hasn't completed his life the way they need him to. And boy do they need him. Others have also been recruited, no more forced into this. Forewarning, there are a lot of time shenanigans. This is only the beginning.

Title: The Worldforge: Warlock Rising
Synopsis:
Abandoned as an orphan, Mar was tested for magic by the Mages of Orelm and was found to possess immense magical potential, but when he grew old enough to start his training he found he was unable to cast so much as a single spell!
Embarrassed by their mistake, the mages threw him in the library where he read books and tutored the mage students for a bit of money. All the while, he can’t help but envy the the students who are living the life he had so eagerly awaited.
But when an object of great and malevolent power promises to make good on all the promises the mages broke to him Mar is thrust into the world of magic. Mar will find that fate had something more than a life confined to the library planned for him after all.
 
Authors Notes:
I consider this to be a comming-of-age Sword and Sorcery story based mostly on the style of classic western fantasies. So if that's your thing then I encourage you to take a peek.
Something I want to mention though is that the main character starts of pretty wimpy, and that might not be your thing. That being said, if you stick with him he's got a long way to grow.
Also, while this version of the story is meant to be fully readable, more dicerning readers may want to wait until I move out of rough draft phase. There may be some inconsistancies with character and plot while I am still in the rough draft phase. I'm sorry for this, but this is my first web novel and from what I've read the best way to get a good novel out is to write write write, and then edit ruthlessly after you're finished with the book, so that's the plan I'm going to follow.

Again, this is a rough draft. Everything you are reading is subject to change, including the name, title, and cover photo. This may no longer be the case once I've decided I know where this fiction is going and I have a reasonable understanding of the characters and their behavior. You're reading what comes off my keyboard as it's made, with very limited editing.
There will be mistakes in the text. I do a quick spell check to take out the worst of the errors, but there will be some I miss. You can point them out in the comments if they are particularly confusing or glaring and I will try to fix them, however I am not overly concerned about minor errors as this is not the final draft by any means.

Title: Lord Universe Creator
Synopsis:
Before the beginning of time there was the creator who wandered the void for eons.
The Creator created the universe with a simple wave of his hand.
With a thought, created life.
He was the beginning.
Once the seed of life was planted and in motion the Creator went into slumber.
Hundreds of millions of years have past; the Creator has awoken.

Title: Ambitions of an Immortal
Synopsis:
Countless years ago the first cultivators appeared in the Enlightened Realm. They were powerful beings who could perform incredible feats.
They had great power and controlled the very forces of the universe. They did this by understanding and mastering the Heavenly Laws.
Then a change occured.
The Heavenly Laws left to a higher realm leaving behind only echoes of themselves. Without the original Heavenly Laws in place cultivation has become easier in some ways and harder in others.
Only the Chosen may cultivate.
It is in this realm that we follow the tale of a sickly young man filled with emptiness. Driven only by a deep ambition, chasing a dream of eternity.

Title: I do whatever I please
Synopsis:
What happens when the strongest being in existence decided to go on an adventure to every Universe? 
Watch how our protagonist experiences a cultivation world, a RPG-World, a world of advanced technology and lastly a world of magic. There will be a lot of OPness, fun, adventure and action.
*There may or may not be Romance from the MCs point of view*

Title: The Arcane Seeker
Synopsis:
This is a fan-fiction based on Aternus' excellent work The Arcane Emperor.  I'm grateful to him for his permission to write using the rich, complex world and characters he has created.  Please read his story first - it's good. 
The Arcane Seeker starts as does The Arcane Emperor:  Rainer, a college sophomore and amateur arcanist, tried to create a spell to walk through walls.  In his first attempt, rather than walking through a sheet of cardboard, he was thrown through space and time to a world with levels, fantasty monsters, stat screens, and very real danger.  He does not understand what happened, or where he is.  But Rainer is an Arcanist - a powerful class that means this strange world is a place brimming with opportunity as well as danger.
Unlike the cannonical Rainer of Aternus' work, this Rainer, as a teenager, took up fencing rather than piano as a hobby.  A small change, but a small change in the beginning can lead to big changes in how a story goes...
The first chapters will closely mirror the first chapters of The Arcane Emperor, before heading off in a different direction altogether.

Title: The King Of Sloth
Synopsis:
What happens when you take an extraordinarily lazy and indifferent prince that doesn't do anything else other than sleep and put him in a world of swords and magic? A world where the strong rule over the weak and crush all who say otherwise? A world where monsters of all kinds roam free?
He sleeps obviously!

Title: Phola Sio
Synopsis:
Suddenly, Shaila looked deep into the eyes of Amy and said, "Let's go home, princess." Shaila said cheerfully and dragged Amy towards the center of two trees with conjoint roots.  Everything became white in Amy's eyes, she can't see anything.
          
                                     "Welcome to Phola Sio!"
      
                                                oOo
      
      Amy Matson, an 17 year old girl, entered the magical world of Phola Sio with her mysterious classmate, Shaila Evaia. What lies in Phola Sio are great adventures, views, new people often mysterious, and unexpectedly Luke Zziek. She also uncovered something really unexpected, including about Luke Zziek and the Zziek. But an unfortunate event made Amy hard to come back to her world, to Earth. Can Amy really return to her so-called home? But is Earth really her home?
  
                                                oOo

                                 First book in Augaclion Series. ^^

Title: The Daily Life of a Divine Soul
Synopsis:
Finding himself at the verge of entering the Sea of Souls after dying a sudden and unexpected death, Leng Yu was not allowed to rest easy as he was dragged back into the world of the living by a great evil! Forcing his poor soul to become the medium that will devour two of the most powerful experts of another world! Yu is then granted a new and terrifying body that can withstand his newfound divine might by the God of the other world! 
Join Leng Yu as he lives a carefree life in the most brutal continent of this other world. Obtaining a Spirit Queen as his wife, exploring the world's wide array of fragrant teas as well as causing countless jaws to drop and numerous eyes to widen as he does!

Title: The Restless Valkyrie
Synopsis: The world destroyed itself in the very greed of humanity, the thirst for power that had let to the previous success and survival of mankind led bloodlines to turn on their own kind. Although much of the planet was ravaged by weaponry to powerful to contain, survivors,  revealed themselves from the ash. Two factions, the Vargon, and the Rebels are locked in a never-ending struggle. Well-known fighters of both groups happen to be related; by blood. Outmatched, and overpowered, Valkyrie, and her band of determined warriors are willing to put anything on the line to finally eliminate the Vargon threat. Axel, her brother; and a skilled Vargon knight, is willing to do whatever it takes to have his sister carried away in a body bag. The unbelievable technology of the Vargon, and the inhuman fighting skills of the Rebels lead to the bloodiest of conflicts, leaving many wondering if the varying views of humanity could lead to the next, and the final splitting of society.

Title: Life as a Dragon
Synopsis:
The world of Matrea was attacked by a vagrant god. The Chief God of Matrea and a few minor gods managed to destroy most of the vagrant god, however, the vagrant god managed to slip a fragment of himself into Matrea, giving birth to a powerful Demon King.
Distressed, the Chief God summoned four heroes to help the inhabitants of matrea, but the four heroes were still defeated and the Demon King successfully conquered Matrea.
Unwilling to give up, The Chief God created the fifth hero and sent him 30 years prior to the Demon King's birth. With the help of the fifth, along with the four heroes and Matrea's inhabitants, the war shall begin anew.
 
 
 
Kingdom of dragons
swords and magic
Hello again folks

By the way, I Love Dragons!
beware: I'm not an English speaking native, I apologize for the Engrish and wrong grammarszzz!

Title: Lich in Hero's Realm
Synopsis:
Once there was an elf... he fought humans, but was betrayed by council, fell in love with vampire, watched as she was killed, and destroyed the world... well sort of.
Now he has come to the world from where the heroes came from, but here's the thing. He was never before reincarnated in that world, nor it analogues.
***
As usual there will be strange situations, MC lacks common sense, and he's a glutton. Not much power gaining as the MC will be a bit (Really) OP. Also this story is set in the world similar to our, just some minor changes in history and names. MC is 'Evil' with no shred of humanity (elfinity?) in him, just some creature with dampened emotions and sadistic tendencies. Title: Coupe - The Art of Rebellion
Synopsis:
A modern world where various humanoid species co-exist, Human, Animalia, Undead, Vampire and Elf. A certain event triggered a dangerous button which forced a war to happen 3 years ago. The 2 years prolonged war was finally over when Japan proposed a peace conference by creating the group called Coupe.
Coupe is stated in history to be the 'saviour' of the world, but there are dark sides of the story that only few knows.
The story takes place around the remnants of the Coupe that live their life after the war. Hiroaki Kuznetsoz, one of the members is working as Jack-of-All-Trade in underground world merely for his greedy desire. One day, a girl comes with a request, soon becomes his girlfriend and solves the mystery behind the request together, along with their untold secrets that they refuse to tell each other.

Title: Last Ray Of Hope
Synopsis: What happens when the spirit won't rest...?

Title: Wild Wild West
Synopsis:
Snynopsis 
John a typical college student playing Wild Wild West a VRMMORPG using oculus VR technology.  Not a full deep dive experience but a complete 3D visual rendering using standard keyboard and mouse movement. 
It takes great skill, reaction time, quick typing and most of all fast internet speed to become #1 in Wild Wild West!
Follow John, his guild, and party members in their adventure!
---
Author Note: Hi! Navi here!  This is my first lite novel.  I have been a reader in RRL for a long time and finally have the itch to write.  Please be kind I have no editor at the moment.  My grammar needs work…. 
I wanted to write a Wild West theme MMO into the mix of RRL novels.  I have no definite release scheduled just writing because I’m bored at work.
Thanks for your time!

Title: Darklands: Book Three of The Rhenwars Saga Preview
Synopsis:
The Well of Tears is Unsealed.
Compelled to obey the dark god he pledged his soul to, Darien finds himself tasked with delivering the people of the Black Lands from under the curse of darkness which shrouds the skies. With the enemy mage Azár, Darien sets out across a barren darkscape to assume his place as the leader of a people who despise him.
As he journeys deeper into the shadowed waste, Darien is confronted with difficult truths that force him to question every loyalty he has ever held. For there, in the brutal proving grounds of the north, Darien will be inexorably forged into the most dangerous adversary the Rhen has ever faced.
 This is a preview of a novel available on Amazon

Partnering up with the first person she meets, this story is the diary of her transported life in another world. Follow her on an adventure where magicians, adventurers and knights exist.

Title: Frozen Journey
Synopsis:
In the far north, a mystery lies.
The blizzard barrier, a magical phenomena blocks all roads that could lead further to the north.
A frigid temperature, that no leaving being can go thougth, if not for just one exception, the mighty snowmans.
Strong and big creatures akin to ogres, they are the only ones who can pass througth this magical wonder.
The snowmans lives a peacefull life but a new addition to their tribe may be destabilizing.

Title: New Spartan
Synopsis: This is the story of a man who's family was murdered. Then in a fit of rage he hunted down the men who took away the precious things in his life. Now he has be sentenced to a new hellish prison where the inmates are place in suspended animation and their minds are sent to a virtual world where the fight to entertain the rich with the hope of surviving long enough to be granted their freedom. This is the story of Captain Alexander Washington, code name Spartan. Follow him as he uses his military training and skills to try and survive in a hellish world where he and every other human are hunted for food, entertainment, and pleasure. Will he survive or he die with all of the other convicted criminals.

Title: Midnight Devouring King
Synopsis:
SUMMARY
 
A hundred thousand years ago, the Ancient Draok Clan began their tyrannical conquest to rule the entire realm. The Ancient Draok Clan, with a bloodline so terrifying it shook the world by mention, conquered secret realm after secret realm and enslaved everything in sight. The slaves underneath them were treated in unspeakable ways and constantly lived in fear.
 
In almost no time, the entire realm was unified under the Ancient Draok Clan’s name. However the Draok Clan was stretched out and exhausted, needing to gather their resources for an ascension into the heavens. Yet even the Heavens were fearful, and the Army of the Heavens unified and sealed the Draok Clan at their weakest point - they were banished to the darkest section of space.
 
Yet a heaven-shaking revolt later ensued, leading to the mass break out of the Ancient Draok Clan and immortal bodies that covered the realm.
 
A hundred thousand years later a amnesic youth wandering the forest awaits his bloodline awakening.

Title: Path of One's Natures Defiance
Synopsis:
This is my first novel story so I feel like I dont have the skills compared to others on the website.
But I shall try my best, And I shall enjoy myself writing this dumb story of mine.
- - - - - -
Worlds Liberation.
Two words that took the world by storm with its sudden appearance.First of its kind, a virtual video game and a system required for it. It came out of the blue with no announcment prior, it revealed the games release within a week andboasting about extreme realism that will renewal the view of the gaming genre.With its overwhelming trailer that showed a whole new world to explore and legendary monsters to fight.People talked endlessly about the game that they cant wait to play.The slogan ''Find your own path'' caused many people who wants to explore feel thrilled, Specially studentswho wants to escape reality.Izzy RenatoThe School loser and total loner was touched upon the games slogan.Wanting to find his own path in this new world, he set out to find himself in the worlds first virtual reality game.Hoping that he could be someone else inside the game.Only to find his true self within.

Title: God Of Fire
Synopsis: Let me introduce myself I am Blaze I will tell you how I became known as The God Of Fire. This story will show you my path to becaming the strongest God in the universe. ••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••

Title: Ilmarinen
Synopsis: “Welcome to Ilmarinen, the most realistic MMORPG this world has ever seen. Beta testers have called it a second reality. It is a game with few restrictions on gameplay and constantly adapting environments and NPC’s. It is possible to become kings or live as poor farmers and craftsmen in a magical medieval society. under the careful watch of one of the worlds most advanced AI programs, the game will adapt to allow for lifelike interactions with NPC’s and gameplay that adapts to actions we never expected a player to make in the original game. Like the typical MMORPG characters will be able to gain stat points and levels through the subjugation of mobs or other players and quests. However, just like you will be able to train attributes manually and there will be no inventory, unless you get an enchantment or spell for one. Also, like in reality there will be no levelling skills. If you want to do something use your own two hands and learn how to do it!”

Title: Humanity
Synopsis: Blair is spending a magical day at the park with her precious baby sister when her life changes forever.

Title: a lotus of death
Synopsis:
there once was a young girl whose name was lotus they had but one belief to fight a monster one must become a monster the thing they hate the most to kill and give into their darkest side to let go of any attachments to the world she was raised in a small town before her parents died and she was taken into the "orphanage" but she soon realized out the truth no one cared for them they would not be taken in and no one would care if they died but that's when things changed 
an: (this novel was inspired when I was playing Skyrim after completing the dark brotherhood questline and doing a bit of research on books i had just borrowed at the time ps this novel was also inspired by the funny idea a person who's name is Mr.Q gave me after I said something to him while he was streaming the dark brotherhood questline)

Title: Devour
Synopsis:
A girl wakes up in a forest, with no memory of who she is. The only thing she feels is hunger. She takes on traits from what she eats- and soon her goal becomes clear. She must devour the entire world.
The prequel to Boredom of a Goddess. Why am I writing a sequel when the first book is still ongoing? That's because I'm absolutely barking mad.
The sequel CAN be read as a standalone novel, without too much consequences. I've made an effort to explain everything thoroughly so that you don't feel lost even if you don't read Devour before it.

Title: Just another RPG story

It's usually like that right?
 
BUT
 
I became a slime..
 
Well time to grind...
 
Again.

Title: The Shroud
Synopsis:
Ben Florence is an ordinary boy living an ordinary life in an ordinary world.
Shroud is a super villain with an alien suit torn from the dead body of his parent's murderer. 
 
When their two minds are combined due to unknown means they make a startling discovery, they are the same person from two different worlds. Without knowledge of how they ended up together or how to separate from each other the two team up, delving into a world of heroes and magics in an effort to discover the source of their problems.

Title: A Tale of Fiorie
Synopsis:
Story introduction:Since ancient time's gods and devils fight numerous wars, although there hasn't been a victory for both sides as the time passes, they exhausted and so decided to pass their legacies to the humans in the mortal world..Through that way humans possessed spirit power and began to cultivate martial Dao. It changed the way of life beings in the mortal world from then onwards ...Our story starts at the fiorie kingdom which is the land of so many legacies ...various youngsters from various families through encounters decided to embark on cultivation road as they face many hardships which will test their bonds...and decide their faith...
 
Author synopsis:
                          This is my fist work. so if there any grammatical errors please kindly bring me to notice. So, I can correct them and provide you a nice story to read.

Title: Class: God-slayer
Synopsis: The gods make up the natural balance so when they stop following the rules there is no balance. Then things get bloody and the universe has no choice but to beat them into submission but that's kinda hard when you have no physical body and also can't directly interfere with the world so that leaves one option it needs a warrior someone who take up arms against the gods. Nobody in their right mind would hunt gods... at least not from this world.

Title: Velteria: The Thief
Synopsis:
(Indefinite Hiatus)
 
Life was fine, if a little harsh, for Liliei, a young thief living in one of the biggest city on the continent. That is, until she stole an old ring, and everything went wrong.
 

One of my goal in writing this is to improve my writing skills, so do tell if you have constructive criticism.

Title: The Day I accidentally started the apocalypse but got an insane power
Synopsis:
Synopsis: Cody thorson was 17 he had an average build, average height and a Average personality but what made most girls fall for him instantly was his facial features his hair was pitch black, crimson red eyes and a Chiseled face, his facial features looked like they were sculpted by a master sculptor. You could imagine how many guys were jealous of him.
Cody was at an island hotel off the coast of California, when he went hiking with two friends at a mountain behind the hotel that for some reason was off limits.they found a cemetary up there what happened afterwards changed the world as we know it
 
ps: this is my first story, it is based off a dream i had on  5/14/2017 obviously some things might be different then the actual dream since some of the dream doesnt make sense. criticisim is apreciated and if you can tell me what to do better ill most certainly try

Title: Man of the Hot Spring
Synopsis: Mizunetsu Onzen is a fan of hot springs. All his life he spent looking for the greatest one of all. Now that he dies in what he considers as the best hot spring of all time, a high being reincarnates him as the very hot spring he dies in. Now he's been given the task to make himself as not only the best, but the most popular hot spring of all. Will he be able to make the whole world know of him as the greatest hot spring?

Title: Warden
Synopsis:
The world is facing its darkest times as the emergence of super powered people and beings unleashed an age of heroes and villains onto an unsuspecting and peaceful planet. The fight between good and evil is slowly being lost by those on the side of justice. The heroes slowly failing under the waves of those that would abuse their powers to rule over others. 
But in the shadows of the night a name is whispered in terror by the villains of the world, the title of the only man that they fear. In the silence of the concrete streets they say there is a single man that is determined the bring a river of blood to the sinners of the world. To him they are all dead men walking, ready to be wrapped in chains and locked in the deepest pits of hell. He is the one that has designated himself judge, jury and executioner.  
He is Warden.

Title: Sol
Synopsis:
Sol is Waterfolk, merpeople blessed by an old god. She dreams of being a warrior like her mother, but has now found herself betrothed to a lord. Is the lord as cruel as people think him to be or is he much more? And what of the Landwalker that chased her back to the sea?
What is the dangerous presence lurking among the Landwalkers?

Title: Transcendence
Synopsis:
In each universe across the vast multiverse exist someone special
Stored within him is the limitless potential to surpass infinity and to reach the level of God.
Just like how potential can propel you to great heights it can also be unleashed to cause destruction.
John is one of these rare beings.A boy who got transported to another world by a mysterious extra dimensional being with unknown intentions

Title: The Student Council Otherwise Known as The Student Paradigm Shift Commitee
Synopsis: Makoto Moriyama, Student Council President, believes that High School life is a moment for friendships to proliferate. However as a freshman student, Ai Sakito enters his high school and joins the Student Council as the "Student Paradigm Shift Committee" head, She's  intent in showing that Youth is nothing but Lies. How will this clash of ideals progress, and who would win in this debate against a rose-colored youth versus a melancholic lie?

Title: Requests Come With A Price (Dropped)
Synopsis: A young boy, going by the name of Yuranil Sai Rostov (Edward Stoker), has always contemplated his life. From the time he became a weeb, until his current situation. He believes himself to be free from those stupid things called morals. The only thing you should really care about is your family. And money. It all depends. Philosophy is a bitch. As a 15 year old boy with nothing in life, except for light novels and anime, rushing with hormones, he always wished his mundane life would have... more excitement. The most exciting thing he had was almost getting into an incestuous relationship, only to ruin it himself. But, Edward receives excitement on a fateful day in April. A day when he started to understand, requests come with a price.

Title: [What If] ▪ To Love Ru [Dropped]
Synopsis:
[Reboot]
Rainer Reinhardt was the strongest devilukean to ever exist, but one day, he was kidnapped by the humans in another universe. Forced to fight a war that's not his, Rainer broke free of their control with the Demon King's help. Then he went on a quest of vengeance, uniting the other races to fight against humankind of this world. Eventually, the war came to an end, the human Empire lost, leaving only a few remains which then all fled into the swamps in the North. Rainer, now without anything to do, decided to travel around the world, years passed by, dungeons had been looted, enemies had been killed, in boredom Rainer did a stupid thing that no one other than him would have considered, he chose to die. But due to his soul belonged to another universe, he got rejected by both Heaven and Hell, ending up in nothingness. He thought it was all over, but boy how wrong was he. Watch as the former devilukean Rainer Reinhardt, now known as Yuuki Rito the human dealt with his troubles, which consisted a bunch of beautiful alien girls and... A preverted principal.
Author Note :
Hi guys, I'm Liam, though my writing name is Just A Normal Guy. Now before you asked, I'd like to say I'm not abandoning Heroes & Villains.
It's just that constantly writing a story is very tiring, so as to not bored myself out, I've decided to write another story ! And because I've never written a fanfiction before, I thought 'Why the hell not ?'. That's how this story came to life. As for Heroes & Villains, I'll be taking a break from it until my inspiration comes back (I'm still writing that story). Thank you so much for reading my stories, I hope this story can entertain you in your free time. Ideas, review, critism are always welcome so please, if you see something wrong, please tell me. Thanks again.
Link To Heroes & Villains :
http://royalroadl.com/fiction/chapter/131261

Title: The Returned
Synopsis:
We all know of people that are sent to the another world to be some great hero, get the girl and save the day in the end right? 
But what if the world the hero was sent to was not happy go lucky world where the hero would have a harem and kill the demon king in the end, what if the world was dark and bloody filled with hatred and malice on all sides.
And what if the hero becomes something else in order to survive in that kind of world?
And what happens when that kind of hero returns home?
Well, let's see.

Title: Loneliness
Synopsis:
This is book about loneliness, sadness, and regret. 
Daniel, highschool student is sent to another world with nothing but his love for music. 
I dont know what the future of this book will entail but I hope you can come along for the journey.
 
(p.s. Picture came from online, not my own.)

Title: Project: Massacre
Synopsis: Due to deadly pollution, Zayne lives inside a mountain on Pluto. He must take the Pluto Placement Test, or PPT, to determine his future. One week later, he gets the PPT results back and he is placed into an unexpected job field. He must straddle his new job, care for his sister, and solve the mystery behind Pluto's pollution...he may find out that the stakes are higher than he could have ever imagined.

Title: The Torch
Synopsis: Tanaka Manyika was a Zimbabwean form 4 student in his 2nd term of study, and  like every other kid his age, he wanted to pass his end of year exams and move on with his life. However on one particular night his parents and his sister were brutally murdered by two strange men. This was only the beginning to a horrific nightmare; the coming of the apocalypse of infinite darkness was upon him. In that despondent world where everyone in the dark is subjected to despicable mutilation by the creatures of the unknown, Tanaka only has a torch as his arsenal, the only tangible form of light in a world consumed by darkness. Can he survive the end of the world and be the haven of others in despair or will he eventually fall prey to the hopelessness of the world?

Title: Shades of the Moon
Synopsis:
I'm rewriting this story!
I have taken down Arc 2 and Arc 3 already to avoid spoiling my new novel. The only reason I'm keeping the first 10 chapters is nostalgia; the writing is awkward and the story is not plotted out properly, but it's here if anyone wants to compare it to the new one.
If you'd like to read a more professionally written version of this story, I highly suggest checking out my Synergy.

Synopsis version too-many-to-count:
“I see,” Kiona said. “But . . . you’re changing once again, aren’t you?”
The entity considered her question, lifting a clawed hand towards the night sky. They observed the back of their hand idly, watching the glowing orange veins pulse alongside their pitch-black exoskeleton. The wind picked up right then, and Kiona shivered—just as much from the cold as from the savage grin on the creature's face.
“That’s right,” the entity said, clenching their hand slowly into a fist. They let out a quiet laugh, staring defiantly at the Moon as it rose from behind the clouds. “We are shades, yet not exactly. Not like the others. Here, in this world, we've become something more. We are the Shades of the Moon.”
There was a heartbeat of silence, during which Kiona joined the entity in their skygazing. The light-green Moon loomed over the city, shining like the entity's eyes. It promised otherworldly knowledge and terrible secrets. It promised progress. It promised change. In that moment, Kiona couldn't have imagined anything more beautiful.
“Shades of the Moon, huh?” she said, smiling a bit. It had a nice ring to it.

Title: Re: rebirth of our betrayed one
Synopsis:
(This story has been entirely modified.)*

Halphas was a chill dude.
Well, that was only from his and a few rare one's points of view.
Cuz if you looked at his titles, it was a tiny weeny bit more unsettling.
"Tyrant Of The Living"
"The One Who Thrives On Chaos"
"King Of The Dark Realm"
"God Of Destruction"
"Possibly An Alien"
Let's put this one out.
"Possibly An Alien"
Anyway.
He was a Demon King.
And Demon Kings are supposed to bring forth destruction and death.
Well, that was only in the script and in those blue screen.
But he still got killed.
Quote: "I don't really like the feeling of people dangling my dead body in front of a wall like a stripper you know."
Quite sad, however.
Transmigrating into another world was unexpected.
And Re-Transmigrating into his original world after death is even more unexpected.
 
*In re-writing process...(sigh), again.

Title: Choice of Power
Synopsis:
Ferrus, a simple boy in a simple village during a time of unlimited peace behind a deadly forest and mind-bending mists. However, Ferrus' life will change forever when abominations of power with the very elements on their sides come to find the secrets of the village. The boy's only saving wish is being caught in a space of dead air under rubble of the village elder's home, his home. Finding the name of a country he never knew, and a people of such unimaginable power, he can't believe he lived his life the way he did until now.
In this world, we will follow Ferrus as he makes his Choices for power upon a specific set of skills. Only in this world can someone be completely unique if they Choose, only in this world can the weakest family birth the strongest power, only in this world is it impossible to be Chosen. No, in this world people are the ones to Choose, they decide themselves, but only if they have the will and the perseverance to go to the top.
-Please don't be judgemental about my synopsis, I tried my best to make it interesting since the title doesn't make it apparent what the goal of this book is. Anyways, I am a first time author hoping to try out this idea I have given some thought on. Please give any reviews and any advice, all is appreciated as I'm still in highschool with need for a lot of it.
Thank you all!!!!! Please enjoy :D

Title: The Angriest Man In The Wasteland
Synopsis:
When the world ended it was not the sound of bombs or gunfire that people remembered. It was not the words of politicians or martyrs. The only thing people remembered was the screaming. Because after civilization ended and the ruin's of mankind's greatest feats were left to rot all anyone ever did was scream.
His wife murdered in front of him, his son taken, Samuel Clark walks the ruins of civilization on a never ending quest to save the only person he has left in the world. And he will stop at nothing to save him.

Title: Emperor of Yin and Yang
Synopsis:
Heaven's Emperor peacefully lived with his wife, overruling all Immortals in Heaven, a loyal and powerful wife, he was at the apex. Living in the Royal Palace, despite living peacefully, he knew it wouldn't last forever. He suspected a man planning a revolution, just like the Ancient Prophecy proclaimed. Why didn't he go against it? Simple. There would be two revolutions, not one.
 
Thus, when his time came he faced the onslaught of Immortals with a serene expression and a tyrannical bearing. A man and a woman, slaughtering all Immortals except one, were forced to hand over the Throne. Yet even when the time came for the Emperor to lose his Royal Throne, he was not worried. Rather, both him and his wife, disappeared from the Heaven to search for their inheritor. The man to lead the Second Revolution.
 
Anmos Archer. A thirteen-year-old youth born to an abusive single-father household. He struggles with being bipolar, inherited from his dad - a fallen cultivator. As he struggles to find an opportunity, a chance, to allow him to retaliate against his father he wanders upon a Royal Couple.
 
Could he be the inheritor? The man to lead a Revolution against Heaven?
 
Cover by Bharath Kishore.

Title: Collision of Myths
Synopsis: You all have probably heard this one. A hero is summoned from another world and is needed to defeat evil. That's all well and good. But this story is not about him. No, this story is about His younger brother who has been reincarnated as one of his descendants. And he's bringing with him all the myths and cultures from the other world with him. His journey will be one crazy turn after another. But it looks like he's just the person to accept the challenge. P.S. This is my first time writing stuff like this so go easy on me with the comments. I may also need some help with spelling and grammar. Image by Gerd Altmann from Pixabay

Title: Afterlife Online: Reboot
Synopsis:
Tad Lonnerman is having a crappy day stuck in crappy traffic that's making him late to a crappy meeting at work. On the plus side, his game development career is the only non-crappy thing he has going for him, so life isn't all bad.
At least not until he dies.
Now he finds himself uploaded to a beta test of Haven, an unannounced hyper-immersive MMO where the dead can aspire to a second life. It's not virtual reality, it's digital reality. A true afterlife online.
Except not all second chances are worth having. Tad bumbles into a pagan blood feud, crosses paths with fallen angels, and gets lied to by saints. His only friends are a frat boy with a penchant for dying and a girl who won't give him the time of day. Armed with improving loot and a bit of creative leveling, all Tad wants is to return to his old life, and he'll do anything for the opportunity.
Maybe even make a deal with the devil.

Title: Dimension Door
Synopsis:
I'd had a thought, it was much more than I'd bought. I'll travel the land and see all that's sought, be it hill or sand or mount or boat. The skies the limit! Is all I'd thought. But alas it was for all but naught.
_________________________________________
Note: I am terrible at rhyming, so what better to do than to try and rhyme? Even better if I can inflict my terrible rhyming onto others. Oh, and thank you if you attempt to read this. I must say however that I'm putting this on the back burner until I finished some of the other works. So this probably won't get many updates for a long while.
